groups.name_zh: 貝兒、米蘭達、費莉西亞、吉田

groups.name: Gallery Girliness setter
groups.name_zh: 圖庫 少女感設定者

groups.name_zh: 妖精、強盜、老虎、鳳凰、涼亭

groups.name_zh: 劇毒史萊姆女孩、劇毒史萊姆*2

groups.name: Nylisa the Dryad, Nylisa's Spider*2
groups.name_zh: 樹妖妮莉莎，妮莉莎的蜘蛛*2

groups.name: SkyscraperStoreRoom+Boss
groups.name_zh: 摩天大樓商店房間+老闆

groups.name: White Slime Girl, White Slime*2
groups.name_zh: 白史萊姆少女、白史萊姆*2

passages.content: Please choose a difficulty.
passages.content_zh: 請選擇難度。

passages.content: Do you wish to see the intro?
passages.content_zh: 你想看簡介嗎？

passages.content: The disguise may not use the character's real name.
passages.content_zh: 偽裝可能不會使用角色的真實姓名。

passages.content: Did you ask  for a date?
passages.content_zh: 你有要求約會嗎？

passages.content: 's Affection for you has increased by 1!
passages.content_zh: 對你的好感度增加了1！

passages.content:
Our story begins with our hero lamenting his poor life choices and
lack of success in academics.

Little does he know that soon, those are going to be the least
of his problems...
passages.content_zh:
我們的故事開始於我們的英雄哀嘆他糟糕的生活選擇
學術上缺乏成功。

他幾乎不知道，很快，這些將成為最少的
他的問題...

passages.content:
<You>(I can't believe I screwed up again.

 Guess I really was born a loser.)
passages.content_zh:
（我不敢相信我又搞砸了。

 我想我真的是天生的失敗者。 ）

passages.content:
Oh, looks Miss Nele gave me two tickets by mistake.

I hope the Director doesn't notice. I wouldn't want her to
get into trouble.
passages.content_zh:
\n哦，看來內勒小姐錯誤地給了我兩張票。

希望導演不要注意到。我不想讓她
惹上麻煩。

passages.content: Well, she's probably too busy with Mr. Daniels to care about it.
passages.content_zh: \n好吧，她可能太忙於丹尼爾斯先生而無暇顧及這件事。

passages.content:
What a nice day it is today! It makes me want to sing!

La, la, la.♫
passages.content_zh:
\n今天真是美好的一天啊！這讓我想唱歌！

啦啦啦♫

passages.content:
<You>(Wow, that girl's dressed really strangely. She must be headed to
an anime convention to cosplay or something.)
passages.content_zh:
（哇，那個女孩穿得真奇怪，她一定是要去
動漫角色扮演之類的慣例。 ）

passages.content: <You>(Wait! She's about to walk in front of a car!)
passages.content_zh: （等等！她正要走到一輛汽車前面！）

passages.content: You quickly grab the distracted cosplayer.
passages.content_zh: 你很快就抓住了那個心煩意亂的角色扮演者。

passages.content: Aaaahhhhh! What are you doi- Oh! I didn't notice that car!
passages.content_zh: \n啊啊啊啊！你在做什麼-哦！我沒注意到那輛車！

passages.content: You saved me! Thank you, mister!
passages.content_zh: \n你救了我！謝謝您，先生！

passages.content: <You>Just call me...
passages.content_zh: 打電話給我...

passages.content: <You>Just call me [...].
passages.content_zh: 就叫我吧。

passages.content: [...]? Oh, it's nice to meet you, [...].
passages.content_zh: \n？哦，很高興認識你，。

passages.content:
I am . I'm a Magical Girl who protects everybody's
happiness.
passages.content_zh:
我是。我是保護大家的魔法少女
幸福。

passages.content:
Yes. I made a deal with a fairy, so now I fight evil creatures
from another dimension with magic.
passages.content_zh:
是的。我與仙女做了一筆交易，所以現在我要與邪惡的生物戰鬥
來自另一個維度的魔法。

passages.content: ...Well, kind of. I'm still a trainee.
passages.content_zh: ...嗯，有點。我還是個實習生

passages.content:
But I'm learning really quickly, so I'll become a certified
Magical Girl in no time.
passages.content_zh:
但是我學得很快，所以我會成為認證的
瞬間就變成了魔法少女。

passages.content:
Yes, I became a Magical Girl because I want to see everyone
smile.
passages.content_zh:
是的，我成為魔法少女是因為我想見到大家
微笑。

passages.content: Cosplay? What's that?
passages.content_zh: 角色扮演？那是什麼？

passages.content:
...Say, [...], I can sense you are feeling really sad. Can I
do something to help you?
passages.content_zh:
...說，[...]，我能感覺到你感到非常悲傷。我可以嗎
做點什麼來幫助你？

passages.content: Sorry, [...], but I think that's impossible even with magic.
passages.content_zh: 抱歉，[...]，但我認為即使使用魔法也是不可能的。

passages.content:
Sorry, [...], but I don't have a phone.

I asked my sisters for one once, but they said I didn't
deserve it because I was stupid and useless.
passages.content_zh:
抱歉，[...]，但我沒有電話。

我曾經向我的姊妹們要過一次，但她們說我沒有
這是我應得的，因為我既愚蠢又無用。

passages.content: Really? You want a date with me?
passages.content_zh: 真的嗎？你想和我約會嗎？

passages.content:
Oh, this is so embarrassing... but it's okay since you seem
like a nice person. But I've got to tell you that-[...]
passages.content_zh:
哦，這太尷尬了...不過沒關係，因為你看起來
像一個好人。但我必須告訴你—[...]

passages.content:
Oh no, look at the time! Sorry, [...], but I really have to
get back to camp. Otherwise Miss Nele will be in trouble!
passages.content_zh:
喔不，看看時間！抱歉，[...]，但我真的必須這樣做
回到營地。不然奈樂小姐就有麻煩了！

passages.content:
<[...]>(She ran across the street without even looking...

 I guess some people never learn.)
passages.content_zh:
（她連看都沒看就跑過馬路…

 我猜有些人永遠學不會。 ）

passages.content: <[...]>Oh? It looks like  dropped something.
passages.content_zh: 哦？看起來像是掉了什麼東西。

passages.content:
<[...]>It's some kind of ticket. It says:

"Magical Camp: The Number One Institute to train Magical
Girls!♥"
passages.content_zh:
這是某種票。它說：

《魔法營：魔法修練第一學院》
女孩們！ ♥”

passages.content: <[...]>Huh, is the ticket starting to vibrate-[...]
passages.content_zh: 呃，票開始震動了嗎-

passages.content: <[...]>What the fuck? Where the hell am I!?
passages.content_zh: 搞什麼鬼？我到底在哪裡！ ？

passages.content: <[...]>Huh? The door is open.
passages.content_zh: 啊？門是開著的。

passages.content: <[...]>(Now let's just hope nobody snitches.)
passages.content_zh: （現在希望沒有人告密。）

passages.content: You use the key to open the door.
passages.content_zh: 你用鑰匙打開門。

passages.content: is amazing.
passages.content_zh: \n 太棒了。

passages.content: What the-?[...]
passages.content_zh: \n什麼-？

passages.content:
... you look like a more skimpily-dressed version
of .
passages.content_zh:
\n...你看起來像是衣著暴露的版本
的。

passages.content: Well excluding the hair, green eyes, and heart pupils.
passages.content_zh: \n好吧，不包括頭髮、綠眼睛和心形瞳孔。

passages.content: , your face... You look just like !
passages.content_zh: \n，你的臉…你看起來就像！

passages.content: <[...]>I can explain...
passages.content_zh: 我可以解釋一下...

passages.content:
That's amazing!

I too have been thinking about having some work done
to look more like her.
passages.content_zh:
\n太棒了！

我也一直在考慮完成一些工作
看起來更像她。

passages.content:
Let's both work hard to become living tributes to our amazing
idol!
passages.content_zh:
\n讓我們都努力工作，成為對我們令人驚嘆的活生生的致敬
偶像！

passages.content: Sure, we can go there again.
passages.content_zh: 當然，我們可以再去那裡。

passages.content: <Energetic Magical Girl>Friends? What happened?
passages.content_zh: 朋友？發生了什麼事？

passages.content: Please don't ask about it. Not now.
passages.content_zh: 請不要問這個。現在不要。

passages.content: <Energetic Magical Girl>...Alright.
<Energetic Magical Girl>Oh, look , it's .
passages.content_zh: 哦，你看，是。

passages.content: <[...]>Hi, what are you talking about?
passages.content_zh: 嗨，你在說什麼？

passages.content:
<Energetic Magical Girl>We're just trying to decide what to do next time we go out
to town.
passages.content_zh:
我們只是想決定下次出去做什麼
到鎮上。

passages.content:
We're thinking of going to this café with a karaoke machine.

The last time we were there, we had a lot of fun.
passages.content_zh:
我們正在考慮去這家有卡拉 OK 機的咖啡館。

上次我們在那裡玩得很開心。

passages.content:
<Energetic Magical Girl>You should've been there.  has the voice of an angel.
Do you want to come with us when we go there?
passages.content_zh:
你該去那裡的。  擁有天使般的聲音。
我們去那裡的時候你願意跟我們一起去嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>I'm not really much of a singer.
passages.content_zh: 我不是真正的歌手。

passages.content: <Energetic Magical Girl>How sad, your voice is so lovely.
passages.content_zh: 好悲傷啊，你的聲音好可愛。

passages.content: Yeah, you sound like a cutie!♥ You should totally sing with us.
passages.content_zh: 是的，你聽起來很可愛！ ♥ 你完全應該跟我們一起唱歌。

passages.content: <[...]>Fine, I'll consider it.
passages.content_zh: 好的，我考慮一下。

passages.content: That's the spirit!
passages.content_zh: 這就是精神！

passages.content: <[...]>But not today, I got stuff to do.
passages.content_zh: 但不是今天，我還有事要做。

passages.content: <Energetic Magical Girl>That's okay, come to us when you want to.
passages.content_zh: 沒關係，你想來就來吧。

passages.content: The girls leave, talking about their other plans.
passages.content_zh: 女孩們離開，談論著她們的其他計畫。

passages.content: <[...]>I really don't want to.
passages.content_zh: 我真的不想。

passages.content: <Energetic Magical Girl>Aw she's blushing, how cute!
passages.content_zh: 啊，臉紅了，好可愛啊！

passages.content:
Okay, fine, no karaoke. I get it. Jeez, you're so difficult
sometimes!
passages.content_zh:
好吧，好吧，沒有卡拉OK。我得到它。哎呀你太難了
有時！

passages.content:
The girls leave you behind. You get the feeling that  is angry
about you declining.
passages.content_zh:
女孩們把你拋在了後面。你會感覺到生氣的感覺
關於你的衰落。

passages.content:
<Energetic Magical Girl>Oh, is that because of your voice? Don't worry about it,
we-[...]
passages.content_zh:
哦，是因為你的聲音嗎？別擔心，
我們-

passages.content: ...Voice? Oh no, 's voice!
passages.content_zh: ...聲音？喔不，是的聲音！

passages.content: Sorry, but I just remembered I promised to show  around.
passages.content_zh: 抱歉，但我剛剛記得我答應過要露面的。

passages.content:
grabs your arm and drags you to an isolated part of
the camp.
passages.content_zh:
抓住你的手臂，把你拖到一個孤立的地方
營地。

passages.content: I can't believe I forgot about something so basic!
passages.content_zh: 我不敢相信我忘了這麼基本的事情！

passages.content:
<[...]>... err... could you just calm down and
tell me why you're freaking out?
passages.content_zh:
...呃...你能冷靜一下嗎
告訴我為什麼害怕？

passages.content:
I am\fi freaking out\fr because you sound like a guy trying
to sound like a girl!
passages.content_zh:
我\fi嚇壞了\fr因為你聽起來像個嘗試的人
聽起來像女孩！

passages.content: <[...]>That is, kind of, what I am.
passages.content_zh: 這就是我。

passages.content: She puts her hands around your neck.
passages.content_zh: 她雙手摟住你的脖子。

passages.content:
It's a good thing your clothes hide your neck. Your Adam's
apple would give you away in seconds.
passages.content_zh:
幸虧你的衣服遮住了你的脖子。你的亞當
蘋果會在幾秒鐘內洩漏你的資訊。

passages.content: Well, I noticed it in time. Fixing that shouldn't be too hard.
passages.content_zh: 嗯，我及時注意到了。解決這個問題應該不會太難。

passages.content: <[...]>(I'm not sure if I should let  "fix my problem"...)
passages.content_zh: （我不確定是否應該讓「解決我的問題」...）

passages.content:
Your neck suddenly goes completely numb. You try to speak,
but it seems your vocal cords are paralysed.
passages.content_zh:
你的脖子突然完全麻木了。你試著說話，
但你的聲帶好像麻痺了

passages.content: Just a little bit more...
passages.content_zh: 還有一點...

passages.content: And done!
passages.content_zh: 完成！

passages.content:
<[...]>That was weird... Wow, my voice is so high-pitched! It's as
if I'm breathing helium.
passages.content_zh:
這很奇怪...哇，我的聲音太高了！就如
如果我呼吸氦氣。

passages.content:
<[...]>And my neck... It's gone!

My Adam's apple is gone!
passages.content_zh:
還有我的脖子...它不見了！

我的喉結沒了！

passages.content:
Fufufu, my magic took care of that problem together with
your voice.

Instead of just casting a spell to change how you sound,
I transformed your throat.
passages.content_zh:
Fufufu，我的魔法解決了這個問題
你的聲音。

不只是施咒語來改變你的聲音，
我改變了你的喉嚨。

passages.content:
That way, since it's not a constant magical effect, it can't be
dispelled by common counter-magic.
passages.content_zh:
這樣一來，由於不是持續的魔法效果，所以不可能
被普通的反魔法驅散。

passages.content: <[...]>But you can reverse it, right?
passages.content_zh: 但你可以反轉它，對吧？

passages.content: Sure, if I want to. But why reverse it? You sound like a cutie.♥
passages.content_zh: 當然，如果我願意的話。但為什麼要反過來呢？你聽起來很可愛。 ♥
我願意嗎？

passages.content: Absolutely!
passages.content_zh: 絕對！

passages.content: <[...]>I really hope you're joking...
passages.content_zh: 我真的希望你在開玩笑...

passages.content: <[...]>Wait! Just what are you planning to do, ?
passages.content_zh: 等等！你到底打算做什麼？

passages.content:
Isn't it obvious? I'm going to fix your voice. Don't tell me
you don't want my help!?
passages.content_zh:
這不是很明顯嗎？我要修復你的聲音。別告訴我
你不需要我的幫忙！ ？

passages.content: <[...]>No, I mean "what exactly are you going to do" to help me?
passages.content_zh: 不，我的意思是「你到底要做什麼」來幫助我？

passages.content:
Oh, right. I'd just change your throat a little so your vocal
cords produce a higher sound.
passages.content_zh:
哦，對了。我只是稍微改變你的喉嚨，這樣你的聲音
電線會產生更高的聲音。

passages.content: And remove your Adam's apple while I'm at it.
passages.content_zh: 趁我還在的時候把你的喉結摘下來。

passages.content: I knew you would understand.
passages.content_zh: 我就知道你會理解的。

passages.content:
Yeah, I did it to improve your disguise.

And since this is not a constant magical effect, it can't be
dispelled by common counter-magic.
passages.content_zh:
是的，我這樣做是為了提升你的偽裝能力。

而且由於這不是一個持續的魔法效果，所以不可能
被普通的反魔法驅散。

passages.content: What!? But what about your disguise?
passages.content_zh: 什麼！ ？但你的偽裝呢？

passages.content:
<[...]>Look, , don't take this the wrong way, but I prefer
to avoid having any more magic change me.
passages.content_zh:
聽著，不要誤解這一點，但我更喜歡
以免更多的魔法改變我。

passages.content:
...Dammit, I just want to help! Why do you have to be so
stubborn!?
passages.content_zh:
...該死，我只是想幫忙！為什麼你一定要這樣
固執！ ？

passages.content: Furious,  leaves.
passages.content_zh: 憤怒，離開。

passages.content: <Energetic Magical Girl>I can hardly wait to hear you sing again, !
passages.content_zh: 我迫不及待地想再聽你唱歌了！

passages.content: <[...]>(Looks pretty demolished. Must have endured a lot of training.)
passages.content_zh: （看起來很破爛。一定經過了很多訓練。）

passages.content: It's the mailfairy, yay!
passages.content_zh: 這是郵仙，耶！

passages.content:
Please... stay away from me.

It's for your own safety.
passages.content_zh:
請...離我遠一點。

這是為了你自己的安全。

passages.content: I wonder if I'll get anything today.
passages.content_zh: 我想知道今天是否能得到什麼。

passages.content: <Mailfairy>And this letter is for you, .
passages.content_zh: 這封信是寫給你的，。

passages.content:
Great, another "We are disappointed but we still love you"
letter from mom. They think I'm still in juvie.
passages.content_zh:
太好了，又一個“我們很失望，但我們仍然愛你”
媽媽的來信。他們認為我還在少年監獄裡

passages.content: <Mailfairy>And here's one for you, .
passages.content_zh: 這是給你的，。

passages.content: It's from mother, no way!
passages.content_zh: 是媽媽寄來的，不可能！

passages.content: <[...]>She doesn't write to you often?
passages.content_zh: 她不常寫信給你嗎？

passages.content:
She never has... I've written to her every week since
I came to the camp, but I'd almost given up on her sending
me an answer.
passages.content_zh:
她從來沒有...從那時起我每週都寫信給她
我來到了營地，但我幾乎放棄了她的派遣
我一個答案。

passages.content:
This is like a dream come true.

Oh, I hope mother has also written about who my father
is.
passages.content_zh:
這就像夢想成真。

哦，我希望媽媽也寫過我的爸爸是誰
群島

passages.content: That's great, .
passages.content_zh: 太好了，。

passages.content:
*Giggle*

My legs are shaking.
passages.content_zh:
*咯咯*

我的腿在顫抖。

passages.content: opens the letter.
passages.content_zh: 打開這封信。

passages.content:
It reads:

"To my stupid daughter, stop sending me bothersome
letters. For the last time, I don't give a damn about you."
passages.content_zh:
內容如下：

「我的傻女兒，別再給我添麻煩了
字母。最後一次，我根本不在乎你。 」

passages.content: Oh...
<[...]>, that's awful.
passages.content_zh: ，太糟糕了。

passages.content:
It's okay, I should've expected it... Guess I'll stop writing
letters to mother.
passages.content_zh:
沒關係，我早該想到的...我想我會停止寫了
給母親的信。

passages.content: runs away with tears in her eyes.
passages.content_zh: 她眼裡含著淚水逃跑了。

passages.content: <[...]>(She's really going through a lot recently.)
passages.content_zh: （最近她真的經歷了很多事情。）

passages.content: <[...]>(What kind of mother would treat her own daughter like that?)
passages.content_zh: （什麼樣的母親會這樣對待自己的女兒？）

passages.content:
That\fb bitch!\fr

Mailfairy, do you still have 's mother's address?
passages.content_zh:
那個\fb 婊子！ \fr

Mailfairy，你還有媽媽的地址嗎？

passages.content:
<Mailfairy>Why yes, I do. Are you planning to send her a letter and/or
package?
passages.content_zh:
為什麼是的，我願意。您打算寄一封信和/或
包？

passages.content: Something like that.
passages.content_zh: 類似的東西。

I will let you know that since you are learning to be a girl,
you should curtsy... Girls don't bow, .
passages.content_zh:
我會讓你知道，既然你正在學習做一個女孩，
你應該行屈膝禮...女孩不鞠躬，.

passages.content:
I will let you know that since you are a girl, you should
curtsy... Girls don't bow, .
passages.content_zh:
我會讓你知道，既然你是女孩，你就應該
行屈膝禮……女孩子不鞠躬，。

passages.content:
B-But since you are just an ignorant commoner, I will let you
keep bowing... consider it a special dispensation.
passages.content_zh:
但、但既然你只是個無知的平民，我就讓你
繼續鞠躬……認為這是一個特殊的豁免。

passages.content: <[...]>...? Were you just checking out my ass?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>...？你剛剛在看我的屁股嗎？

passages.content:
N-No...! That's absurd, why would I want to look at another
girl's body?
passages.content_zh:
不、不……！太荒謬了，為什麼我想看另一個
女孩的身體？

passages.content:
And even if I did, I most certainly wouldn't want to look at
yours.
passages.content_zh:
即使我這樣做了，我也肯定不想看
你的。

passages.content: <[...]>(Hehehe, now this is just too perfect to let pass.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（呵呵，現在這太完美了，不容錯過。）

passages.content:
<[...]>(I can't believe I'm about to do this, but it's too perfect to
let it pass.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（我不敢相信我要這麼做，但這太完美了
讓它過去吧。 ）

passages.content:
<[...]>Ooops, I just dropped my wand. Guess I'll have to pick it
up now~.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>哎呀，我的魔杖掉了。我想我必須選擇它
現在起來~。

passages.content:
You reach toward the wand in a way that lets  get a
good look at your ass, and also make sure to wiggle it a bit.
passages.content_zh:
你伸向魔杖的方式可以讓
好好看看你的屁股，並確保稍微扭動它。

passages.content: <[...]>, are you ok?
Y-Yes...? Why do you ask?
passages.content_zh: 是、是嗎……？為什麼問？

passages.content: <[...]>You're bleeding a bit from your nose.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你的鼻子流了一點血。

passages.content: You stupid pervert!
passages.content_zh: 你這個愚蠢的變態！

passages.content: runs away, embarrassed.
passages.content_zh: 羞愧地跑開。

passages.content:
<[...]>(Ouch! I think  just stole a chunk of my lifeforce! I guess
that's her equivalent to a slap.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（哎喲！我想剛剛偷走了我的一大塊生命力！我猜
這相當於給她一巴掌。 ）

passages.content: <[...]>So where are you from, ?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那你來自哪裡？

passages.content: I was born in the Imperial Palace on Itone.
passages.content_zh: 我出生在 Itone 的皇宮裡。

passages.content: <[...]>Imperial Palace? Sounds grand.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>皇宮？聽起來很宏偉。

passages.content:
The palace is the seat of power of the Empire.

All important political, military, and economic decisions are
made in its golden halls.
passages.content_zh:
宮殿是帝國的權力中心。

所有重要的政治、軍事、經濟決策
是在它的金色大廳裡製作的。

passages.content:
Maybe one day you will be fortunate enough to lay your
eyes on it.

I might even let you see the palace's interior, though you
will probably have to enter through the servants' entrance.
passages.content_zh:
也許有一天你會幸運地奠定你的
眼睛盯著它。

我甚至可以讓你看看宮殿的內部，不過你
可能必須從僕人入口進入。

passages.content:
<[...]>I haven't seen you hanging out with your friends lately,
.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我最近沒看到你和你的朋友出去玩，
。

passages.content:
Yes, you're right.

They have been a bit distant lately.
passages.content_zh:
是的，你說得對。

他們最近有點疏遠了。

passages.content: <[...]>Do you think they figured out what you were doing?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你認為他們知道你在做什麼嗎？

passages.content:
I hope not.

I know this sounds strange, but for some reason, I don't
want them to dislike me.
passages.content_zh:
我希望不會。

我知道這聽起來很奇怪，但出於某種原因，我不這麼認為
想讓他們不喜歡我。

passages.content: <[...]>Maybe because you like your friends?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>也許是因為你喜歡你的朋友？

passages.content: I wonder...
passages.content_zh: 我想知道...

passages.content:
See you in training, .

I hope the monsters put a up good fight today.
passages.content_zh:
訓練中見。

希望今天的怪物們能夠打出精彩的表現。

passages.content: <Nele>Ready for your day off, dearie?
passages.content_zh: <Nele>準備好休息了嗎，親愛的？

passages.content: <Nele>Great, let's just call your friends then.
passages.content_zh: <Nele>太好了，那我們就打電話給你的朋友吧。

passages.content: <Nele>Now dearies, are you ready to visit Earth?
passages.content_zh: <Nele>現在親愛的，你們準備好要造訪地球了嗎？

passages.content: Yes Miss Nele, and look...
passages.content_zh: 是的，內勒小姐，你看…

passages.content:
got me some new clothes. She said that these would
help me mingle better.
passages.content_zh:
買了一些新衣服給我。她說這些會
幫助我更好地融入。

passages.content: <Nele>Very nice, .
passages.content_zh: <內勒>非常好，。

passages.content: <Nele>Please don't pick up any of 's bad habits.
passages.content_zh: <Nele>請不要養成任何壞習慣。

passages.content: <Nele>What about you girls? Do you have some normal clothes?
passages.content_zh: <Nele>你們女孩呢？你有普通的衣服嗎？

passages.content: <Nele>By the way, girls, do you have any normal clothes?
passages.content_zh: <Nele>順便問一下，姑娘們，你們有普通的衣服嗎？

passages.content:
I will go like this; the clothes from Earth are too plain for
my taste.
passages.content_zh:
我就這樣走；地球上的衣服太樸素了
我的口味。

passages.content: I'm going to wear this.
passages.content_zh: 我要穿這個。

passages.content: <Nele>A sailor fuku? Not something I'd expected from you, .
passages.content_zh: <Nele>水手福？這不是我對你的期望。

passages.content: I'm full of surprises.
passages.content_zh: 我心裡充滿了驚喜。

passages.content: <Nele>What about you, ?
passages.content_zh: <內萊>你呢？

passages.content: <[...]>Well... I... you see...
<Nele>Is there a problem? Let me see the item you use to transform.
passages.content_zh: <內樂>有什麼問題嗎？讓我看看你用來變形的物品。

passages.content: <Nele>A makeup box? How classic.
passages.content_zh: <Nele>化妝盒？多麼經典。

passages.content: <Nele>Funny, it looks just like 's with the colours switched...
passages.content_zh: <Nele>有趣，看起來就像換了顏色一樣…

passages.content: <Nele>Anyway, to change clothes, you do this...
passages.content_zh: <Nele>總之，要換衣服，你就這樣做…

passages.content: <[...]>(Change clothes!? What if I end up with my original clothes!?)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（換衣服！？如果我最終得到原來的衣服怎麼辦！？）

passages.content: <Nele>Dearie, have you been going through the Director's stuff?
passages.content_zh: <Nele>親愛的，你看過導演的東西了嗎？

passages.content: <Nele>Alright. We'll see if we can fix it later.
passages.content_zh: <內萊>好。我們稍後看看能否修復它。

passages.content: <Nele>Now then, time for your day off.
passages.content_zh: <Nele>那麼，現在該休息了。

passages.content: <Nele>Just cross the portal and you'll be transported to Earth.
passages.content_zh: <Nele>只要穿過傳送門，你就會被傳送到地球。

passages.content:
<Nele>Take your time. Like I said before, you can use the tickets
any time you want.
passages.content_zh:
<內萊>慢慢來。就像我之前說的，你可以使用門票
任何你想要的時間。

passages.content: <Nele>Ready for your time off, dearie?
passages.content_zh: <Nele>準備好休息了嗎，親愛的？

passages.content: <Nele>Let me teleport you to the inn.
passages.content_zh: <Nele>讓我傳送你到旅館。

passages.content:
<Nele>Good morning, dearie.

I know this is sudden, but we can't leave yet.
passages.content_zh:
<內勒>早安，親愛的。

我知道這很突然，但我們還不能離開。

passages.content:
<Nele>A girl from a team I counsel, , has gone missing.

Until she's been found, I cannot in good conscience leave.
passages.content_zh:
<Nele>我輔導的團隊中的一名女孩失蹤了。

在找到她之前，我憑良心不能離開。

passages.content: <[...]>I see. Alright, I'll look for her.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我明白了。好的，我去找她。

passages.content: <Nele>Thank you, dearie.
passages.content_zh: <內勒>謝謝你，親愛的。

passages.content: Oh my, the well seems to have dried up.
passages.content_zh: 天哪，這口井好像已經乾枯了。

passages.content: <[...]>Does this mean we're going to have trouble with water?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這是否意味著我們會遇到水問題？

passages.content:
Not really, I just prefer to get my water directly from the
well. It reminds me of my village; the water from the cafeteria
just isn't the same.
passages.content_zh:
不是真的，我只是更喜歡直接從水中取水
好吧。它讓我想起了我的村莊；食堂的水
只是不一樣。

passages.content:
I wonder what's down there.

Did you know this place is made of pieces from several
different worlds the Director fused? It could be anything.
passages.content_zh:
我想知道下面有什麼。

你知道嗎，這個地方是由幾塊碎片組成的
導演融合的不同世界？它可以是任何東西。

passages.content: <[...]>(Should I go down?)

<[...]>(Looks like it reaches to the bottom of the well.

 Down I go.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（看起來已經到達井底了。

 我下去。 ）

passages.content: Fuck, I need to get out of here ASAP.
passages.content_zh: 操，我得盡快離開這裡。

passages.content: <[...]>Hi there. My name is-[...]
YOU! It's because of you that I'm stuck here again!
passages.content_zh: 你！都是因為你，我又被困在這裡了！

passages.content: <[...]>Wh-What? But we saved you!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>什-什麼？但我們救了你！

passages.content:
Be quiet! You're the last person I want to deal with right
now... Dammit, I have to find a way out of here...
passages.content_zh:
安靜！你是我最不想對付的人吧
現在……該死，我得想辦法離開這裡……

passages.content: She ignores you.
passages.content_zh: 她不理你。

passages.content: <Magical Girl>Here it goes!
passages.content_zh: <魔法少女>來啦！

passages.content:
<Magical Girl>*Sigh*

I really have to work on my aim.
passages.content_zh:
<魔法少女>*嘆氣*

我真的必須為我的目標而努力。

passages.content: Fufufu, a perfect shot like always.
passages.content_zh: 呼呼呼，一如既往的完美鏡頭。

passages.content:
Oh, , I didn't see you there.

Do you want to train a bit with me? You can never be too
prepared in our line of work.
passages.content_zh:
哦，我沒在那裡看到你。

你想跟我一起訓練一下嗎？你永遠不可能太
在我們的工作中做好準備。

passages.content: Alright, show me your best attack!
passages.content_zh: 好吧，讓我看看你最好的攻擊吧！

passages.content: ...That's it? What did you just do?
passages.content_zh: ……就是這樣？你剛才做了什麼？

passages.content:
<[...]>I just focused on my wand.

I discovered that it shoots an energy beam when I do that,
somehow.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我只專注於我的魔杖。

我發現當我這樣做時它會發射出能量束，
不知何故。

passages.content:
That's your best attack!?

You mean that all this time, you've just been shooting
unfocused magical energy at things?
passages.content_zh:
這就是你最好的攻擊！ ？

你的意思是一直以來你都在拍攝
對事物沒有集中的魔法能量？

passages.content:
, that...\fi attack\fr sucks!

I guess I'll have to teach you how to fight like a proper
Magical Girl.
passages.content_zh:
，那...\fi 攻擊\fr 太糟糕了！

我想我得教你如何像個正規的人一樣戰鬥
魔法少女.

passages.content:
First, let's talk about your posture, it's all wrong.

Hold your wand like this and...
passages.content_zh:
首先說一下你的姿勢，都是錯的。

像這樣握住你的魔杖然後...

passages.content: proceeds to give you some pointers...
passages.content_zh: 繼續給你一些指示...

passages.content:
No, no, NO! Don't just point your wand at your target.

Twirl it a bit first, it's cuter.
passages.content_zh:
不，不，不！不要只是將魔杖指向目標。

先稍微扭動一下，這樣比較可愛。

passages.content: Magical Girls are supposed to be cute!
passages.content_zh: 魔法少女就應該是可愛的！

passages.content:
I said "twirl it", not "shake it"! And try to get that footwork
right!
passages.content_zh:
我說的是“轉動它”，而不是“搖晃它”！並嘗試獲得那種步法
對了！

passages.content: <[...]>Ouch! That hurt!
Pain is uncuteness leaving the body!
passages.content_zh: 痛苦是離開身體的不可愛！

passages.content: Perfect!
<[...]>You taught me how to shoot pink hearts?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你教我拍粉紅色的心？

passages.content:
Pink hearts that EXPLODE! Cute and deadly, they make the
perfect signature move for a Magical Girl.
passages.content_zh:
爆炸的粉紅心！可愛又致命，他們讓
魔法少女的完美招牌動作。

passages.content:
<[...]>That's going to be really useful.

Thanks, .
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>這真的很有用。

謝謝， 。

passages.content: You're welcome.♥
passages.content_zh: 不客氣。 ♥

passages.content: <[...]>Couldn't you have taught me something more manly?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你就不能教我一些更有男子氣概的東西嗎？

passages.content: "Manly"? But , we're both girls.♥
passages.content_zh: “男子氣概”？但是，我們都是女孩。 ♥

passages.content:
<[...]>*Sigh*

Sometimes I think you're enjoying this too much.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>*嘆氣*

有時我覺得你太享受這件事了。

passages.content: [...] learned the skill Heart Blast.
passages.content_zh: [...]學習了技能「心臟爆炸」。

passages.content: <[...]>I. Just. Can't. Do. It!

Don't worry, it's not easy learning new spells in a day. Maybe
if you-[...]
passages.content_zh:
別擔心，一天之內學習新法術並不容易。也許
如果你-[...]

passages.content:
<[...]>No! We've been at this all day.

I don't know what I'm doing wrong!
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>不！我們一整天都在做這件事。

我不知道我做錯了什麼！

passages.content: Okay, calm down. How about we-[...]
passages.content_zh: 好吧，冷靜點。我們怎麼樣-[...]

passages.content:
<[...]>I don't want to calm the fuck down!

Fuck this goddamn piece of garbage target. Just blast it all
to Hell. Batman, Superman, and all those clowns, too.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我他媽的不想冷靜下來！

去他媽的這個該死的垃圾目標。全部炸掉就好
到地獄。蝙蝠俠、超人，還有所有那些小丑。

passages.content: Now you're just being silly-[...]
passages.content_zh: 現在你只是在犯傻—[...]

passages.content: <[...]>Joker, Iron Man, Christian Bale. Full fire ahead with-[...]
passages.content_zh: <[...]>小丑、鋼鐵人、克里斯汀貝爾。火力全開-[...]

passages.content: Hellfire, eh? Good enough.♥
passages.content_zh: 地獄火，是嗎？夠好了。 ♥

passages.content: <[...]>What do you mean, "good enough"?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>「夠好」是什麼意思？

passages.content:
Well it matches your girlfriend, right?

Power of love and all that.
passages.content_zh:
嗯，很適合你女朋友吧？

愛的力量等等。

passages.content: <[...]>That's... that's true!
[...] learned the skill Baleful Fires.
passages.content_zh: [...]學會了惡火技能。

passages.content: <[...]>Mistress will be so proud!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>女主人會很自豪的！

passages.content: <[...]>Maybe some other time.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>也許其他時間。

passages.content:
Don't slack off.

I would hate to see you get beaten by some weak monster.
passages.content_zh:
不要鬆懈。

我不願意看到你被弱小的怪物打敗。

passages.content: <Magical Girl>Ready... aim... FIRE!
passages.content_zh: <魔法少女>準備...瞄準...開火！

passages.content: <Magical Girl>That's not half bad.
passages.content_zh: <魔法少女>這還不錯。

passages.content: <Magical Girl>Oh great, now there are TWO of them in the camp...
passages.content_zh: <魔法少女>喔太好了，現在營地裡有兩個人了…

passages.content: <Magical Girl>Oh hi, new girl. Thank you again for saving me back there.
passages.content_zh: <魔法少女>嗨，新來的女孩。再次感謝你救了我回到那裡。

passages.content:
<Magical Girl>I've heard  is on your team now.

Be careful with her, I think she was responsible for what
happened to me.
passages.content_zh:
<魔法少女>聽說現在在你們隊了。

小心她，我認為她該為什麼負責
發生在我身上。

passages.content:
<Magical Girl>Hm, I like your new look. A bit skimpy for my tastes, but it
suits you.
passages.content_zh:
<魔法少女>嗯，我喜歡你的新造型。對我的口味來說有點吝嗇，但它
適合你。

passages.content:
<[...]>*Sigh*

Thanks...
<Magical Girl>By the way, nice legs.
passages.content_zh: <魔法少女>順便一提，腿不錯。

passages.content:
<Magical Girl>I see you too have been using cosmetic magic. Don't feel
embarrassed, everybody here does it. I myself did a bit
of wand work on my nose.
passages.content_zh:
<魔法少女>我看你也用過化妝魔法。沒感覺
尷尬，這裡的每個人都這樣做。我自己也做了一點
魔杖在我鼻子上的作用。

passages.content: ...! I take it you're going for a species change, too?
passages.content_zh: ....！我想你也想改變物種吧？

passages.content: But I'd be careful if I were you; demons aren't that popular.
passages.content_zh: 但如果我是你，我會小心的；惡魔並不那麼受歡迎。

passages.content: I heard a Magico ruined your day off. Those things really suck.
passages.content_zh: 我聽說 Magico 毀了你的休息日。那些東西真的很糟糕。

passages.content:
*Yawn*

...I need a day off.
passages.content_zh:
*打哈欠*

……我需要休息一天。

passages.content:
Wait a moment... Your chest's so much nicer! Damn it, am
I the only Magical Girl that can't get a bigger rack!?
passages.content_zh:
等一下……你的胸部好多了！該死的，我
我是唯一一個買不到更大架子的魔法少女！ ？

passages.content: <[...]>(I think 's having some trouble with that, too...)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（我認為 也遇到了一些麻煩...）

passages.content: But... but... right here, where everyone can see us!?
passages.content_zh: 但是……但是……就在這裡，所有人都能看到我們！ ？

passages.content: Don't worry. Nobody's watching.
passages.content_zh: 不用擔心。沒有人在看。

passages.content: The two girls' faces approach like they are about to kiss.
passages.content_zh: 兩個女孩的臉湊得很近，就像要接吻一樣。

passages.content: Then  notices you.
passages.content_zh: 然後注意到你。

passages.content: Then the teal-haired one notices you.
passages.content_zh: 然後藍綠色頭髮的人就會注意到你。

passages.content:
? Th-This is not what it looks like!

We were just... We were just...
passages.content_zh:

I have determined that  resides in the yellow-roofed

passages.content: Do you want to be happy?

<[...]>Wait, does this have anything to do with what happened the

You really don't understand what you did wrong?

passages.content:
Look at those two perverts.

Do they think everybody doesn't already know what they've
been doing?

看看那兩個變態。

他們是否認為每個人都不知道自己擁有什麼
一直在做什麼？

passages.content: Disgusting!
Exactly, it's just shameful!

passages.content: walks away with an expression of pure disgust.

passages.content: Who gives a damn about what some overweight loser thinks?

passages.content: turns her back on you and walks away.

passages.content: <[...]>(I'm really starting to think having her join us was a mistake.)

passages.content: Really!? I thought I was the only one who-[...]
passages.content_zh: 真的嗎！ ？我以為我是唯一一個-[...]

passages.content: AH!
? What are you doing here!?
passages.content_zh: ？你在這裡做什麼！ ？

passages.content: You... you... you are that girl who lives with !

passages.content: Get away from me, you sick pervert!

passages.content: runs away as fast as she can.

passages.content:
<[...]>Here you go. One copy of DeWaltz's\fi Days in Thrudmadra\fr,

<[...]>給你。 DeWaltz 的\fi Days in Thrudmadra\fr 的一份副本，

It's perfect! You can read everything! But why are you giving

<[...]>They should, but I thought you'd like to read it again, now

<[...]>他們應該，但我想你現在想再讀一遍

<[...]>Just make sure to return it to the library within thirty days,

passages.content_zh:
<[...]>只要確保在三十天內將其歸還給圖書館即可，
好嗎？

passages.content: Of course! You have my word!
passages.content_zh: 當然！我向你保證！

passages.content:
<[...]>By the way, I'm kind of curious:

do you know if anything bad happened to Director
on Thrudmadra?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>順便說一句，我有點好奇：

你知道導演有沒有發生什麼不好的事嗎
在斯魯德馬德拉？

passages.content: Huh? That's an odd question.
passages.content_zh: 啊？這是一個奇怪的問題。

passages.content:
I'm not really sure... This was long before I was born, but
she rescued us from the Magico Lord Garak when he attacked

passages.content_zh:
我不太確定...那是在我出生之前很久，但是
當魔法領主加拉克襲擊時，她從他手中救了我們
我們。

passages.content:
Thrudmadra is still infested with undead, but my people are
recovering lands they lost, and rebuilding ruined villages.
passages.content_zh:
斯魯德馬德拉仍然充滿了亡靈，但我的人民
收復失去的土地，重建被摧毀的村落。

passages.content:
We're prospering again, thanks to her.

The Director is a celebrated hero there.
passages.content_zh:
感謝她，我們再次繁榮起來。

導演是那裡著名的英雄。

passages.content: <[...]>Huh... That might be part of it.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>呃...這可能是其中的一部分。

passages.content:
Anyway, if you don't mind, I'm going to start reading! I only

passages.content_zh:
不管怎樣，如果你不介意的話，我要開始讀書了！我只
距離完成還有三十天！

passages.content: <[...]>Sure, I hope you enjoy it.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>當然，我希望你喜歡它。

passages.content:
<[...]>Say... you wouldn't happen to have any library books on

passages.content_zh:
<[...]>說...你不會碰巧有任何圖書館的書籍

passages.content:
Huh? Yes, how did you know? When I first arrived in camp,

啊？是的，你怎麼知道的？當我第一次到達營地時，
我去圖書館找到了這個。它幫助提醒我
家的...

passages.content:
She loves that book! Back when we were first getting to

passages.content_zh:
她喜歡那本書！當我們第一次到達時

passages.content:
shows you a very worn and mistreated book, held

see that the contents are barely legible.
passages.content_zh:
向您展示一本非常破舊且受到虐待的書，
現在蓋子不見了，用麻線把它放在一起。你可以
看到內容幾乎難以辨認。

passages.content: <[...]>That's a library book!? What happened to it?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那是一本圖書館的書！ ？這是怎麼回事？

passages.content:
I used to bring it with me into combat for good luck. Once
the cover was burned off by gremlins and a zombie threw
up on some of the pages, I stopped doing that.
passages.content_zh:
我曾經帶著它參加戰鬥以求好運。曾經
蓋子被小精靈燒掉了，殭屍丟了
在某些頁面上，我停止了這樣做。

passages.content:
<[...]>Wow, ... I'm surprised. I never thought you'd steal

passages.content_zh:
<[...]>哇，...我很驚訝。我從沒想過你會偷東西

passages.content:
Ehhh??? Stealing??? I didn't steal this book! I took it from the

passages.content_zh:
誒誒？ ？ ？偷東西？ ？ ？我沒有偷這本書！我把它從
圖書館！

passages.content:
<[...]>You do know that library books are just lent out, right? You

passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你知道圖書館的書只是藉出去的，對吧？你

passages.content: ...AAHHHHH!!!
!!! Why didn't you tell me I was stealing???
passages.content_zh: !!!為什麼不告訴我我偷東西了？ ？ ？

passages.content:
I thought you knew and were just trying to impress me by

It kind of worked, too...

我以為你知道並且只是想給我留下深刻印象
做一次壞女孩！

這也有點效果...

passages.content:
<[...]>Anyway, I hate to separate you from your book, but someone

passages.content_zh:
<[...]>無論如何，我討厭把你和你的書分開，但是有人
營地中的其他人希望了解斯魯德馬德拉。你呢
介意我現在收回它嗎？

passages.content:
No, that's fine. And... here, take this and give it to the library

passages.content_zh:
不，沒關係。還有...這裡，把這個交給圖書館

passages.content: She hands you 20000 Lumes and the book.
passages.content_zh: 她遞給你 20000 盧姆和這本書。

passages.content: WHAT!? We were saving that up to get matching tattoos!
passages.content_zh: 什麼！ ？我們把錢存起來，用來紋匹配的刺青！

passages.content: I know, but... this is more important.
passages.content_zh: 我知道，但是……這更重要。

passages.content: <[...]>Thanks, . I'll make sure that they get this.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>謝謝，。我會確保他們得到這個。

passages.content:
*Gasp!*

Wh-Why are you dressed like that!?

No, wait... Why are you a half-naked demoness!?

*喘氣！ *

你、為什麼穿成這樣！ ？

不，等等……你為什麼是半裸的魔女！ ？

passages.content: <[...]>Stuff happened. This place changes people...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>事情發生了。這個地方改變了人...

passages.content:
You... you look...

No, Amy, keep it cool. You're loyal to Skudis!
passages.content_zh:
你……你看起來……

不，艾米，保持冷靜。你對Skudis忠誠！

passages.content:
Ah, there you are, . Now that you are ready, please

passages.content_zh:
啊，你來了，。現在你已經準備好了，請

passages.content: <[...]>Ah... Sorry, , I'm not quite ready-[...]

Nonsense. You're here now, so we might as well get on with

passages.content_zh:
廢話。你現在就在這裡，所以我們還是繼續吧

passages.content:
<[...]>(Oh crap. What do I do?

. . .

Maybe if I tuck it backwards, she won't notice?)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（喔糟糕。我該怎麼辦？

。 。 。

也許如果我把它向後塞，她就不會注意到？ ）

passages.content:
You should stay away from me, I don't want to hurt you
again...
passages.content_zh:
你應該離我遠一點，我不想傷害你
又...

passages.content: Please, [...]... Keep away from me, I'm dangerous.
passages.content_zh: 拜託，[...]...離我遠一點，我很危險。

passages.content: Okay, the way is clear! It's now or never-[...]
passages.content_zh: 好吧，路已經暢通了！要嘛現在，要嘛永遠－－[...]

passages.content: <[...]>Hi , what are you doing?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嗨，你在做什麼？

passages.content:
Ah! Where did you come from!?

I'm not doing anything, honest!
passages.content_zh:
啊!你從哪裡來！ ？

我什麼也沒做，老實說！

passages.content: <[...]>Then why are you trying to hide behind this tree?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那你為什麼要躲在這棵樹後面？

passages.content: I... okay you got me...

passages.content:
left her room's window open, so I was trying to sneak
in...
passages.content_zh:
她房間的窗戶開著，所以我想偷偷溜走
在...

passages.content:
The motivations of dryads are beyond the grasp of mortals!
We are one with nature, the voice of the trees-[...]

樹精的動機非凡人所能掌握！
我們與大自然融為一體，樹木的聲音-[...]

passages.content: <[...]>You want to do something perverted with her underwear.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你想用她的內褲做一些變態的事。

passages.content: Pretty much. Please don't tell her.

passages.content:
What about you, , why aren't you training with the

那你呢，為什麼不和
還有其他魔法少女嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>I have a physical exam.

passages.content: The one with the swimming endurance test?

passages.content: Can I watch? I like girls in skimpy swimsuits!
passages.content_zh: 我可以觀看嗎？我喜歡穿緊身泳衣的女孩！

passages.content: Bummer.

<[...]>Besides, it's not skimpy.

<[...]>此外，它並不吝嗇。

這是傳統學校的泳衣。

passages.content: Even better!
passages.content_zh: 甚至更好！

passages.content: <[...]>You still can't watch though!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>不過你還是看不見！

passages.content: Aww.
Really? I guess we're the same.
passages.content_zh: 真的嗎？我想我們是一樣的

passages.content: <[...]>It's nothing like that!
<[...]>I just really need them because... Well it's an emergency.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我真的需要它們，因為...這是緊急情況。

passages.content: Wow, you look so worried. Must be something really urgent.
passages.content_zh: 哇，你看起來很擔心。一定是有什麼非常緊急的事情。

passages.content:
Don't worry, I'll help. It's the least I can do after you saved
me from those bees.
passages.content_zh:
別擔心，我會幫忙的。這是你救了我之後我能做的最起碼的事情
我從那些蜜蜂那裡。

passages.content: Now, will any type of panties do?
passages.content_zh: 現在，任何類型的內褲都可以嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>I guess?
Okay then.
passages.content_zh: 那麼好吧。

passages.content:
lifts her skirt. Her underwear appears to be made
from tied-together leaves.
Before your eyes, she unmakes her floral undergarments
and give you the leaves.
passages.content_zh:
掀起她的裙子。她的內衣似乎是做的
來自綁在一起的葉子。
她在你眼前解開她的花內衣
並給你葉子。

passages.content: Here you go, enjoy~.\I[315]

passages.content: <[...]>Thanks... but why leaves?

passages.content:
But of course, I am a dryad after all. It's more comfortable

passages.content_zh:
但當然，我畢竟是樹妖。這樣比較舒服

passages.content:
Just don't get drunk while trying to pick up a hottie and then

passages.content_zh:
只是不要在嘗試泡妞時喝醉然後

passages.content:
I need to identify the best access point.  might have

passages.content_zh:
我需要確定最佳接入點。  可能有
設置陷阱。

passages.content: <[...]>(Maybe I should come back later when this has worn off...)

passages.content:
<[...]>(After what happened last time, maybe it's not so smart for

passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（經歷了上次的事情之後，也許現在的做法不太明智了
我就是這樣出現的。 ）

passages.content:
You notice a weird glowing symbol on the tree.

Strangely, it does not appear to have been carved, instead
the wood seems to have been somehow reshaped.
