事情並沒有那麼糟。

大多數人的目標都不好。

passages.content: <Nele>Suuurrreee...
passages.content_zh: 〈內萊>好啊…

passages.content:
<Nele>Anyway, the other Magical Girls have already left for practice,
so I guess you can have the day off.

Well, I'm going to take care of some paperwork.
passages.content_zh:
<奈樂>總之，其他魔法少女都已經出發去練習了，
所以我想你可以休息一天。

好吧，我要去處理一些文書工作。

passages.content: Bye, Miss Nele.
passages.content_zh: 再見，內勒小姐。

passages.content: <[...]>Was that a fairy!?

Yes, she's Miss Nele. I made a contract with her to become
a Magical Girl.

She's really nice. I should introduce you to her later, [...].
passages.content_zh:
是的，她就是奈爾小姐。我和她簽訂了契約，成為
魔法少女。

她真的很好。我稍後應該把你介紹給她，[...]。

passages.content:
Wait! [...]? But how!?

Oh no! The extra ticket!
passages.content_zh:
等待！ [...]？但如何！ ？

哦不！額外的門票！

passages.content: [...], you must leave this place quickly!
passages.content_zh: [……]，你趕快離開這裡吧！

passages.content: <[...]>Why? Is it dangerous?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>為什麼？危險嗎？

passages.content:
Yes, because of the Director. She hates men. The last time
she caught a man in the camp, she turned him into a frog.

And then she had frog legs for dinner.
passages.content_zh:
是的，因為導演。她討厭男人。最後一次
她在營地裡抓住了一個人，把他變成了一隻青蛙。

然後她晚餐吃了青蛙腿。

passages.content:
<[...]>*Gulp*

That sounds ominous... but never mind, we have to
calm down and think. What's-[...]
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>*咕嚕咕嚕*

這聽起來很不祥……但沒關係，我們必須
冷靜下來想一想。什麼是-[...]

passages.content: There's no time for calming down!
passages.content_zh: 沒有時間冷靜！

passages.content: I know! Let's go to my room. I can hide you in there.
passages.content_zh: 我知道！我們去我的房間吧。我可以把你藏在那裡。

passages.content: practically drags you into the blue-roofed dorm.
passages.content_zh: 幾乎把你拖進藍頂宿捨了。

passages.content: There you are, . I've been looking for you!
passages.content_zh: 你在那裡，。我一直在找你！

passages.content:
Me? What's the matter?

Is it because of the physical?
passages.content_zh:
我？怎麼了？

是因為體質的原因嗎？

passages.content:
No, of course not, . Why are you still worried about
that?
passages.content_zh:
不，當然不是，。為什麼你還擔心
那個？

passages.content: Well I... you see... I'm shy! Yeah, that's it.
passages.content_zh: 好吧，我...你看...我很害羞！是的，就是這樣。

passages.content:
I see. Anyway, back to the issue at hand. Are you aware of
the camp's policy on Magical Girl teams, ?
passages.content_zh:
我懂了。無論如何，回到手邊的問題。你知道嗎
陣營對魔法少女隊的政策，？

passages.content: Not really.
passages.content_zh: 並不真地。

passages.content:
Once they reach a certain level of experience, Magical Girls
are expected to form teams of four. A counsellor is then
assigned to the team to guide their training.
passages.content_zh:
魔法少女經驗達到一定程度後
預計將組成四人小組。然後是一名輔導員
分配到團隊中指導他們的訓練。

passages.content:
After reviewing your dossier, I believe it's time for you to
join one such team.

So please talk with your peers and try to convince three
girls at about the same level as you to form a team.
passages.content_zh:
在審查了您的檔案後，我相信您是時候了
加入這樣一個團隊。

因此，請與您的同事交談並嘗試說服三個人
和你程度差不多的女孩組成一個團隊。

passages.content:
Oh and before I forget:

As an incentive for you to team up quickly, I'll withdraw
your privilege to request off-camp trips until you do so.
passages.content_zh:
哦，在我忘記之前：

為了激勵你們趕快組隊，我就退出了
在您提出要求之前，您有權申請校外旅行。

passages.content:
I already have 3 team members:

, , and .
passages.content_zh:
我已經有 3 位團隊成員：

、 、 和 。

passages.content:
Is that so? Well done then.

I have some paperwork to take care of, so I will see you
later.
passages.content_zh:
是這樣嗎？那麼乾得好。

我有一些文件需要處理，所以我會見你
稍後。

passages.content: What!? But-[...]

No buts! A team is vital for the continuation of training, so
try not to take too long in forming it.
passages.content_zh:
沒有但是！團隊對於訓練的持續進行至關重要，所以
盡量不要花太長時間來形成它。

passages.content: Shit, things just keep getting more and more complicated!
passages.content_zh: 媽的，事情變得越來越複雜了！

passages.content: Good morning, Miss ! Are you ready for training today?
passages.content_zh: 早安，小姐！今天你準備好訓練了嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Oh, good morning, . You certainly seem excited.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>哦，早安，。你看起來一定很興奮。

passages.content:
Uh-huh! I hardly slept last night thinking about how fun today
was going to be.

Come on, let's get going!
passages.content_zh:
嗯嗯！昨晚我幾乎沒睡著，想著今天有多開心
將會是。

來吧，我們出發吧！

passages.content:
<[...]>Right, uh... Let me make sure everything is ready first.
I\fi did\fr just get out of bed a minute ago, so-[...]
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>對了，呃...我先確認一下一切都準備好了。
我\fi\fr一分鐘前才起床，所以-[...]

passages.content: ...We are going training today, aren't we? You said we would!
passages.content_zh: ……今天我們要去訓練吧？你說過我們會的！

passages.content:
<[...]>Of course we are! I just need to get ready and let my team
know. I can't just disappear and leave them wondering what
happened to me, now can I?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>當然！我只需要做好準備並讓我的團隊
知道。我不能就這麼消失，讓他們想知道什麼
發生在我身上，現在可以嗎？

passages.content:
*Giggle*

Okay, but hurry up!
passages.content_zh:
*咯咯笑*

好的，但是快點！

passages.content: <[...]>We will go training together, yes. But not today.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我們會一起去訓練，是的。但今天不行。

passages.content:
<[...]>My team has something else they need to handle first, but
as soon as that's done, we'll have a training day. Okay?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我的團隊還有其他事情要先處理，但是
一旦完成，我們就會有一個訓練日。好的？

passages.content: This exam is going to be a problem, [...].
passages.content_zh: 這次考試將是一個問題，[...]。

passages.content: <[...]>Huh!? Where'd you come from?
That is not important right now, [...].
passages.content_zh: 現在這並不重要，[...]。

passages.content:
We have to find some way of tricking . If she discovers
who you really are, things will get really bad for both of us.
passages.content_zh:
我們必須找到一些欺騙的方法。如果她發現
你到底是誰，事情對我們兩個來說都會變得非常糟糕。

passages.content:
<[...]>Both of us? What does this have to do with you? I don't even
know your name.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我們兩個？這和你有什麼關係？我甚至不
知道你的名字。

passages.content:
It is... complicated.

I am afraid now is not the time to explain, but if you trust
me, I may be able to help resolve this situation.
passages.content_zh:
這……很複雜。

恐怕現在不是解釋的時候，但如果你相信
我，或許可以幫助解決這個問題。

passages.content:
I know a spell that might help us fool , however it
requires some... unusual components.
passages.content_zh:
我知道一個咒語可以幫助我們愚弄，但是它
需要一些...不尋常的組件。

passages.content: <[...]>What do you need?

A source of magical fire, a bit of alcohol, and... err...
some female undergarments.
passages.content_zh:
魔法之火的來源，一點酒精，還有……呃……
一些女性內衣。

passages.content: <[...]>Come again? What was that last one!?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>再來一次？最後一張是什麼啊！ ？

passages.content:
Panties, we need to get our hands on some panties! Stop
making that face, it is that stupid rule of magical sympathy.
passages.content_zh:
內褲，我們需要得到一些內褲！停止
做出那樣的表情，就是魔法同情的愚蠢規則。

passages.content: Believe me, if I could use something else, I would.
passages.content_zh: 相信我，如果我可以使用其他東西，我會的。

passages.content: <[...]>I can't believe I'm saying this, but...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我不敢相信我會這麼說，但...

passages.content: <[...]>Can't we just use my panties?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我們不能只用我的內褲嗎？

passages.content:
Unfortunately, no. The spell uses the sympathetic
connection between the panties and a girl`s... privates,
to disguise you. Your panties, girly as they are, lack that connection.
passages.content_zh:
不幸的是，沒有。該咒語使用同情心
內褲和女孩私處之間的聯繫，
來偽裝你。你的內褲雖然充滿少女氣息，卻缺乏這種連結。

passages.content: <[...]>...You want me to just steal some girl's panties like a pervert!?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>...你想讓我像變態一樣偷女孩的內褲！ ？

passages.content:
Pretty much.

...Ugh, I wish we did not have to do this.
passages.content_zh:
差不多了。

……呃，我希望我們不必這樣做。

passages.content: <[...]>Why don't we just use your panties, then?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那我們為什麼不直接用你的內褲呢？

passages.content: Because I am not really here, stupid!
passages.content_zh: 因為我並不真正在這裡，笨蛋！

passages.content:
She reaches out to you and her arm goes right through your
chest.
passages.content_zh:
她向你伸出手，她的手臂直接穿過你的
胸部。

passages.content:
Look, just get the components so we can get this over with
as soon as possible.
passages.content_zh:
聽著，只要拿到組件，我們就可以解決這個問題
盡快。

passages.content: <[...]>(She seems to want to help me, but can I trust her?)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（她似乎想幫助我，但我可以相信她嗎？）

passages.content: <[...]>(She said this won't work, so I'll have to use something else.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（她說這不起作用，所以我必須使用其他東西。）

passages.content: <[...]>How about this lantern for the magical fire?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這個魔法火燈籠怎麼樣？

passages.content:
Good thinking, [...], but this spectral fire. It is not compatible
with this spell.
passages.content_zh:
好主意，[...]，但這幽靈之火。不相容
用這個咒語。

passages.content: <[...]>Okay, I'll try something else then.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>好吧，那我試試別的辦法。

passages.content: Did you find everything we need?
passages.content_zh: 你找到我們需要的一切了嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Pretty much.
Great, then we are ready to do this.
passages.content_zh: 太好了，那我們就準備這麼做了。

passages.content: Please use that evil-looking whip to set the panties on fire.
passages.content_zh: 請用那根看起來邪惡的鞭子來點燃內褲。

passages.content: Yes, just like that. Now throw them into the alcohol.
passages.content_zh: 是的，就這樣。現在把它們丟進酒精裡。

passages.content:
The moment the burning panties touch the whiskey, the
mysterious girl starts to make weird gestures.

There is a flash and the panties and whiskey are gone, in
its place now a strange, glowing liquid.
passages.content_zh:
当燃烧的内裤接触到威士忌的那一刻，
神秘女孩開始做出奇怪的手勢。

一道闪光，内裤和威士忌都消失了，在
现在它的位置是一种奇怪的发光液体。

passages.content:
Just drink that potion before the exam and you should have
no problems. And do not worry, the effects are temporary.
passages.content_zh:
只要在考試前喝下那藥水，你就應該
沒問題。不用擔心，影響是暫時的。

passages.content:
Well, I have to go now; it seems I have spent too much
energy.

Bye, [...], we will see each other later.
passages.content_zh:
好吧，我現在得走了；看來我花了太多錢
能量。

再見，[...]，我們稍後再見。

passages.content: She disappears into thin air.
passages.content_zh: 她消失在稀薄的空氣中。

passages.content: <[...]>Not yet.

Please hurry, we have to cast the spell before  gets
suspicious.
passages.content_zh:
請快點，我們必須在得到之前施展咒語
可疑。

passages.content: <[...]>What was it that you need, again?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你又需要什麼？

passages.content:
Alcohol, magical fire, panties!

It is not that hard to remember, or is it!?
passages.content_zh:
酒精、魔火、內褲！

這並不難記住，不是嗎！ ？

passages.content: Are you even taking this seriously?
passages.content_zh: 你還認真對待這件事嗎？

passages.content: As I said, we need alcohol, magical fire, and... panties.
passages.content_zh: 正如我所說，我們需要酒精、魔法之火和…內褲。

passages.content: <[...]>How about this alcohol?

This is too low-quality for the spell. I require something more
refined, or at least much more potent. Rum or whiskey should
be sufficient.
passages.content_zh:
這對於咒語來說品質太低了。我需要更多東西
精緻，或至少更有效。蘭姆酒或威士忌應該
足夠了。

passages.content:
You know, [...], I suspect that as you make progress as a
Magical Girl, you will encounter progressively more dangerous
opponents.
passages.content_zh:
你知道，[...]，我懷疑當你作為一個人取得進步時
魔法少女，你會遇到越來越危險的事情
對手。

passages.content: <[...]>That seems like a pretty safe bet, yeah.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這似乎是一個相當安全的選擇，是的。

passages.content:
I am worried about your lack of any effective defensive
spells.
passages.content_zh:
我擔心你缺乏有效的防守
咒語。

passages.content: <[...]>, I told you before: I don't need your help.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>，我之前就告訴過你：我不需要你的幫助。

passages.content:
<[...]>No offense, but I just don't feel comfortable giving you access
to my brain.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>無意冒犯，但我只是不願意給你訪問權限
到我的大腦。

passages.content: I understand your hesitation, but this is something different.
passages.content_zh: 我理解你的猶豫，但這是不同的。

passages.content:
Have you considered going to the library and doing some
research? Spells can be learned through simple study, after
all.
passages.content_zh:
你有沒有考慮過去圖書館做一些事情
研究？咒語可以透過簡單的學習來學習，之後
所有。

passages.content: <[...]>Huh, that's not a bad idea. I'll check it out soon.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嗯，這不是個壞主意。我很快就會檢查一下。

passages.content: Thank you, [...]. Your safety means so much to me.
passages.content_zh: 謝謝你， [...]。你的安全對我來說意義重大。

passages.content: [...]? May I have a word with you?
passages.content_zh: [...]？我可以跟你說句話嗎？

passages.content: Umm... [...]? May I have a word with you?
passages.content_zh: 嗯...[...]？我可以跟你說句話嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>What's going on?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>發生了什麼事？

passages.content: Well, do you remember any of your dreams from last night?
passages.content_zh: 那麼，你還記得昨晚的夢嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>No, I actually don't.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>不，我其實不知道。

passages.content:
That is because I was up all night fighting them for you...
me. Us.
passages.content_zh:
那是因為我為了你而整夜與他們戰鬥......
我。我們。

passages.content: <[...]>Sure, what's going on?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>當然，發生了什麼事？

passages.content: <[...]>No, actually.
That is because I was up all night fighting them.
passages.content_zh: 那是因為我整晚都在跟他們戰鬥。

passages.content:
What you went through yesterday... the music trial with
, the mental assault from the chief enchantress, the
heavy infusion of transmutation magic... it was a lot to
process.
passages.content_zh:
你昨天經歷了什麼...音樂試驗
，來自首席魔女的精神攻擊，
大量注入轉化魔法……這實在是太難了
過程。

passages.content:
All that raw magical energy and trauma was threatening to
destroy your psyche. Without me intervening, I do not know
if you would think of yourself as a princess, or an octopus,
or...
passages.content_zh:
所有原始的魔法能量和創傷都威脅著
摧毀你的心靈。如果沒有我幹預，我不知道
如果你認為自己是公主或章魚
或者...

passages.content:
Well, you should be able to get it.

Either way, you are welcome... But know that there may
be some lingering side-effects.
passages.content_zh:
嗯，你應該能夠得到它。

不管怎樣，不客氣……但要知道，可能會有
是一些揮之不去的副作用。

passages.content: ...Well, you get the idea.
passages.content_zh: ……嗯，你明白了。

passages.content:
<[...]>Oh, thank you very much. I would hate to go through life
as a squid or something.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>噢，非常感謝。我不想經歷一輩子
例如魷魚什麼的。

passages.content:
Acting on instinct, you give a slight curtsy to  while
you thank her.
passages.content_zh:
出於本能，你向對方行了一個輕微的屈膝禮
你謝謝她。

passages.content:
<[...]>Oh! In that case, thank you? I guess? It sounds like you
saved my life again.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>哦！這樣的話，謝謝？我猜？聽起來像你
再次救了我的命。

passages.content:
You are welcome...

But, well, there may be some lingering side-effects.
passages.content_zh:
不客氣...

但是，可能會有一些揮之不去的副作用。

passages.content:
I negated as much of it as I could, but I do have limits.
I believe some of the sorceress' behavioural modification
magic might have taken root in your mind.
passages.content_zh:
我盡可能地否定它，但我確實有限制。
我相信女巫的一些行為改變
魔法可能已經在你的腦海中紮根了。

passages.content: <[...]>Oh, that's upsetting. But I'm sure you did the best you could.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>哦，這真令人沮喪。但我確信你已經盡力了。

passages.content: <[...]>(Wait, what did I just say!?)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（等等，我剛剛說什麼！？）

passages.content: <[...]>...Oh, I see what you mean.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>...哦，我明白你的意思了。

passages.content: <[...]>! How could you?

I understand your frustration, but ask yourself this:

would you rather have slightly better manners, or forget
how to breathe without gills?
passages.content_zh:
我理解你的沮喪，但問問自己：

你寧願有更好的舉止，還是忘記
沒有鰓怎麼呼吸？

passages.content: <[...]>...And here I was assuming...

I believe I made the best choice I could, given the
circumstances.
passages.content_zh:
我相信我做了最好的選擇
情況。

passages.content:
<[...]>I suppose...

In that case, thank you. Seriously. I appreciate you watching
out for me.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我想...

在這種情況下，謝謝你。嚴重地。我很感謝你的觀看
為我而出。

passages.content: <[...]>And... I'm sorry. I really, really am.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>還有...我很抱歉。我真的真的是。

passages.content:
Oh right, this discussion almost made me forget what you
did to me, what with all that fish sorcery flooding my mind!
passages.content_zh:
喔對了，這個討論差點讓我忘了你說的是什麼
我腦子裡充滿了魚的魔法，對我做了什麼！

passages.content:
<[...]>That too...

Look, is there any way we can go back to being friends?
I know it must suck being stuck with me, but well... I've
done stupid things and I'm truly sorry.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>那也是...

看看，我們有什麼辦法可以重新做回朋友嗎？
我知道和我在一起一定很糟糕，但是…我已經
做了愚蠢的事情，我真的很抱歉。

passages.content: ...I guess this is what people mean by "heartfelt".
passages.content_zh: ……我想這就是人們所說的「真心」吧。

passages.content:
Let me ask you this:

Do you truly understand what you did?
passages.content_zh:
讓我問你這個：

你真正了解自己所做的事情嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>No, I don't think I do.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>不，我不這麼認為。

passages.content:
Then please do not take this the wrong way, but... you can
be very inattentive at times, and also unintentionally cruel.

I understand that you have your own issues to contend with,
and that those are your biggest concern most days.
passages.content_zh:
那麼請不要以錯誤的方式理解這一點，但是......你可以
有時很不專心，而且無意中很殘忍。

我知道你有自己的問題要解決，
這些是您大多數時候最關心的問題。

passages.content:
But in short:

You tried to kill me. I was even willing to put that aside
after I had you drag yourself back to camp so I would not
end up dead.
passages.content_zh:
但簡而言之：

你試圖殺了我。我什至愿意把它放在一边
在我讓你拖著自己回到營地之後我就不會
最終死了。

passages.content:
Yet you\fi still\fr had the audacity later on to trample all over
my feelings! That was the point where I decided you had gone
too far. You cannot demand things of me. Do you understand
this now?
passages.content_zh:
但你\fi還是\fr後來還敢踐踏
我的感受！就在那時我決定你已經走了
太遠了。你不能向我提出任何要求。你明白嗎
現在這個？

passages.content: Then I forgive you.
passages.content_zh: 那我就原諒你了。

passages.content:
Just remember, we may be unlikely partners, but we are still
partners all the same. I rely on your continued well-being
as much as you rely on my knowledge.

It really hurt me to see everything fall apart...
passages.content_zh:
請記住，我們可能不太可能成為合作夥伴，但我們仍然是
夥伴們都一樣。我依靠你持續的幸福
正如您對我的知識的依賴。

看到一切都崩潰了，我真的很難過…

passages.content: <[...]>Thank you, . I promise I'll treat you better from now on.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>謝謝你，。我保證從現在開始我會對你更好。

passages.content: Very well.
As long as we can leave this behind us, we will be fine now.
passages.content_zh: 只要我們能把這個拋在腦後，我們現在就沒事了。

passages.content: 's Affection improved back to neutral.
passages.content_zh: 的好感度恢復到中性。

passages.content: You are very welcome.
passages.content_zh: 非常歡迎您。

passages.content:
...Now, if you will excuse me, I need to digest an absurd
amount of fish sorcery.
passages.content_zh:
……現在，請原諒，我需要消化一件荒謬的事情
魚魔法量。

passages.content: Good morning, ! Ready for another day of…
passages.content_zh: 早安, !準備好迎接新的一天…

passages.content: <[...]>Morning, . You look kind of unhappy... Is something wrong?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>早上，。你看起來有點不高興……有什麼問題嗎？

passages.content:
Of course something's wrong!!!
How could you be so careless?!
passages.content_zh:
當然有問題！ ！ ！
你怎麼可以這麼不小心？ ！

passages.content: <[...]>What? , what are you even talking about?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>什麼？ ，你到底在說什麼？

passages.content:
Ugh…
Not here. Come with me.
passages.content_zh:
呃…
不在這裡。跟我來吧。

passages.content: grabs your wrist and drags you to your dorm's bathroom, ignoring your questions along the way.
passages.content_zh: 抓住你的手腕，把你拖到宿舍的衛生間，一路上無視你的問題。

passages.content:
Huh? !?

What happened to you?
passages.content_zh:
啊？ ！ ？

你怎麼了？

passages.content: One lengthy explanation later...
passages.content_zh: 稍後會進行冗長的解釋...

passages.content: , that's great news!
passages.content_zh: ，這是個好消息！

passages.content: <[...]>Somehow I'm not surprised you're saying that.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你這麼說我並不感到驚訝。

passages.content: Fufufu, yes, I want to see you be even stronger.
passages.content_zh: 呼呼呼，是的，我想看到你變得更強。

passages.content: Say, can you keep that new form permanently?
passages.content_zh: 比如說，你能永久保留這個新表格嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Sadly not.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>遺憾的是沒有。

passages.content: That's too bad.
passages.content_zh: 那太糟糕了。

passages.content: ...For your disguise, I mean.
passages.content_zh: ……我是說，為了你的偽裝。

passages.content: Morning, . Ready for another day?
passages.content_zh: 早晨， 。準備好迎接另一天了嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>Could you please stop always calling me ? My name
is-[...]
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你能別老叫我打電話嗎？我的名字是-[...]

passages.content: Ssshhh! Not out in the open!
passages.content_zh: 噓！不是露天的！

passages.content: Remember: Small. Woodland. Animal!
passages.content_zh: 記住：小。林地。動物！

passages.content:
<[...]>*Sigh*

Fine...
<[...]>Could you tell me a bit more about yourself, ?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>您能告訴我更多關於您自己的資訊嗎？

passages.content: Huh, that's a funny question. What do you want to know?
passages.content_zh: 呵呵，這是一個有趣的問題。你想知道什麼？

passages.content: <[...]>Well, I noticed that you seem to be kind of important.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嗯，我注意到你似乎有點重要。

passages.content: Fufufu, very perceptive, .
passages.content_zh: 呼呼呼，很有洞察力。

passages.content:
They call me the "Lovely Lightning Witch".

I'm considered one of the best, if not THE best, Magical
Girls in history.
passages.content_zh:
他們稱我為「可愛的閃電女巫」。

我被認為是最好的魔法師之一，即使不是最好的
歷史上的女孩。

passages.content:
So far, I've defeated four Magico lords, saved the world twice,
and stopped countless Magico plots.

Of course, that's nothing compared to what mom has done,
but she's been around for way longer.
passages.content_zh:
到目前為止，我已經打敗了四位魔法領主，兩次拯救了世界，
並阻止了無數Magico的陰謀。

當然，與媽媽所做的相比，這算不了什麼，
但她已經存在的時間更長了。

passages.content: <[...]>Wow, that's impressive. You must be really strong.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>哇，太令人印象深刻了。你一定真的很堅強。

passages.content:
That's just because mom's been training me since I was six.
I'm sure that, with some practice, you could be just as strong
as me.
passages.content_zh:
那隻是因為媽媽從我六歲就開始訓練我。
我相信，透過一些練習，你也可以變得同樣強大
就像我一樣。

passages.content:
<[...]>Just one more thing:

Why do they call you the "Lovely Lightning Witch"?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>還有一件事：

為什麼他們稱你為「可愛的閃電女巫」？

passages.content: Because I'm lovely.♥
passages.content_zh: 因為我很可愛♥

passages.content: <[...]>...And humble, too.
<[...]>But I meant the lightning part.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>但我指的是閃電部分。

passages.content: That's because electricity is my specialty. See?
passages.content_zh: 那是因為電是我的專業。看？

passages.content:
spreads her hands and produces electric arcs between
her fingers.
passages.content_zh:
張開雙手並在雙手之間產生電弧
她的手指。

passages.content:
<[...]>Please don't take this the wrong way, , but I just
can't remember when we first met.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>請不要誤解，但我只是
不記得我們第一次見面是什麼時候。

passages.content:
I'm not surprised, as it was ages ago. We last saw each
other when we were around five or so.
passages.content_zh:
我並不感到驚訝，因為那是很久以前的事了。我們最後一次見到每個
其他時候我們大約五歲左右。

passages.content: <[...]>Back when my parents were still together...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>當我父母還在一起的時候...

passages.content:
Yeah, I remember when they split and you moved away...
It wasn't pretty.
passages.content_zh:
是的，我記得他們分手的時候你就搬走了…
這並不漂亮。

passages.content:
<[...]>But if it was so long ago, I'm surprised you'd still remember
me.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>但如果是很久以前的事了，我很驚訝你還記得
我。

passages.content:
Fufufu, there's no way I'd forget you. We played together all
the time back then.
passages.content_zh:
呼呼呼，我不可能忘記你。我們大家一起玩
那時的時光。

passages.content:
<[...]>We didn't do anything like exchange a marriage promise like
in one of those harem anime, right?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我們沒有做任何諸如交換婚姻承諾之類的事情
在那些後宮動漫之一中，對吧？

passages.content: M-M-Marriage promise!?
passages.content_zh: 嗯嗯結婚的約定！ ？

passages.content: Ewww! What the\fb fuck\fr, !? That's just... ewww!
passages.content_zh: 呃！什麼\fb他媽的\fr，！ ？那隻是……呃！

passages.content: <[...]>S-Sorry, ... let's change subjects.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>抱歉，...我們換個話題吧。

passages.content:
Just one more thing, , how's your father doing? Is he
well?
passages.content_zh:
還有一件事，你父親怎麼樣？他是嗎
嗯？

passages.content: <[...]>Dad? He's fine. In fact, he opened a... specialised bakery.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>爸爸？他很好。事實上，他開了一家……專門的麵包店。

passages.content:
A bakery? I remember his sweets were great. I'll have to
visit him next time I'm on Earth.
passages.content_zh:
麵包店？我記得他家的甜點很好吃。我必須
下次我來地球的時候就去拜訪他。

passages.content: <[...]>Please don't, ... The bakery... he...
What? How could you be so nervous about a bakery?
passages.content_zh: 什麼？你怎麼會對麵包店這麼緊張？

passages.content: <[...]>He sells erotic cakes...!
HA! That sounds just like him.
passages.content_zh: 哈！這聽起來很像他。

passages.content: <[...]>*Siiigh*
That was a big sigh. What's the matter, ?
passages.content_zh: 那是一聲巨大的嘆息。怎麼了， ？

passages.content: <[...]>Ever since I got here, I just keep on changing...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>自從我來到這裡，我就一直在改變......

passages.content: ... I'm sorry, but I'm here for you if...
passages.content_zh: ……對不起，但我會在這裡等你，如果...

passages.content:
<[...]>Sometimes when I look in the mirror, I feel like I'm losing
myself, bit by bit.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>有時當我照鏡子時，我感覺自己正在迷失
我自己，一點一滴。

passages.content: Suddenly,  hugs you.
passages.content_zh: 突然，擁抱你。

passages.content: Don't be afraid. You are still you!
passages.content_zh: 別怕。你還是你！

passages.content:
No matter how much you change, I won't let you lose
yourself, alright?
passages.content_zh:
無論你如何改變，我都不會讓你輸
你自己，好嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>I... Thank you...
Okay, enough of that, or people'll start thinking we're a couple.
passages.content_zh: 好吧，夠了，否則人們會開始認為我們是情侶。

passages.content: What's the matter, ? Did something happen?
passages.content_zh: 怎麼了， ？發生什麼事了嗎？

passages.content: You explain the situation with .
passages.content_zh: 你用 解釋一下情況。

passages.content: Her record has been shredded?
passages.content_zh: 她的記錄被撕碎了？

passages.content: <[...]>And burned.
That's no good. Although..
passages.content_zh: 那可不好。雖然..

passages.content: Fufufu, go get .
passages.content_zh: 呼呼呼，去拿吧。

passages.content: You'll see.
passages.content_zh: 你會看到的。

passages.content: I hope you have a good day, .
passages.content_zh: 我希望你有美好的一天，。

passages.content:
<[...]>(The well seems to be dry. There's a small metal hook at
the edge of the well, I could tie something to that.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（井似乎乾了。井裡有一個小金屬鉤
井的邊緣，我可以在上面綁一些東西。 ）

passages.content:
\$
<[...]>(Maybe I should throw some money in, for luck. That might work, right?)
passages.content_zh:
\$
<[...]>（也許我應該投入一些錢，以求好運。這可能有用，對吧？）

passages.content:
\$
Uhmm... I think it's actually bad luck to throw in so little.
passages.content_zh:
\$
嗯……我覺得投入這麼少其實是運氣不好。

passages.content:
\$
<[...]>WHAT? I didn't know there were rules to this! Where I'm from,
it's just a superstition!
passages.content_zh:
\$
<[...]>什麼？我不知道這是有規定的！我來自哪裡，
這只是一種迷信！

passages.content:
\$
Sorry, but Well Spirits need to make a living, too.
passages.content_zh:
\$
抱歉，但 Well Spirits 也需要謀生。

passages.content: You have the awful feeling that you will be less lucky today.
passages.content_zh: 你有一種可怕的感覺，今天你會不那麼幸運。

passages.content:
You have the mysterious feeling that you will be a little luckier
today.
passages.content_zh:
你有一種神秘的感覺，你會幸運一點
今天。

passages.content: <Feminine Voice>OUCH! Are you squidding me!?
passages.content_zh: <女聲>哎喲！你在坑我嗎！ ？

passages.content: You... you heard that voice too, right?
passages.content_zh: 你……你也聽到了那個聲音，對吧？

passages.content: <[...]>I did, and it sounded pretty familiar.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我做到了，而且聽起來很熟悉。

passages.content:
<[...]>(Maybe I should investigate. Who knows who that voice
belongs to... but I'm sure I've heard it before.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（也許我應該調查一下。誰知道那個聲音是誰
屬於...但我確信我以前聽過。 ）

passages.content: I heard some strange noises from the well.
passages.content_zh: 我聽到井裡傳來一些奇怪的聲音。

passages.content: <[...]>Strange noises?

Yes, an odd mixture of sobbing, bubbling, and a distinctly
feminine voice.
passages.content_zh:
是的，是抽泣、冒泡和明顯的哭聲的奇怪混合體。
女性的聲音。

passages.content: <[...]>(Maybe I should investigate. It could be an enemy.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（也許我應該調查一下。它可能是一個敵人。）

passages.content: Errr... ?
How should I put this... You have a bad case of camel toe.
passages.content_zh: 我該怎麼說呢...你的駱駝趾病很嚴重。

passages.content: <[...]>Great! That means the thong is working as intended.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>太棒了！這意味著丁字褲正在按預期工作。

passages.content: If you say so...
passages.content_zh: 如果你這麼說的話...

passages.content: I wonder what it was...
passages.content_zh: 我想知道那是什麼...

passages.content:
You find  drinking something from a large bottle inside
a brown paper bag.
passages.content_zh:
你發現裡面有一個大瓶子在喝東西
一個棕色紙袋。

passages.content:
*Hic*... Oh hi , do *hic*... do you need to *hic*...
talk with your counsellor?
passages.content_zh:
*呃呃*…喔嗨，做*呃呃*…你需要*呃呃*…嗎？
和你的輔導老師談談嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Are you drinking already? But it's so early in the morning!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你已經喝酒了嗎？不過現在還這麼早啊！

passages.content: Yeah.
Oh, don't make that face, Evelynne.
passages.content_zh: 哦，別露出那種表情，伊芙琳。

passages.content: <[...]>"Evelynne"?

Sorry, , your face kind of looks like my last husband's
when he was still a Magical Girl...
passages.content_zh:
抱歉，你的臉有點像我上一任丈夫
當他還是魔法少女的時候…

passages.content: <[...]>...Come again?
Oh shit, the bottle's empty! That means it's coming!
passages.content_zh: 糟糕，瓶子空了！這意味著它來了！

passages.content: <[...]>What's coming?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>接下來會發生什麼事？

passages.content: <[...]>Are you okay?

Shut up!

Can't you see I'm having a killer hangover!?
passages.content_zh:
住口！

你沒看到我宿醉得很厲害嗎！ ？

passages.content: And it's over.
passages.content_zh: 一切都結束了。

passages.content: <[...]>Just like that!?

Yes, once I stop drinking, I pretty much sober up almost
instantly... but I still sort of go through the whole hangover
thing.
passages.content_zh:
是的，一旦我停止喝酒，我幾乎就清醒了
立即...但我仍然經歷了整個宿醉過程
事。

passages.content:
It's about as bad as a normal hangover, but compressed into
thirty seconds or so.
passages.content_zh:
它和正常的宿醉一樣糟糕，但被壓縮為
三十秒左右。

passages.content: <[...]>Sounds bad. Why do you even drink?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>聽起來很糟。為什麼還要喝酒？

passages.content:
That's a very good question which I hope to have an answer
for some day.
passages.content_zh:
這是一個非常好的問題，我希望得到答案
有一天。

passages.content:
Fortunately one of the perks of immortality is that I have a
lot of time to think about things.
passages.content_zh:
幸運的是，永生的好處之一是我擁有
有很多時間思考事情。

passages.content: By the way~.
passages.content_zh: 順便說一下~。

passages.content: Hello, . Do you need anything?
passages.content_zh: 你好， 。你需要什麼嗎？

passages.content:
Ah, the same question everybody asks. Yes, I am immortal.

And it's not just the usual kind of immortality where you don't
age, oh no. As far as I can tell, nothing can keep me down
for long.
passages.content_zh:
啊，大家都问同样的问题。是的，我是不朽的。

这不仅仅是通常意义上的永生
年齡，哦不。据我所知，没有什么可以让我沮丧
很長一段時間。

passages.content: <[...]>That's amazing, how did you-[...]
Stop right there!
passages.content_zh: 就停在那裡！

passages.content:
I know what you're going to ask, so let me just say this right
now: you don't want this!
passages.content_zh:
我知道你要問什麼，所以我就直接說吧
現在：你不要這個！

passages.content:
Sure, absolute immortality sounds great on paper, but let
me tell you this: things still hurt.
passages.content_zh:
當然，絕對的永生在紙上聽起來很棒，但讓
我告訴你：事情仍然很痛。

passages.content:
First there's the physical pain. I heal quickly, but it still hurts
like hell when I get injured, and as I don't die, wounds can
always get worse.
passages.content_zh:
首先是身體上的疼痛。我痊癒得很快，但還是很痛
當我受傷時就像地獄一樣，因為我不會死，傷口會
總是變得更糟。

passages.content:
And then there are the long, lonely nights when I think about
all the people I've lost...
passages.content_zh:
然後就是漫長而孤獨的夜晚，當我想到
所有我失去的人...

passages.content:
Anyway, even if I knew why I am like this, I wouldn't tell
you.
passages.content_zh:
反正就算我知道自己為什麼會這樣 我也不會說出來
你。

passages.content: <[...]>So you don't know why you're immortal?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>所以你不知道為什麼你能永生？

passages.content:
I don't, but it seems it's inheritable. 's already showing
early signs of it...
passages.content_zh:
不知道，不過好像是可以遺傳的。已經顯示了
它的早期迹象...

passages.content: <[...]>Could you tell me a bit more about the camp?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>您能告訴我更多有關營地的資訊嗎？

passages.content:
The camp is one of the few places where new Magical Girls
can learn the ropes before going face to face against the
Magicos.
passages.content_zh:
該營地是新魔法少女為數不多的地方之一
可以在面對面對抗之前先熟悉訣竅
魔術師。

passages.content:
I got the idea of opening the camp when I noticed how low
the average life expectancy of new Magical Girls is.
passages.content_zh:
當我注意到營地的溫度有多低時，我萌生了開設營地的想法
新魔法少女的平均壽命是。

passages.content:
To make the camp, I took pieces of many different worlds
that had almost been destroyed by the Magicos.

I then combined them to create this pocket plane.
passages.content_zh:
為了搭建這個營地，我收集了許多不同世界的碎片
幾乎已經被魔法師摧毀了。

然後我將它們組合起來創造了這架袖珍飛機。

passages.content:
With the exception of a few portals, the camp is a completely
separated space from the rest of the multiverse. It's the
perfect place to train.
passages.content_zh:
除了一些傳送門外，營地完全是一個
將空間與多元宇宙的其餘部分分開。這是
完美的訓練場所。

passages.content:
Well, Magicos come in all kinds of shapes and sizes, but deep
down they're all the same.

They're hungry, that's why they attack.
passages.content_zh:
嗯，Magicos 有各種形狀和大小，但深度
下來都是一樣的。

他們餓了，這就是他們攻擊的原因。

passages.content: <[...]>They eat people!?

In a way. Each Magico feeds by doing something different
to its victims.
passages.content_zh:
在某種程度上。每个 Magico 都通过做不同的事情来进食
給它的受害者。

passages.content:
Usually this transforms them into their minions, which then
help it find more food, but there're also a few that literally
eat people.
passages.content_zh:
通常這會將他們轉變為他們的爪牙，然後
幫助它找到更多食物，但也有一些確實
吃人。

passages.content: <[...]>That sounds terrible.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這聽起來很糟。

passages.content: It's even worse than you think.
passages.content_zh: 情況比你想像的還要糟糕。

passages.content:
If you leave Magicos alone, they'll just keep on feeding and
changing people without stopping. They're like a virus.
passages.content_zh:
如果你讓 Magicos 獨自一人，他們就會繼續進食並
不停地改變人。他們就像病毒一樣。

passages.content:
I've been to worlds where everyone was wiped out.

It's awful to walk through empty cities where the only
living things are the minions they left behind.
passages.content_zh:
我去過一個所有人都被消滅的世界。

穿過空蕩蕩的城市是很糟糕的，那裡唯一的
生物是它們留下的奴才。

passages.content: <[...]>But where do they come from?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>但是它們從哪裡來？

passages.content:
Every Magico is created by Arcanos, the first and greatest
Magico.
passages.content_zh:
每個 Magico 都是由 Arcanos 創建的，Arcanos 是第一個也是最偉大的
魔術師。

passages.content: <[...]>So if we take out Arcanos, the Magicos will be done for?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>所以如果我們幹掉阿卡諾斯，魔法師就完蛋了？

passages.content:
Do you think we didn't try that?

We once sent a whole\fi army\fr of Magical Girls against
Arcanos.
passages.content_zh:
你認為我們沒有嘗試過嗎？

我們曾經派出一整支\fi軍隊\fr的魔法少女去對抗
阿卡諾斯。

passages.content: It a was disastre. Only two came back...
passages.content_zh: 這是一場災難。只有兩個人回來了...

passages.content: <[...]>What do you know about Arcanos?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你對阿卡諾斯了解多少？

passages.content:
It's incredibly powerful, but do you know what's funny?

Unlike most Magicos, it's not sapient. Heck, it's barely
sentient even.
passages.content_zh:
它非常強大，但你知道有什麼有趣的嗎？

與大多數 Magicos 不同，它沒有智慧。咳咳，還勉強
甚至有知覺。

passages.content:
It just creates Magicos the same way an insect builds a really
complex hive out of instinct.

In a way that's worse than the evil overlord we were
expecting.
passages.content_zh:
它只是創造 Magicos，就像昆蟲建造一個真正的
出於本能的複雜蜂巢。

在某種程度上，這比我們曾經的邪惡霸主還要糟糕
期待。

passages.content:
That thing is like something out of a Lovecraft novel, or a
force of nature.

You can't negotiate with it and you can never know what it
will do next.
passages.content_zh:
那東西就像洛夫克拉夫特小說裡的東西，或者
大自然的力量。

你無法與它談判，你永遠不知道它是什麼
接下來會做。

passages.content: I started training  before she was even ten.
passages.content_zh: 我在她十歲前就開始訓練了。

passages.content:
At first she didn't want to be a Magical Girl, so sometimes...
I had to be forceful. I don't think she'll ever forgive me.
passages.content_zh:
起初她並不想成為魔法少女，所以有時候…
我必須用力。我想她永遠不會原諒我。

passages.content:
Why am I even telling you this!?

Tsk, you look so much like Evelynne, it makes me lower
my defences.
passages.content_zh:
我为什么要告诉你这个！

嘖，你長得很像伊芙琳，這讓我心情低落
我的防禦。

passages.content: <[...]>Who was Evelynne?
She was 's... father?
passages.content_zh: 她是……父親？

passages.content:
It's a bit complicated.

Evelynne was a member of my team. At first I thought she
was a typical dumb valley girl.
passages.content_zh:
這有點複雜。

伊芙琳是我團隊的成員。一開始我以為她
是個典型的啞巴谷姑娘。

passages.content:
Then I got to know her and discovered she was also a slut,
and not only that, but she also swung both ways.
passages.content_zh:
後來認識了她，發現自己也是個蕩婦，
不僅如此，她還左右搖擺。

passages.content:
One of her powers was shape-shifting, which suited her just
fine, since it allowed her to transform into a man to pick up
girls.
passages.content_zh:
她的能力之一是變形，這正好適合她
好吧，因為這讓她變身為男人來接
女孩們。

passages.content:
I really hated Evelynne at first, but with time, we became
good friends.
passages.content_zh:
一開始我真的很討厭伊芙琳，但隨著時間的推移，我們變得
好朋友。

passages.content:
Anyway, back then my party consisted of me, , Claire,
and Evelynne.
passages.content_zh:
無論如何，當時我的聚會由我、克萊爾組成，
和伊芙琳。

passages.content:
Everything was perfect until we underestimated a powerful
Magico. Claire died in that fight and Evelynne got seriously
injured.
passages.content_zh:
一切都很完美，直到我們低估了一個強大的力量
魔術師。克萊爾在那場戰鬥中喪生，伊芙琳受到嚴重打擊
受傷了。

passages.content:
She spent the next couple of days shape-shifting uncontrollably
until she ended up stuck in her male form.
passages.content_zh:
接下來的幾天她無法控制地變形
直到她最終陷入男性形態。

passages.content:
We tried everything, but we simply weren't able to restore
Evelynne's magic.
passages.content_zh:
我們嘗試了一切，但根本無法恢復
伊芙琳的魔法。

passages.content:
A few years later I broke a promise I made to myself years
before and fell in love again.

This time with male Evelynne.
passages.content_zh:
幾年後我違背了多年來對自己許下的承諾
以前並再次墜入愛河。

這次是與男性伊芙琳。

passages.content: Our marriage was good until our daughters were born.
passages.content_zh: 在我們的女兒出生之前，我們的婚姻一直都很美好。

passages.content:
You see, , a Magical Girl's power depends on her affinity
for fairy magic, and that affinity passes down in the family.

The affinity of our twins was off the charts.
passages.content_zh:
你看，魔法少女的力量取決於她的親和力
對於仙女魔法，這種親和力在家族中傳承下來。

我們雙胞胎的親和力超乎想像。

passages.content:
I saw the possibility of creating the most powerful soldiers
that ever fought in this damned war, but Evelynne said they
should find their own way.
passages.content_zh:
我看到了創造最強大士兵的可能性
曾經參加過這場該死的戰爭，但伊芙琳說他們
應該找到自己的路。

passages.content:
One day, she left with the both of them, but , who was
always the disobedient one, ran from her father to go to a
friend's birthday.
passages.content_zh:
有一天，她帶著兩人離開，可是，誰是
總是不聽話的，從她父親身邊跑到一個
朋友的生日。

passages.content: <[...]>That's quite the story.
Why am I telling you all of this?
passages.content_zh: 我為什麼要告訴你這一切？

passages.content: <[...]>Do you feel any regret about it?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你對此感到遺憾嗎？

passages.content:
No. It was a small price to pay for the millions of lives
 has saved.
passages.content_zh:
不。對數百萬人的生命來說，這只是一個小小的代價
 已儲存。

passages.content: <[...]>Millions?

Oh yes.  is just that powerful; she has singlehandedly
defeated Magicos that would've given my old party trouble.
passages.content_zh:
哦是的。  就是這麼強大；她憑一己之力
擊敗了Magicos，這會給我的老隊伍帶來麻煩。

passages.content:
<[...]>...Just one more question, did you ever find out what happened
to Evelynne and your other daughter?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>...還有一個問題，你知道發生了什麼事嗎
給伊芙琳和你的另一個女兒？

passages.content:
Yes, they died in a traffic accident.

I had  do the autopsies, she confirmed it was them.
passages.content_zh:
是的，他們死於交通事故。

我進行了屍檢，她確認是他們。

passages.content: You seem worried. Did something happen?
passages.content_zh: 你看起來很擔心。發生什麼事了嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>It's about the head librarian...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這是關於圖書館館長的...

passages.content:
And what did Ariana do this time? Accidentally reveal your
deepest, darkest secret?
passages.content_zh:
阿麗亞娜這次做了什麼？一不小心暴露了你的
最深、最黑暗的秘密？

passages.content:
<[...]>Wh-What??? Dark secret??? Hah, I don't have... any of
those...
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>什-什麼？ ？ ？黑暗秘密？ ？ ？哈哈，我沒有…任何一個
那些...

passages.content:
She does that sometimes. I suggest you try not to think
around her if you can.
passages.content_zh:
她有時會這樣做。我建議你盡量不要去想
如果可以的話，圍繞在她身邊。

passages.content: <[...]>I see... Anyway, I'm here because she's missing.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我明白了...不管怎樣，我來這裡是因為她失蹤了。

passages.content:
Eh, it'll be fine. She probably just lost track of time while
reading.
passages.content_zh:
嗯，會沒事的。她可能只是忘了時間
閱讀。

passages.content:
<[...]>But  says she's been gone for a long time
now.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>但說她已經離開很久了
現在。

passages.content:
Ugh, don't listen to her. That slimegirl's a bit on the paranoid
side.
passages.content_zh:
呃，別聽她的。那個史萊姆女孩有點偏執
邊。

passages.content:
<[...]>, this seems serious. I even searched for her
in the Sealed Archives.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>，這看起來很嚴重。我甚至還去找過她
在密封檔案館裡。

passages.content:
*Sigh*

...Fine.
snaps her fingers.
passages.content_zh: 她打響指。

passages.content: What are your orders, my Lady?
passages.content_zh: 夫人，您有何吩咐？

passages.content: <White Shinobi Catgirl>Nyaaa?
passages.content_zh: <白忍貓女>喵啊？

passages.content: Ariana has gone missing again. Find her!
passages.content_zh: 阿麗亞娜再次失蹤。找到她！

passages.content: As you command.
passages.content_zh: 照你的命令。

passages.content: <White Shinobi Catgirl>Nya!
passages.content_zh: <白忍貓女>喵！

passages.content: <[...]>Who- No, what were those?
My nekomata shinobi. I saved them when they were kittens.
passages.content_zh: 我的貓又忍耐。當他們還是小貓的時候我救了他們。

passages.content:
Some asshole decided to drown them in a river. Of course,
back then they were just normal cats... It's a long story.
passages.content_zh:
某個混蛋決定把他們淹死在河裡。當然，
那時它們只是普通的貓......這是一個很長的故事。

passages.content:
Anyway, don't worry about Ariana. They'll find her...
eventually.
passages.content_zh:
無論如何，不用擔心阿麗亞娜。他們會找到她...
最終。

passages.content: What do you want?
passages.content_zh: 你想要什麼？

passages.content:
<[...]>I want to talk things over. This nonsense has gone on for
too long.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我想談談事情。這種廢話已經持續了
太長了。

passages.content: Oh yeah? I'm just getting started!
passages.content_zh: 哦，是嗎？我才剛開始！

passages.content: <[...]>I want the cores you stole back.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我想要你偷回來的核心。

passages.content: Then why don't you try to take them from me?
passages.content_zh: 那你為什麼不試著把它們從我身邊奪走呢？

passages.content: <[...]>I want to end this nonsense between us!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我要結束我們之間的這種廢話！

passages.content: That's fine by me. Let's settle it here and now!
passages.content_zh: 對我來說沒問題。我們現在就在這裡解決吧！

passages.content: readies her sword.
passages.content_zh: 準備好她的劍。

passages.content: Ready to get your ass kicked again?
passages.content_zh: 準備好再次被踢了嗎？

passages.content: Don't think things will turn out like last time!
passages.content_zh: 別以為事情會像上次一樣！

passages.content: <[...]>Bring it on!
Enough!

passages.content_zh: 世界衛生大會-？ [...]

passages.content:
What the hell are you girls doing!? I hope you two weren't
thinking of fighting in camp, were you!?
passages.content_zh:
你們這些女孩到底在做什麼！ ？我希望你們兩個不是
你想在營地裡戰鬥嗎？

passages.content: Well... you see... we...
<[...]>We weren't fighting. We were just having a little discussion...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我們沒有打架。我們只是進行了一些討論...

passages.content:
*Sigh*

...Things have been so tense ever since I had to stop all
home trips.
passages.content_zh:
*嘆息*

……自從我不得不停止一切以來事情就變得如此緊張
回家旅行。

passages.content:
Alright, listen up. I'm planning something to give you girls
a chance to relax. It's not as good as a trip home, but I think
it'll help you blow off some steam.
passages.content_zh:
好吧，聽著。我正在計劃給你們女孩們一些東西
一個放鬆的機會。雖然不如回家，但我想
它會幫助你發洩一些蒸氣。

passages.content:
<[...]>Blow off some steam?

(I've got a bad feeling about this...)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>發洩一下？

（我有種不好的預感…）

passages.content: Yes, . We're going camping!
passages.content_zh: 是的， 。我們要去露營！

passages.content: <[...]>...But we're already in a camp.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>...但我們已經在營地了。

passages.content: Not this kind of camp.
passages.content_zh: 不是這樣的營地。

passages.content:
I'm thinking of a relaxing week away from here, like a
camping trip to the woods.
passages.content_zh:
我想離開這裡度過輕鬆的一周，就像
去树林里露营。

passages.content: I'll pass. I just want to graduate as soon as possible so I-[...]
passages.content_zh: 我會通過。我只是想盡快畢業，所以我-[...]

passages.content:
Listen here, you little brat! I went through a lot of trouble
setting this trip up. So whether you like it or not...
passages.content_zh:
聽著，你這個小傢伙！我經歷了很多麻煩
安排這次旅行。所以不管你喜不喜歡...

passages.content:
We. Are. Going!

And you are going to enjoy yourselves! Understood!?
passages.content_zh:
我們。是。去！

你會玩得很開心的！明白了！ ？

passages.content:
*Gulp*

Y-Yes, ma'am...
passages.content_zh:
*咕嚕咕嚕*

是、是的，女士…

passages.content: Good. Besides, I'm sure you'll love it.
passages.content_zh: 好的。此外，我相信您會喜歡它。

passages.content: <[...]>So when is this trip?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那麼這次旅行是什麼時候？

passages.content: In three days, so you better get packing today.
passages.content_zh: 三天后，所以你今天最好收拾行李。

passages.content:
Oh, but don't worry about tents and food. That's already
accounted for.
passages.content_zh:
哦，但不用擔心帳篷和食物。那已經是
佔。

passages.content: <[...]>This is a bit sudden...
It'll be fine. How much stuff do you really need to pack?
passages.content_zh: 會沒事的。您真正需要打包多少東西？

passages.content:
<[...]>...Now that I think about it, I don't really own much of anything
anymore, do I?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>...現在想起來，我並沒有真正擁有任何東西
我不再這樣了嗎？

passages.content:
That's what I wanted to hear. Travel light and enjoy the
journey!

Now make sure to wake up bright and early three days
from now.
passages.content_zh:
這就是我想聽到的。輕裝出行，享受
旅程！

現在確保三天早起
從現在開始。

passages.content: You spend the rest of the day getting ready for the camping trip.
passages.content_zh: 您將在這一天剩餘的時間為露營之旅做準備。

passages.content:
<[...]>(Huh. I guess  was right. I had surprisingly
little to pack.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（嗯。我想是對的。我有令人驚訝的
包裝很少。 ）

passages.content:
<[...]>(Luckily I'll be staying in a tent with , , and
. That makes things so much easier...)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（幸運的是我會和 、 、 一起住在帳篷裡
。這讓事情變得容易多了......）

passages.content: <[...]>(I could go to work today.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（我今天可以去上班。）

passages.content:
You clutch the coin purse  gave you.

Immediately, you feel the portal charge up and shortly after
you are teleported.
passages.content_zh:
你抓緊了給你的零錢包。

立即，您會感覺到門戶充電，不久之後
你被傳送了。

passages.content:
I've already prepared the portal for you. Just step through
and you'll find yourself in the staff room of Kapuchu Anime
in Detroit.
passages.content_zh:
我已經為你準備好了門戶。只需邁出一步
你會發現自己身處卡普丘動漫的員工室
在底特律。

passages.content:
Also, take this coin purse.\I[1151]

You can hold it over the teleporter to return after your shift
is over. And don't worry, it's automatic, no need to chant a
spell or anything.
passages.content_zh:
另外，帶上這個零錢包。 \I[1151]

您可以將其放在傳送器上方以便在輪班後返回
結束了。別擔心，它是自動的，不需要念誦
咒語或任何東西。

passages.content: <[...]>Thank you.
<[...]>But why a coin purse?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>但是為什麼是零錢包呢？

passages.content:
Because obviously you'll earn real money there, so it doubles
as both that and your ticket back home.

Make sure not to lose it.
passages.content_zh:
因為顯然你會在那裡賺到真錢，所以它會翻倍
作為您回家的機票。

確保不要丟失它。

passages.content: Well then, have a nice trip.
passages.content_zh: 那麼，祝你旅途愉快。

passages.content: You walk through the gate, eager to find out what awaits you.
passages.content_zh: 你走進大門，渴望知道等待著你的是什麼。

passages.content: You hesitate a little before stepping through the gate.
passages.content_zh: 在踏進大門之前，你猶豫了一會兒。

passages.content: <[...]>Uhm, Director ? You gave me this flyer...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>呃，導演？你給了我這張傳單...

passages.content: Ah, yes! Are you ready for some work?
passages.content_zh: 啊，是的！你準備好做一些工作了嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Work? You mean right now?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>工作？你是說現在？

passages.content: <[...]>Work? You mean... right now?
Yeah. I can send you there if you're ready.
passages.content_zh: 是的。如果你準備好的話我可以送你去那裡。

passages.content: <[...]>Yes, I'm ready.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>是的，我準備好了。

passages.content: <[...]>I'm not sure I'm ready.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我不確定我是否準備好。

passages.content: Aww, chin up, it's easy. Let's go.
passages.content_zh: 哇，抬起頭來，這很容易。我們走吧。

passages.content: Nope!
Finally! What took you so long!?
passages.content_zh: 最後！你怎麼花了這麼久！ ？

passages.content:
<[...]>Not so loud! And it was only five minutes. That's a pretty
incredible amount of time to go from sleeping peacefully to
dressed and ready for combat.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>別那麼大聲！而且只有五分鐘。這是一個漂亮的
從平靜的睡眠到令人難以置信的時間
穿戴整齊，做好戰鬥準備。

passages.content: <[...]>Especially since I have to wear this ridiculous getup...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>特別是因為我必須穿上這件可笑的衣服......

passages.content: <[...]>Especially now that I have to dress like this...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>尤其是現在我必須穿成這樣...

passages.content:
<[...]>How did you get into our building anyway? That door is locked
each night.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你是怎麼進入我們大樓的？那扇門鎖著
每個晚上。

passages.content:
Oh, Director  gave me a key when I first arrived. She
was under the impression I'd be staying in the camp's housing.
passages.content_zh:
哦，我剛來的時候，主任給了我一把鑰匙。她
我的印象是我会住在营地的宿舍里。

passages.content: Thankfully, a much more appropriate option was available.
passages.content_zh: 值得慶幸的是，有一個更合適的選擇。

passages.content:
Now, are you done asking pointless questions?  is getting
away as we speak!
passages.content_zh:
現在，你問完了毫無意義的問題嗎？  正在得到
就在我們說話的時候離開！

passages.content:
What did you see exactly? How do you know she's up to
something?
passages.content_zh:
你到底看到了什麼？你怎麼知道她準備好
東西？

passages.content:
I have cameras and motion sensors mounted outside her
dorm, feeding me video at all times. Isonei informed me the
moment she saw the pest slip out.
passages.content_zh:
我在她体外安装了摄像头和运动传感器
宿舍裡一直餵我吃影片。伊索內告訴我
當她看到害蟲溜出來的那一刻。

passages.content:
Considering her secrecy, this is something we can't afford
to ignore. So can we go now, PLEASE?
passages.content_zh:
考慮到她的保密性，這是我們承受不起的
忽略。那我們現在可以走了嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>I'm convinced. Let's go track down that ninja!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我確信。我們去追蹤那個忍者吧！

passages.content: That's what I wanted to hear!
passages.content_zh: 這就是我想聽到的！

passages.content: <[...]>...No. I don't care. I'm going back to bed.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>...不。我不在乎。我要回去睡覺了。

passages.content: WHAT???
Minion, how dare you show such insolence!?
passages.content_zh: 小奴，你竟敢如此無禮！ ？

passages.content:
<[...]>It's not insolence. It's sleepiness. This is a stupid idea. Now
is a stupid time to be awake. And I am going back to bed.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>這不是無禮。這是瞌睡。這是一個愚蠢的想法。現在
這是一個愚蠢的清醒時間。我要回去睡覺了。

passages.content:
I can't believe this...! , , you're with me on this,
right?
passages.content_zh:
我不敢相信這件事......！ , , 在這件事上你和我站在一起
對嗎？

passages.content:
Mm. I'm already awake, and snooping on  sounds pretty
fun to me.
passages.content_zh:
毫米。我已經醒了，窺探聲音很美
對我來說很有趣。

passages.content:
I'm not sure how fun it sounds... but I really don't like the
idea of her hitting us with any more surprises.
passages.content_zh:
我不確定這聽起來有多有趣……但我真的不喜歡
希望她能帶給我們更多驚喜。

passages.content:
See, minion? Everyone else agrees this is a good idea. Can
we go now, before we miss the opportunity?
passages.content_zh:
看到了嗎，小小兵？其他人都同意這是一個好主意。可以
我們現在就走，免得錯過機會？

passages.content: <[...]>...Fine. But I'm still not happy about it.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>...好。但我還是不高興。

passages.content:
You'll change your tune once we catch that filthy burglar by
surprise! Now let's go!
passages.content_zh:
一旦我們抓住那個骯髒的竊賊，你就會改變你的態度
驚喜！現在我們走吧！

passages.content:
<[...]>Look, if you three are committed to this idea, go for it. Be
my guests. But as for me, I'll see you all in a few hours for
training.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>看，如果你們三個都致力於這個想法，那就去做吧。是
我的客人。但對我來說，幾個小時後我就會見到你們
培訓。

passages.content:
Traitor! Back on Itone you'd be bound, beaten, and branded
for such laziness!
passages.content_zh:
叛徒！回到 Itone 你會被捆綁、毆打和烙印
為了這樣的懶惰！

passages.content: ...Really?
Grrr...
Come on. We'll be stealthier without her.
passages.content_zh: 快點。沒有她我們會更隱密。

passages.content: <[...]>Have fun...
There, you should be safe in here.
passages.content_zh: 在那裡，你在這裡應該很安全。

passages.content:
<[...]>Whoa, slow down, .
What the hell is going on!?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>哇，慢點，。
到底是怎麼回事！ ？

passages.content:
Sorry, [...], I know this must be very
confusing. I'll try to answer any questions you have.
passages.content_zh:
抱歉，[...]，我知道這一定很
令人困惑。我會盡力回答您的任何問題。

passages.content:
We are cute magical warriors that protect the innocent
from evil interdimensional creatures called Magicos.
passages.content_zh:
我們是可愛的魔法戰士，保護無辜者
來自稱為 Magicos 的邪惡跨維度生物。

passages.content: <[...]>Magicos?

They're monsters from another dimension that invade
defenceless worlds and transform the inhabitants into their
slaves.
passages.content_zh:
他們是來自另一個維度的入侵的怪物
毫無防備的世界，並將居民轉變為他們的
奴隸。

passages.content:
Magical Girls make contracts with fairies to get the power to
fight the Magicos.
passages.content_zh:
魔法少女與妖精們簽訂契約，獲得力量
與魔法師戰鬥。

passages.content:
In exchange for our services, the fairies grant us
performance bonuses and even real wishes.
passages.content_zh:
作為對我們服務的交換，仙女們授予我們
績效獎金甚至是真實的渴望。

passages.content: <[...]>The fairies grant those when you agree to the contracts?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>當你同意契約時仙女們就會賜予這些？

passages.content:
No, performance bonuses are granted for, you know,
good performances during and after training.
passages.content_zh:
不，績效獎金是授予的，你知道，
訓練期間和訓練後都有良好的表現。

passages.content:
Wishes on the other hand are for graduated Magical Girls only,
and granted after we defeat a certain number of live, or
"unsealed", Magicos.
passages.content_zh:
另一方面，願望只針對畢業的魔法少女，
並在我們擊敗一定數量的活體後授予，或者
“解封”，Magicos。

passages.content:
It's a punch card system, like when you get free meals
at a fast food place.
passages.content_zh:
這是一個打卡系統，就像你獲得免費餐點一樣
在快餐店。

passages.content: <[...]>So graduated Magical Girls get wish cards to fill out?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>所以畢業的魔法少女們需要填寫願望卡嗎？

passages.content: Exactly. You collect enough stamps, you get a wish.
passages.content_zh: 確切地。你收集了足夠的郵票，你就能實現一個願望。

passages.content:
We call it the Magical Camp. It's a place where new
Magical Girls train and learn how to fight Magicos.
passages.content_zh:
我們稱之為魔法營。這是一個充滿新意的地方
魔法少女們訓練並學習如何對抗魔法師。

passages.content:
It's a bit like a summer camp crossed with a boot
camp and a boarding school.
passages.content_zh:
這有點像夏令營與靴子交叉
營隊和一所寄宿學校。

passages.content: <[...]>But where are we, ?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>但是我們在哪裡？

passages.content:
Well, that's kind of hard to explain. This place exists inside
a huge ward, so we are basically in another world... kind
of. It's complicated!
passages.content_zh:
嗯，這有點難解釋。這個地方存在於裡面
一個巨大的病房，所以我們基本上是在另一個世界......善良
的。情況很複雜！

passages.content:
She runs the Magical Camp.

The Director... well, she isn't very nice.
passages.content_zh:
她經營魔法營。

導演……嗯，她不太好。

passages.content: <[...]>And she doesn't like men?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>她不喜歡男人？

passages.content:
Not a bit, but to tell you the truth, she doesn't like women
much, either.
passages.content_zh:
不是一點點，但是說實話，她不喜歡女人
也很多。

passages.content:
I don't know what she will do if she catches you, but it won't
be pleasant.
passages.content_zh:
我不知道如果她抓住你她會做什麼，但不會的
令人愉快。

passages.content: Great, now we have to find a way to send you back to Earth.
passages.content_zh: 太好了，現在我們必須找到方法將你送回地球。

passages.content:
But only the Director or Miss Nele can open the portal, and
I don't know how long I can keep you hidden.
passages.content_zh:
但只有總監或奈勒小姐才能打開傳送門，並且
我不知道我還能把你藏起來多久。

passages.content: <[...]>Maybe I can disguise myself?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>也許我可以偽裝自己？

passages.content:
[...], everybody in the camp is either a Magical Girl or a
familiar, and I don't think we can disguise you as the latter...
passages.content_zh:
[...]，營地裡的每個人不是魔法少女，就是
很熟悉，而且我認為我們無法將你偽裝成後者......

passages.content: <???>Yes, that would be very hard indeed.
passages.content_zh: <???>是的，那確實很難。

passages.content: ...!? How did you-[...]

Notice that you let a boy into the camp, in clear violation of
the rules? Why, I just saw you trying - very badly by the
way - to sneak him into your room.
passages.content_zh:
請注意，你讓一個男孩進入營地，這明顯違反了
規則？為什麼，我剛剛看到你在努力——非常糟糕
方法——把他偷偷溜進你的房間。

passages.content: But... I thought everybody was out practising.
passages.content_zh: 但是……我以為大家都出去練習了。

passages.content:
Duh! I'm already a full-fledged Magical Girl.

I don't need to practice.
passages.content_zh:
呃！我已經是個真正的魔法少女了。

我不需要練習。

passages.content:
But really, , you were the last one I would have
expected to see trying to sneak a boy into her room.
passages.content_zh:
但說實話，你是我最後一個擁有的人
預計會看到一個男孩試圖偷偷溜進她的房間。

passages.content:
I guess what they say is true:

the apple doesn't fall far from the tree.
passages.content_zh:
我想他們說的是真的：

蘋果不會落到離樹太遠的地方。

passages.content: No, it's nothing like that...
passages.content_zh: 不，不是那樣的…

passages.content: Some explanations later.
passages.content_zh: 稍後進行一些解釋。

passages.content: Oh? I see. It was an accident.
passages.content_zh: 哦？我懂了。這是一次意外。

passages.content: <[...]>Do you think the Director will understand?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你認為主任會理解嗎？

passages.content: Hell no, that bitch's crazy!
passages.content_zh: 天啊不，那個賤人瘋了！

passages.content: Then what are we going to do?
passages.content_zh: 那我們該怎麼辦呢？

passages.content: Simple, we'll just turn [...] into a Magical Girl.
passages.content_zh: 很簡單，我們只是把[...]變成一個魔法少女。

passages.content: Watch. And. Learn.
passages.content_zh: 手錶。和。學習。

passages.content:
Voilà! We now have everything we need to make a girl out
of [...] right here!
passages.content_zh:
瞧！我們現在擁有培養女孩所需的一切
[...]就在這裡！

passages.content: <[...]>Wait a minute! You want me to dress in drag!?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>等一下！你想讓我穿女裝！ ？

passages.content:
Would you prefer to be turned into some kind of small
woodland creature by the Director?
passages.content_zh:
你願意變成某種小東西嗎？
導演的林地生物？

passages.content: <[...]>Small what?
Well, that's not the only choice.
passages.content_zh: 嗯，這不是唯一的選擇。

passages.content: starts counting with her fingers.
passages.content_zh: 開始用手指數數。

passages.content:
Sometimes, she turns people into farm animals, statues,
maids-[...]
passages.content_zh:
有時，她會把人變成農場動物、雕像，
女僕-[...]

passages.content: <[...]>Okay okay, I'll do it!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>好吧好吧，我會做的！

passages.content: Great! Makeup time!♥
passages.content_zh: 偉大的！化妝時間！ ♥

passages.content:
Now, let's see...

We're going to need to give you a nice, girlish figure, some
pads for breasts, and...
passages.content_zh:
現在，讓我們看看...

我們需要給你一個漂亮的、少女般的身材，一些
乳房墊，以及...

passages.content:
What about this dress, ?

It's so cute!♥
passages.content_zh:
這件衣服怎麼樣？

真是太可愛了！ ♥

passages.content: Excellent choice, .
passages.content_zh: 絕佳的選擇，.

passages.content:
Hmm, the hair's all wrong... Well, we can just use a wig.
I think blonde would look nice.
passages.content_zh:
嗯，頭髮不對……好吧，我們只能用假髮了。
我覺得金髮女郎會很好看。

passages.content:
The two girls spend hours forcing you into different dresses.

After they are satisfied with their choices, Isabelle sits you
in front of the vanity table she conjured and applies several
layers of makeup to your face.
passages.content_zh:
這兩個女孩花了幾個小時強迫你穿上不同的衣服。

當他們對自己的選擇感到滿意後，伊莎貝爾會為您安排座位
在梳妝台前，她召喚並應用了幾個
為你的臉塗上一層層的妝容。

passages.content: Behold! The birth of a new Magical Girl!
passages.content_zh: 看哪！新魔法少女誕生！

passages.content: Incredible!
passages.content_zh: 極好的！

passages.content: <[...]>I look ridiculous...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我看起來很可笑...

passages.content: You think so, ? I think you look very cute.
passages.content_zh: 你也這麼認為嗎？我覺得你看起來很可愛。

passages.content:
? No, that name just won't cut it for a Magical Girl.

Let's see, from now on you're going to be... yes, .♥
passages.content_zh:
？不，這個名字根本不適合魔法少女。

讓我們看看，從現在開始你將...是的，.♥

passages.content: Remember it, unless you want to-[...]
passages.content_zh: 記住它，除非你想-[...]

passages.content:
? No, that name just won't cut it for a Magical Girl.

Let's see, from now on you're going to be...
passages.content_zh:
？不，這個名字根本不適合魔法少女。

讓我們看看，從現在開始，你將成為...

passages.content: You can't use your real name while in disguise, punk!
passages.content_zh: 偽裝時不能使用你的真名，朋克！

passages.content: Are you daft!? You can't use your real name while in disguise!
passages.content_zh: 你是傻子嗎！ ？偽裝時不能使用真名！

passages.content:
works!♥

Remember it, unless you want to-[...]
passages.content_zh:
有效！ ♥

記住它，除非你想-[...]

passages.content: <[...]>Be turned into a small woodland creature. I get it.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>變成小型林地生物。我得到它。

passages.content: Good. Good.
passages.content_zh: 好的。好的。

passages.content: I hope you enjoy the camp, .
passages.content_zh: 我希望你喜歡這個夏令營。

passages.content:
Thank you, , but why are you helping us? Normally, you
just-[...]
passages.content_zh:
謝謝你，但是為什麼要幫助我們呢？通常情況下，你
只是-[...]

passages.content:
Act as the Director's right hand?

Well, she might be crazy, but she's still my mother. Loyalty
is to be expected.
passages.content_zh:
充當導演的左膀右臂？

好吧，她可能瘋了，但她仍然是我的母親。忠誠度
是可以預料的。

passages.content: The thing is that  and I go a long way back.
passages.content_zh: 事情是這樣的，我已經走了很長一段路了。

passages.content: <[...]>Huh? We do?

I'm not surprised you don't remember, but don't worry. I'm
sure I'll be able to jog your memory eventually.
passages.content_zh:
你不記得我並不感到驚訝，但別擔心。我是
當然我最終能夠喚起你的記憶。

passages.content:
Also, feel free to use that red box over there for your stuff.

It can hold a lot, so put in whatever you want.
passages.content_zh:
另外，請隨意使用那邊的紅色盒子來存放您的東西。

它可以裝很多東西，所以想放什麼就放什麼。

passages.content: Oh, I almost forgot...
passages.content_zh: 哦，我差點忘了…

passages.content: <[...]>What was that? My skin feels weird all of a sudden.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那是什麼？我的皮膚突然覺得很奇怪。

passages.content:
Oh, just a simple depilatory spell. After all, we can't have a
Magical Girl with hairy legs. Ugh.
passages.content_zh:
哦，只是一個簡單的除毛咒。畢竟我們不能擁有一個
腿上長毛的魔法少女。啊。

passages.content: And you won't have to worry about shaving this way.
passages.content_zh: 這樣您就不必擔心剃鬚問題了。

passages.content:
That magic has permanently removed all your hair below your
eyelashes.
passages.content_zh:
這個魔法已經永久地去除了你下面的所有頭髮
睫毛。

passages.content: What a convenient spell!
passages.content_zh: 多麼方便的咒語！

passages.content: <[...]>P-Permanently!?

Don't make that face; it was necessary! Anyway, beards are
out of style these days.
passages.content_zh:
別露出那種表情；這是必要的！無論如何，鬍子是
這些天已經過時了。

passages.content:
Now, I should tell you something about that makeup I put on
you...
passages.content_zh:
現在，我應該告訴你一些關於我化的妝的事情
你...

passages.content: <[...]>Please don't tell me that's permanent as well...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>請不要告訴我這也是永久的...

passages.content:
No, no, don't worry! It\fi is\fr magical, but it will fade by itself
in three or four weeks.
passages.content_zh:
不，不，別擔心！它\fi很\fr神奇，但它會自行消失
三四個星期後。

passages.content:
Anyway, I'm going to fudge the camp's papers a bit to register
 as a new Magical Girl trainee.

She can be your roommate, .
passages.content_zh:
無論如何，我要偽造一下營地的文件來註冊
 作為新的魔法少女練習生。

她可以成為你的室友，。

passages.content: Awesome! I've never had a roommate before.
passages.content_zh: 驚人的！我以前從未有過室友。

passages.content: <[...]>Hey! I am a\fi he!\fr
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嘿！我是\fi他！ \fr

passages.content: I wonder for how long.♥
passages.content_zh: 我想知道要多久。 ♥

passages.content: <[...]>What a strange dream that-[...]

Good morning, sleepyhead. Rise and shine!

Come on, you have to get into your disguise.
passages.content_zh:
早安，瞌睡蟲。崛起並閃耀！

來吧，你必須喬裝打扮。

passages.content:
<[...]>*Sigh*

I wish it was a dream.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>*嘆氣*

我希望這是一個夢。

passages.content: Ready for your first day as a Magical Girl in training?
passages.content_zh: 準備好迎接魔法少女修行的第一天了嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Not a bit.
I know that feeling, but don't worry. It's pretty easy.
passages.content_zh: 我知道這種感覺，但別擔心。這很容易。

passages.content: <[...]>What do we have to do?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我們必須做什麼？

passages.content:
There are a bunch of dungeons around the camp with
captured Magicos sealed inside. The Magicos can't leave,
but they have a lot of minions.
passages.content_zh:
營地周圍有很多地牢
捕獲了封印在裡面的Magicos。魔術師不能離開
但他們有很多奴才。

passages.content:
Our training consists of entering the dungeon, fighting our
way to the Magico, and defeating it.
passages.content_zh:
我們的訓練包括進入地牢、與我們的敵人戰鬥
通往Magico的路，並擊敗它。

passages.content: <[...]>Annnd how do we fight them?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我們該如何對抗他們？

passages.content: With our magic, which... Oh!
passages.content_zh: 憑藉我們的魔法，這……喔！

passages.content: <[...]>Which\fi I don't have\fr.

Well, I guess we can just stay in the camp until I manage to
send you back. It's going to delay my progress in becoming
a full Magical Girl, but-[...]
passages.content_zh:
好吧，我想我們可以留在營地，直到我設法
送你回去。這會耽誤我的進步
一個完整的魔法少女，但是—[...]

passages.content: THAT is a TERRIBLE idea!
passages.content_zh: 這是一個可怕的想法！

passages.content: If you two start skipping training, everyone will get suspicious.
passages.content_zh: 如果你們兩個開始跳過訓練，每個人都會產生懷疑。

passages.content:
<[...]>But I am just a normal guy. How do you expect me to fight
monsters?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>但我只是個普通人。你指望我如何戰鬥
怪物？

passages.content:
Fufufu, I am way ahead of you on that, .

Look at this: \I[422].
passages.content_zh:
Fufufu，在這一點上我遠遠領先你。

看看這個：\I[422]。

passages.content: <[...]>...A novelty wand?

You can't be a Magical Girl without some kind of magical
weapon. It's also pretty heavy, so you can just smack your
enemies with it.
passages.content_zh:
沒有某種魔法就不可能成為魔法少女
武器。它也很重，所以你可以輕輕拍打你的
與它為敵。

passages.content: <[...]>That doesn't seem very magical to me.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這對我來說似乎不太神奇。

passages.content:
Look, this was the best I could do. Just stand behind
and bonk any Magico that comes too close, okay?
passages.content_zh:
聽著，這是我能做的最好的事了。就站在後面
然後把任何太近的 Magico 打死，好嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>*Sigh*

I guess I have no choice...
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>*嘆氣*

我想我別無選擇...

passages.content: <[...]>Ouch! It shocked me!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>哎呀！令我震驚！

passages.content:
Probably just static electricity.

Good luck! And, who knows? Maybe you'll pick up some
magic along the way.♥ Fufufu.
passages.content_zh:
可能只是靜電。

祝你好運！而且，誰知道呢？也許你會挑選一些
一路上充滿魔力。 ♥ 福福福。

passages.content:
Tutorial time!

In this game, days are divided into three parts.
passages.content_zh:
輔導時間！

在這個遊戲中，日子分為三個部分。

passages.content:
During the first part, you can walk around the camp and
interact with the other Magical Girls. Some events may
raise Affection, which can prove beneficial in a variety of
ways.
passages.content_zh:
在第一部分中，您可以在營地周圍散步並
與其他魔法少女互動。有些事件可能
培養感情，這在很多方面都是有益的
方式。

passages.content:
The second part begins when you leave the camp to explore
a dungeon. Expect fights against a selection of enemies; each
Magico has different preferences regarding minions as well as
their own tactics and tricks.
passages.content_zh:
第二部分從你離開營地去探索時開始
一個地牢。期待與精選的敵人進行戰鬥；每個
Magico 對小兵有不同的偏好
他們自己的戰術和技巧。

passages.content:
The last part begins when you leave the dungeon by either
defeating the Magico, using the exit, or being defeated. It is
quite similar to the first part, but different people might be
present during that time.
passages.content_zh:
當你透過以下任一方式離開地牢時，最後一部分開始
擊敗 Magico、使用出口或被擊敗。它是
與第一部分非常相似，但不同的人可能會
在那段時間存在。

passages.content:
Try to find a way to escape the camp, or maybe make new
friends, but remember: do NOT get caught!
passages.content_zh:
試著尋找逃離營地的方法，或尋找新的營地
朋友們，但請記住：不要被抓住！

passages.content: We have a problem, a big problem!
passages.content_zh: 我們有一個問題，一個大問題！

passages.content: <[...]>Calm down, , things can't be that bad.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>冷靜點，事情不會那麼糟。

passages.content: You don't understand, . I screwed up, you have to-[...]
passages.content_zh: 你不明白，。我搞砸了，你必須-[...]

passages.content:
Excuse me, I hope you don't mind if I let myself in, but the
door was open.
passages.content_zh:
對不起，我希望你不介意我讓自己進去，但是
門是開著的。

passages.content: Huh! !?
? I wasn't expecting to find you here.
passages.content_zh: ？我沒想到會在這裡找到你。

passages.content: I was just about to tell the new girl about the physical exam.
passages.content_zh: 我正要告訴新來的女孩體檢的事。

passages.content:
Your enthusiasm in helping the new recruits is commendable,
, but I can assure you, I can handle her orientation
myself just fine.
passages.content_zh:
您對新進員工幫助的熱情值得讚揚，
，但我可以向你保證，我可以處理她的方向
我自己就好了。

passages.content:
Also, you are needed in the field.

There has been a Magico outbreak in New Zealand, so you
are to deploy immediately.
passages.content_zh:
此外，該領域也需要您。

紐西蘭爆發了 Magico 疫情，所以你
立即部署。

passages.content: That was an\fi order\fr, !
passages.content_zh: 這是一個\fi訂單\fr，！

passages.content: Yes Ma'am.
passages.content_zh: 是的，女士。

passages.content:
Now that this is out of the way, let us return to the business
at hand.

My name is , and I'm one of the camp's administrators.
passages.content_zh:
既然這個問題已經解決了，那就讓我們回到正題吧
就在手邊。

我的名字是，我是營地的管理員之一。

passages.content: <[...]>Nice to meet you, I'm-[...]

I already know who you are, . Handling new Magical
Girls' paperwork is part of my job.
passages.content_zh:
我已經知道你是誰了，。處理新的魔法
女孩的文書工作是我工作的一部分。

passages.content:
Which leads us to the problem at hand:

There's an irregularity in your paperwork, . It's
nothing too serious, but I would like to get this out of the
way now.
passages.content_zh:
這引出了我們手邊的問題：

你的文書工作有違規之處。這是
沒什麼太嚴重的，但我想把它從
現在就這樣。

passages.content: <[...]>I see, so what's the problem?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我明白了，那有什麼問題嗎？

passages.content:
It seems you haven't had the mandatory physical exam.

Like I said, it's nothing too important. Still, we need to
assess your physical capabilities.
passages.content_zh:
看來你還沒有進行強制體檢。

就像我說的，這沒什麼太重要的。儘管如此，我們還是需要
評估您的身體能力。

passages.content: <[...]>...Physical exam!?

It only consists of a couple simple measurements and basic
physical tests. It's nothing to warrant such a reaction.
passages.content_zh:
它仅包含几个简单的测量和基本的
物理測試。没有什么值得这样的反应。

passages.content:
Ah, I almost forgot... there's also a swimming endurance
test. I took the liberty of procuring you a swimsuit: \I[855].
passages.content_zh:
啊，我差點忘了…還有游泳耐力
測試。我冒昧地買了一件泳衣給你：\I[855]。

passages.content: Don't worry, , I'll help you pass your exam.
passages.content_zh: 別擔心，我會幫你通過考試的。

passages.content:
It's not that kind of exam, . And even if you could help,
there's no way I would let you skip training.
passages.content_zh:
這不是那種考試。即使你能幫忙，
我不可能讓你跳過訓練。

passages.content: No buts! I'll make sure you leave for training today!
passages.content_zh: 沒有但是！我保證你今天就去參加訓練！

passages.content:
Now if you'll excuse us. , please don't forget to bring
your swimsuit for the exam.
passages.content_zh:
現在請原諒我們。 ，請別忘記帶上
你考試用的泳衣。

passages.content: <[...]>But there's no way I can disguise myself with this!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>但是我沒辦法用這個來偽裝自己！

passages.content: Good morning girls, have you slept well?
passages.content_zh: 早安，女孩們，睡得好嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>I'm not a girl!
Let's not concern ourselves with minor details.
passages.content_zh: 我們不要關心小細節。

passages.content: Whatever.

Anyway, it's been noticed that  and  have been
training with you.
passages.content_zh:
無論如何，已經注意到並且已經
和你一起訓練。

passages.content:
With you and , you now have a full team, so it's time
to assign a counselor to you gals.
passages.content_zh:
有了你和 ，你現在已經擁有了一個完整的團隊，所以是時候了
為你們指派一名輔導員。

passages.content:
<[...]> already told me about it, but why're you so
happy about this?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>已經告訴我了，但你為什麼這樣
對此感到高興嗎？

passages.content:
Fufufu. Normally counselors are assigned randomly using
a computer, but when Nele wasn't watching, I fudged with
the program to make sure I would be assigned to your team.
passages.content_zh:
呼呼呼。通常輔導員是隨機分配的
一台電腦，但當內勒不看的時候，我就胡編亂造
確保我被分配到你們團隊的計劃。

passages.content:
That's great, ! With you as our counsellor, things are
going to be easier for us.
passages.content_zh:
那太棒了， ！有你作為我們的顧問，事情就這樣了
對我們來說會更容易。

passages.content: <[...]>Yeah, that's really a relief for once.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>是的，這次確實讓人鬆了一口氣。

passages.content: takes out a large envelope.
passages.content_zh: 拿出一個大信封。

passages.content: Time for the official announcement.
passages.content_zh: 到了官方公佈的時間了。

passages.content: She opens the envelope dramatically.
passages.content_zh: 她戲劇性地打開信封。

passages.content: Fufufu, and "the counselor assigned to Team 48 is..."
passages.content_zh: 呼呼呼，“48隊的輔導員是…”

passages.content: "Director "!?
Thank you very much for announcing me, .
passages.content_zh: 非常感謝您宣布我，。

passages.content: Mom? But how? I was supposed to be-[...]
passages.content_zh: 媽媽？但如何呢？我本來應該是－－[...]

passages.content:
I noticed what you did with the computer, so I did a little
hacking myself.
passages.content_zh:
我注意到你對電腦做了什麼，所以我做了一點
駭客攻擊我自己。

passages.content: ...But why?
passages.content_zh: ……但為什麼？

passages.content:
Because you've been a bit too friendly with , so I figured
you'd go easy on her.
passages.content_zh:
因為你對 有點太友善了 所以我想
你會對她很寬容。

passages.content: But why you instead of Nele or ?
passages.content_zh: 但為什麼是你而不是內勒或？

passages.content:
Because  reminds me of... a person I met some time
ago.
passages.content_zh:
因為讓我想起...我曾經見過的一個人
以前。

passages.content: But... but...
passages.content_zh: 但是……但是……

passages.content:
Don't worry, , it's not the first time I've mentored a team
of Magical Girls.
passages.content_zh:
別擔心，這不是我第一次指導團隊
魔法少女組。

passages.content: Now then. ?
passages.content_zh: 現在那麼。 ？

passages.content:
I'm preparing some special training for you and your friends.
It's taking a bit longer than I was hoping, but it should be
fully prepared in a few days.
passages.content_zh:
我正在為你和你的朋友們準備一些特別的訓練。
比我希望的要長一點，但應該是
幾天之內就做好了充分的準備。

passages.content: So be ready for it, okay?
passages.content_zh: 所以做好準備吧，好嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>Special training?

What kind of special training?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>特殊訓練？

什麼樣的特殊訓練？

passages.content: It's a surprise.
passages.content_zh: 這是一個驚喜。

passages.content:
Well then, shall we go, ? I don't want to disrupt their
daily routine more than we have to.
passages.content_zh:
那麼，我們走吧？我不想打擾他們
日常生活比我們必須做的還要多。

passages.content: Yes mom.
Yes, ? Wait, I mean, .
passages.content_zh: 是的， ？等等，我的意思是，。

passages.content:
<[...]>So, I just pretend I am a Magical Girl until we get a chance
to send me back?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>所以，我只是假裝我是一個魔法少女，直到我們有機會
送我回去嗎？

passages.content:
Pretty much.

Don't worry, we should be able to get a new exit ticket
sooner or later.
passages.content_zh:
差不多了。

別擔心，我們應該可以拿到新的出境票
遲早。

passages.content:
<[...]>*Sigh*

Let's hope it'll be that simple.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>*嘆氣*

我們希望事情會這麼簡單。

passages.content:
The other Magical Girls don't like me very much because of
my... background, so I've never had a roommate before.
passages.content_zh:
其他魔法少女不太喜歡我是因為
我的……背景，所以我以前從未有過室友。

passages.content: I'm so happy! This is like getting my own team.
passages.content_zh: 我太高興了！這就像擁有自己的團隊一樣。

passages.content:
Soon, we'll be fighting together and supporting each other
during our free time when our struggles get in the way of
our personal lives, and go shopping together and-[...]
passages.content_zh:
很快，我們就會並肩作戰，互相支持
在我們的空閒時間，當我們的掙扎妨礙了我們
我們的個人生活，一起去購物，然後-[...]

passages.content: <[...]>You do know this is temporary, right?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你知道這是暫時的，對吧？

passages.content:
We can call ourselves the "Cutie Knights". We're going to be
the greatest Magical Girl team since-[...]
passages.content_zh:
我們可以稱自己為「可愛騎士」。我們將會成為
自以來最偉大的魔法少女團隊-[...]

passages.content: It's going to be awesome!
passages.content_zh: 將會非常棒！

passages.content: <[...]>(It's no use; she's in her own world.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（沒用；她沉浸在自己的世界。）

passages.content:
Well, we spent a lot of time getting you ready, so I guess
it's time for dinner.
passages.content_zh:
好吧，我們花了很多時間讓你做好準備，所以我想
吃晚餐了。

passages.content:
Normally, I just make food with my magic. If you want to,
you're free to join me.

But if you prefer, you could eat at the cafeteria with the
other Magical Girls.
passages.content_zh:
平常我只是用魔法做食物。如果你願意的話，
你可以自由地加入我。

但如果你願意的話，你可以在自助餐廳吃飯
其他魔法少女。

passages.content:
I got a roommate and somebody's going to eat with me.
This is the best day ever!
passages.content_zh:
我有一個室友，有人要跟我一起吃飯。
這是有史以​​來最好的一天！

passages.content:
conjures a small, but pleasant meal. You spend the
time making small talk.

 listens to your descriptions of your everyday life with
the amazement of a little girl.
passages.content_zh:
讓人想起一頓小而愉快的飯菜。您花費
閒聊的時間。

 聆聽您對日常生活的描述
一個小女孩的驚訝。

passages.content:
So you all just get together and have fun? Wow, that's
amazing!

Please tell me more of these "pubs".
passages.content_zh:
所以你們就聚在一起玩得開心嗎？哇，那是
太棒了！

請告訴我更多關於這些「酒吧」的資訊。

passages.content: <[...]>...Just how sheltered were you?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>...你受到的庇護程度如何？

passages.content: You spend a long time talking with  before going to bed.
passages.content_zh: 睡前你會花很長時間說話。

passages.content:
Yes, [...]? Wait, I mean,
.
passages.content_zh:
是的， [...]？等等，我的意思是，
。

passages.content: You want to know more about me?
passages.content_zh: 你想多了解我嗎？

passages.content: I've led a pretty normal life, so there really isn't much to tell.
passages.content_zh: 我過著很正常的生活，所以沒什麼好說的。

passages.content: My family? Well, for the most part, it was only my sisters.
passages.content_zh: 我的家人？嗯，大多數情況下，只有我的姊妹們。

passages.content:
<[...]>Just your sisters?

What happened to your parents?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>只是你的姊妹？

你的父母怎麼了？

passages.content:
Mother abandoned us when I was young. As for my father...
well, mother likes to... she...-[...]
passages.content_zh:
在我很小的時候，母親就拋棄了我們。至於我的父親...
好吧，媽媽喜歡...她...-[...]

passages.content:
She likes to be friendly with a lot of men... I never knew
who...
passages.content_zh:
她喜欢和很多男人友好相处……我从来不知道
誰...

passages.content: <[...]>Sorry, , I didn't mean to open old wounds.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>抱歉，我無意揭開舊傷。

passages.content: It's okay, [...], you couldn't have known.
passages.content_zh: 沒關係，[...]，你不可能知道。

passages.content:
Anyway, I was raised mostly by my older sisters.

It was hard without parents, but they were smart, so we
managed to have a comfortable life.
passages.content_zh:
無論如何，我主要是由姐姐們撫養長大的。

沒有父母的日子很艱難，但他們很聰明，所以我們
設法過著舒適的生活。

passages.content:
I tried to follow my sisters' examples, but I just didn't have
