必須找到方法讓你長高一點。

passages.content: <[...]>I want to be as tall as I used to be!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我想要像以前一樣高！

passages.content: Fufufu, don't worry, I know what I'm doing.
passages.content_zh: 呼呼呼，別擔心，我知道我在做什麼。

passages.content:
<[...]>Sometimes you sound about as honest as
a used car salesman.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>有時你聽起來像
二手車推銷員

passages.content: That was scary, but we made it back.
passages.content_zh: 這很可怕，但我們還是回來了。

passages.content: <[...]>Was the bag really necessary?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這個包真的有必要嗎？

passages.content:
Sorry [...], but there are things
back there that you are better off not
seeing.
passages.content_zh:
抱歉[...]，但是有些事情
回到那裡你最好不要
看到。

passages.content: <[...]>Is that why your mother is a total psycho?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這就是你母親徹底變態的原因嗎？

passages.content:
No, she was always like that, but how did
mother catch you, [...]?
passages.content_zh:
不，她一直都是這樣，但是怎麼會這樣呢？
媽媽抓住你了，[...]？

passages.content: <[...]>I wrote a letter and...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我寫了一封信並且...

passages.content: One long explanation later.
passages.content_zh: 稍後進行長篇解釋。

passages.content: Oh no, you mean it was because of me?
passages.content_zh: 喔不，你的意思是因為我？

passages.content:
<[...]>I was worried about how you started to
withdraw from everybody.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我很擔心你是如何開始的
遠離所有人。

passages.content:
I was trying to protect you...
Remember, I almost killed you when we
kissed.
passages.content_zh:
我本來是想保護你的...
記住，我們的時候我差點殺了你
親吻了。

passages.content:
<[...]>Wasn't that just an accident?
Wait, do you mean all of your kisses are
like that?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>這不是意外嗎？
等等，你的意思是你所有的吻都是
就這樣？

passages.content:
Not necessarily. In theory, I should be
able to control it, but I messed up
because... you know...
passages.content_zh:
未必。理論上我應該是
能夠控制，但我搞砸了
因為...你知道...

passages.content: ...it was my first time.
passages.content_zh: ……這是我第一次。

passages.content: <[...]>Then just be more careful next time.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那就下次小心點吧。

passages.content: is twiddling her fingers.
passages.content_zh: 正在擺弄她的手指。

passages.content: Next time...
passages.content_zh: 下次...

passages.content: But I might lose control again, what if...
passages.content_zh: 但我可能會再次失去控制，如果…

passages.content: <[...]>We will deal with it then.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我們會處理它。

passages.content:
<[...]>Now please, just go back to your old
cheery self.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>现在请回到你原来的状态
開朗的自己。

passages.content: ...Okay, I will try. Oh, and [...]?
passages.content_zh: ……好吧，我會嘗試的。哦，還有[...]？

passages.content:
Thank you, nobody ever did anything like
that for me before.
passages.content_zh:
謝謝，沒有人做過這樣的事
以前對我來說。

passages.content:
<[...]>Guess I'm really stuck here.
But at least I made up with .
That's worth something, right?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我想我真的被困在這裡了。
但至少我和好了。
那是值得的，對吧？

passages.content: I'll get her, maybe she can help.
passages.content_zh: 我去找她，也許她能幫忙。

passages.content:
<[...]>*Sigh*
I ended up stuck here again. What am I going to do now?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>*嘆氣*
我最後又被困在這裡了。我現在要做什麼？

passages.content: I'll get , maybe she can help.
passages.content_zh: 我會去的，也許她能幫忙。

passages.content: One explanation later.
passages.content_zh: 稍後再解釋。

passages.content: <[...]>...and that's how I got back in the camp.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>...我就是這樣回到營地的。

passages.content:
I see. I wish you'd told me before you'd returned to Earth,
I might've been able to help.
passages.content_zh:
我懂了。我希望你在返回地球之前告訴我
我也許能幫上忙。

passages.content: Do you think we can get another ticket?
passages.content_zh: 你認為我們可以再買一張票嗎？

passages.content:
There's no way mother will let a student use the gate until
she finds out where that Gloomwing came from.
passages.content_zh:
媽媽不可能讓學生使用大門，直到
她查出了幽暗之翼的由來。

passages.content: <[...]>Damn it!
Isn't there some way to convince ?
passages.content_zh: 難道就沒有辦法說服嗎？

passages.content: Well, there is a way...
passages.content_zh: 嗯，有辦法...

passages.content: <[...]>I don't like that face...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我不喜歡那張臉...

passages.content:
[...] just has to graduate and then become a certified
Magical Girl.
passages.content_zh:
[...] 只需要畢業，然後成為認證人員
魔法少女.

passages.content: But won't that take a long time?
passages.content_zh: 但這不會需要很長時間嗎？

passages.content:
No, not necessarily. Normally, it would take about a year or two,
but your team's been blowing away all expectations.
passages.content_zh:
不，不一定。一般情況下需要一兩年的時間
但你的團隊卻超越了所有人的期望。

passages.content: Really? I had no idea we're doing so well.
passages.content_zh: 真的嗎？我不知道我們做得這麼好。

passages.content:
Yes, Nele and the others don't want you to know, but there's
been a lot of talk about you.
passages.content_zh:
是的，內勒和其他人不想讓你知道，但有
關於你的談論很多。

passages.content: It's just a matter of time until mom makes you full Magical Girls.
passages.content_zh: 媽媽讓你成為完整的魔法少女只是時間問題。

passages.content: Yay! We're going to graduate!
passages.content_zh: 耶！我們要畢業了！

passages.content: <[...]>That's all well and good...

<[...]>But I'm male! Don't you think that might pose a little problem
for my future career as a Magical Girl?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>但我是男性！你不覺得這可能會帶來一點問題嗎
為了我未來的魔法少女生涯？

passages.content: I thought you're a girl? What with the lack of...
passages.content_zh: 我以為你是女孩？缺乏什麼...

passages.content: <[...]>Biologically male. I'm pretty sure that part didn't change yet.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>生物學上的男性。我很確定那部分還沒改變。

passages.content:
<[...]>Well, maybe I'm fully female in that other form. I don't know
for sure.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>好吧，也許我在另一種形態下是完全的女性。我不知道
當然。

passages.content: <[...]>So yeah, that might be a problem, right?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>所以是的，這可能是個問題，對吧？

passages.content: One would think so, since magic's a bit picky about genetics, but...
passages.content_zh: 人們會這麼認為，因為魔法對遺傳學有點挑剔，但…

passages.content:
<[...]>But I'm a guy! Don't you think that might pose a little problem
for my future career as a Magical Girl?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>但我是男人！你不覺得這可能會帶來一點問題嗎
為了我未來的魔法少女生涯？

passages.content:
To be honest? Not really. You've been hiding it well so far,
it should be no problem to keep it up just a bit longer.
passages.content_zh:
說實話？並不真地。到現在為止你都隱藏得很好
堅持久一點應該沒問題。

passages.content: Yeah, 's right. You make for a really convincing girl.
passages.content_zh: 是的，沒錯。你真是一個令人信服的女孩。

passages.content: <[...]>Well thanks, I'm trying to... but...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嗯，謝謝，我正在嘗試...但是...

passages.content:
<[...]>Look, I'm still getting weird stares from some people.
 being my counsellor doesn't do wonders to my
psyche, either.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>看，我仍然受到一些人奇怪的目光。
 成為我的顧問並不會為我帶來奇蹟
心理也一樣。

passages.content: <[...]>You know well enough how she can be.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你很清楚她會是什麼樣子。

passages.content: Errr... yes.
passages.content_zh: 呃……是的。

passages.content: <[...]>If she finds out, I'm done for.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>如果她發現了，我就完蛋了。

passages.content:
Okay, look, all you need to do is graduate. Once that's over,
you can go your own way. Not everyone sticks around after
that, you can just "disappear."
passages.content_zh:
好吧，聽著，你所需要做的就是畢業。一旦這一切結束了，
你可以走自己的路。並不是每個人都會留下來
那你就可以「消失」。

passages.content: <[...]>Thanks, I guess.

I understand this isn't exactly what you wanted, but we really
have no choice.
passages.content_zh:
我知道這並不完全是你想要的，但我們真的
別無選擇。

passages.content: <[...]>So I have to continue dressing in drag?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>所以我必須繼續變裝？

passages.content: Pretty much, but I might have some ideas left.
passages.content_zh: 差不多了，但我可能還有一些想法。

passages.content:
<[...]>So I have to continue dressing in drag and hope nobody
looks up my dress?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>所以我必須繼續變裝並希望沒有人
查我的衣服嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>So I have to continue dressing in drag and hope nobody
looks up my skirt?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>所以我必須繼續變裝並希望沒有人
看看我的裙子？

passages.content:
Pretty much, but if you're really worried about being found out,
there\fi is\fr a thing I could do...
passages.content_zh:
差不多 但如果你真的擔心被發現
有\fi是\fr我可以做的一件事...

passages.content:
<[...]>*Sigh*
What kind of outrageous plan are you thinking about
this time?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>*嘆氣*
你到底在想什麼荒唐的計劃
這次？

passages.content:
I've never done it myself, but there're spells that could turn
you into a girl.
passages.content_zh:
我自己從來沒有這樣做過，但是有些咒語可以改變
你變成了一個女孩。

passages.content: <[...]>So basically like my alternate form?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>所以基本上就像我的替代形式？

passages.content: Except permanent.
passages.content_zh: 永久除外。

passages.content:
That's brilliant, ! If [...] becomes a girl, he won't have
trouble pretending he's a girl!
passages.content_zh:
太棒了，！如果[...]變成女孩，他就不會
假裝自己是女孩真麻煩！

passages.content:
<[...]>No thank you, I have a feeling that if we do that, I'll be stuck
as a woman for the rest of my life.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>不，謝謝，我有一種感覺，如果我們這樣做，我就會陷入困境
作為一個女人度過我的餘生。

passages.content:
Come on, I'm almost 100% sure I'll be able to change you
back.
passages.content_zh:
來吧，我幾乎100%確定我能夠改變你
回來。

passages.content: <[...]>Just how close to 100%?
Around 90%... okay, more like 80%... maybe 70% or 60%...
<[...]>Those odds really don't inspire confidence, you know?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這些幾率確實不能激發信心，你知道嗎？

passages.content: Okay okay, we'll stick with cross-dressing.
passages.content_zh: 好吧好吧，我們還是繼續變裝。

passages.content: For now...
passages.content_zh: 目前...

passages.content: <[...]>What do I have to do to graduate?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我需要做什麼才能畢業？

passages.content: Just keep beating up Magicos until mother is satisfied.
passages.content_zh: 繼續打Magicos，直到媽媽滿意為止。

passages.content: <[...]>And if there's something like that physical exam again?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>如果再有類似的身體檢查呢？

passages.content: Errr... we'll deal with it when it happens!
passages.content_zh: 呃……事情發生後我們會處理的！

passages.content: <[...]>(It's not much of a plan, but guess I have no choice.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（這不是什麼計劃，但我想我別無選擇。）

passages.content:
<[...]>(If this works, once I graduate I can go back to my old life,
but do I even want to?)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（如果這有效的話，一旦我畢業我就可以回到以前的生活了，
但我想這麼做嗎？ ）

passages.content:
<[...]>(Being a Magical Girl has its perks, but it also comes with a whole
lot of responsibilities.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（成為魔法少女有它的好處，但它也帶來了整個
責任很大。 ）

passages.content:
<[...]>(And being a girl doesn't sound that bad anymore, but do
I really want that, too?)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（身為一個女孩聽起來不再那麼糟了，但是
我也很想要這個？ ）

passages.content:
<[...]>(I know it sounds weird, but lately being a girl just feels more
and more right. Does that make me transgender? I never
really thought about it before, but the idea of going back to
being a guy now just feels like a bad fit.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（我知道這聽起來很奇怪，但最近作為一個女孩感覺更
更正確的是。這會讓我變性嗎？我從來沒有
以前確實想過這個問題，但又想回到過去
現在身為一個男人感覺不太適合。 ）

passages.content:
<[...]>(Actually yeah, being a Magical Girl seems to be the better choice.
I have power, I have friends, and I can do cool things with both.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（事實上，是的，成為魔法少女似乎是更好的選擇。
我有權力，我有朋友，我可以和他們一起做很酷的事。 ）

passages.content: <[...]>(Strange, strange. What was I even so worried about before?)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（奇怪，奇怪。我之前到底在擔心什麼？）

passages.content: <[...]>(I have to give this some more thought later.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（我稍後必須再考慮一下。）

passages.content: <[...]>(No, what am I thinking!? I'm a guy damn it!)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（不，我在想什麼！？我他媽是個男人！）

passages.content: <[...]>(Also, won't I have to become a real girl!?)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（還有，我不是必須成為真正的女孩嗎！？）

passages.content:
<[...]>(I guess I could get used to it, being a girl doesn't seem that
bad...)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（我想我會習慣的，身為一個女孩似乎不這樣
不好…）

passages.content: <[...]>(No way, I'm a guy damn it!)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（不可能，我他媽是個男人！）

passages.content:
I'm so relieved you're back! That Magico looked so vicious
and-[...]
passages.content_zh:
你回來了我真是放心了！那個Magico看起來好惡毒
和-[...]

passages.content: <[...]>, stop staring. I can't move, help me!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>，別再盯著了。我動不了了，快幫幫我！

passages.content: Oh dear, sorry! I'll get .
passages.content_zh: 哦，親愛的，對不起！我會得到。

passages.content: And that's how [...] arrived here.
passages.content_zh: 這就是[...]到達這裡的方式。

passages.content:
Okay, this might be a problem. First, let me undo the
paralysis.
passages.content_zh:
好吧，這可能是個問題。首先，讓我撤銷
癱瘓。

passages.content:
After  cures the paralysis, you can feel the eggs, which
are no longer held in place, begin rushing out of your ass.
passages.content_zh:
麻痺治癒後，就可以摸到蛋了，
不再固定在原地，開始從你的屁股衝出來。

passages.content: <[...]>What the fuuuck!?

One after another, the fist-sized eggs push out of your ass,
something you have no control over. It is even more painful
than when they were first put inside.
passages.content_zh:
一顆顆拳頭大小的蛋從你屁股推出來，
你無法控制的事。更是痛苦的事
比它們第一次被放進去時的情況要好得多。

passages.content: Are those... are those eggs!?
passages.content_zh: 那是……那是雞蛋嗎！ ？

passages.content: <[...]>Yes, that Magico and the- ahh!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>是的，那個Magico和那個－－啊！

passages.content:
You can feel the last of the eggs making its way out of its
"nest". You take comfort in knowing that now you will not
have to experience these hatching inside you and the act
of giving birth.
passages.content_zh:
你可以感覺到最後一顆雞蛋從裡面出來
「巢」。當你知道現在你不會
必須經歷這些在你內心的孵化和行動
分娩。

passages.content:
That has got to be one of the worst things I've ever seen...
and I have seen a lot of screwed-up stuff in my life.
passages.content_zh:
這一定是我見過的最糟糕的事情之一...
我一生中見過很多搞砸的事情。

passages.content: Are they all out?
passages.content_zh: 他們都出去了嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>I... I think so.

I'll take care of these... and then play video games until
late at night to hopefully forget what I saw today.
passages.content_zh:
我會處理這些...然後玩電子遊戲直到
深夜，希望忘記今天看到的事。

passages.content: By the way, what happened to your hips?
passages.content_zh: 順便問一下，你的臀部怎麼了？

passages.content:
<[...]>The harpy used magic on them for the sake of... birthing
or something.

I guess I'm stuck with these now. Great...
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>鷹身女妖對他們使用魔法是為了...分娩
或什麼的。

我想我現在就被這些困住了。偉大的...

passages.content: It seems so. Should I get  back to take care of them?
passages.content_zh: 看來是這樣。我應該回去照顧他們嗎？

passages.content:
Do you need anything?

Can I help?
passages.content_zh:
你需要什麼嗎？

我可以幫忙嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>No, I just need rest, I-[...]

Before you can even say anything else, you just fall
unconscious from the mental and physical exhaustion of
today's events.
passages.content_zh:
還來不及說什麼，就跌倒了
因精神和身體的疲憊而失去知覺
今天的事件。

passages.content:
You sleep for several hours as your body heals the damage
the Magico caused.
passages.content_zh:
當你的身體治癒損傷時，你會睡幾個小時
Magico引起的。

passages.content: Your wider hips remain.
passages.content_zh: 你的更寬的臀部仍然存在。

passages.content: Good morning, [...].

<[...]>Good morning, I'm glad to see you are
back to normal.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>早安，很高興看到你
恢復正常。

passages.content:
It's all thanks to you.
By the way, do you want to join me for
breakfast? I got this from .
passages.content_zh:
這全都是你的功勞。
順便問一下，你想跟我一起嗎？
早餐？我從 得到這個。

passages.content: <[...]>Errr... a bottle of milk and bananas?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>呃...一瓶牛奶和香蕉？

passages.content: Doesn't it look delicious?
passages.content_zh: 看起來不好吃嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>Well, it's a pretty normal breakfast, but
I guess it does.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>嗯，這是一頓很普通的早餐，但是
我想是的。

passages.content:
Normal!?
You mean, you are used to eating like this
often?
passages.content_zh:
普通的！ ？
你的意思是，你習慣這樣吃
經常嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>I prefer cereal, but yes.
What did you eat for breakfast before
coming to the camp?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我比較喜歡麥片，但是的。
你之前早餐吃什麼
來營地嗎？

passages.content:
Nothing, my sisters only fed me once
a day.
passages.content_zh:
沒什麼，我姐姐只餵我一次
一天。

passages.content:
<[...]>Your neighbours should have called
child services!
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你的鄰居應該打電話給
兒童服務！

有那麼糟嗎？

passages.content:
I guess it depends. This life works for some girls, but for
others... less so.
passages.content_zh:
我想這要看情況。這種生活對有些女孩來說是可行的，但對於
其他人……則不然。

passages.content: Aren't you going to drink your whisky?
passages.content_zh: 你不喝你的威士忌嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Oh, sorry.
You take a swig out of your glass.
passages.content_zh: 你從杯子裡喝了一口。

passages.content: So, do you already have a team, ?
passages.content_zh: 那麼，你已經有一個團隊了嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Yes, my teammates are , , and .
passages.content_zh: <[...]>是的，我的隊友是、、和。

passages.content: <[...]>Errr... Kind of.

That's good. Magical Girls work best when they work together.
You know, power of friendship and all that crap.
passages.content_zh:
那挺好的。魔法少女們在一起工作時效果最佳。
你知道，友誼的力量和所有那些廢話。

passages.content:
I wish my daughter would team up with some other girls.
It's not healthy to fight alone for so long.
passages.content_zh:
我希望我的女兒能和其他女孩組隊。
單獨戰鬥這麼久並不健康。

passages.content: <[...]>Maybe she just hasn't found the right team yet.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>也許她只是還沒找到合適的團隊。

passages.content: Maybe.
She refills your glass.
passages.content_zh: 她給你續杯。

passages.content: <[...]>Thank you for the drink, but I should be going.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>謝謝你請我喝酒，但我該走了。

passages.content:
<[...]>So, how long have you been a Magical
Girl?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>那麼，你成為魔法師多久了？
女孩？

passages.content:
Way too long. In fact, I think I'm singlehandedly responsible
for raising the average Magical Girl lifespan.
passages.content_zh:
太長了。其實我覺得我一個人有責任
提高魔法少女的平均壽命。

passages.content: <[...]>Come on, you're not that old.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>得了吧，你還沒那麼老。

passages.content: Oh really? How old do you think I am?
passages.content_zh: 哦真的嗎？你認為我幾歲了？

passages.content: Not even close!
passages.content_zh: 甚至還沒有接近！

passages.content: Try 184 instead.
passages.content_zh: 改用 184 試試。

passages.content:
Oh, but it's true.

I can show you why.
passages.content_zh:
哦，但這是真的。

我可以告訴你原因。

passages.content:
Out of nowhere, she takes out a sharp dagger that she then
hands you.
passages.content_zh:
她突然拿出一把鋒利的匕首，然後
遞給你。

passages.content: Stick that in my neck.
passages.content_zh: 把它插在我脖子上。

passages.content: <[...]>What? Are you nuts!?

Don't worry, don't worry.

Come on, do it!
passages.content_zh:
別擔心，別擔心。

來吧，做吧！

passages.content:
You stab  in the neck. The dagger is so sharp that it
cuts through her flesh like butter.
passages.content_zh:
你刺傷了脖子。這把匕首是如此鋒利，以至於
像黃油一樣切開她的肉。

passages.content: *Gasp, gurgle*...
passages.content_zh: *喘氣，咯咯聲*...

passages.content: <[...]>Oh my god, she's dying!!! What have I done!?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>天啊，她快死了！ ！ ！我做了什麼！ ？

passages.content:
A you begin to panic, 's hand grips the dagger and
pulls it out of her neck as if it were nothing. The wound
closes before your very eyes.
passages.content_zh:
你開始驚慌，手握著匕首，
把它從脖子上拔出來，好像什麼都沒有一樣。傷口
在你眼前關閉。

passages.content:
She sits before you, grinning and clearly unharmed. The
whole scene would seem like a perfectly normal conversation
between friends were it not for the blood stains on her
clothing.
passages.content_zh:
她坐在你面前，微笑著，顯然沒有受傷。的
整個場景看起來像是一場完全正常的對話
朋友之間要不是她身上有血跡
服裝。

passages.content: Ahaha! You should have seen the look on your face.
passages.content_zh: 啊哈哈！你應該會看到你臉上的表情。

passages.content: <[...]>Dammit, ! What the fuck was that!?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>該死，！那是什麼鬼東西！ ？

passages.content:
Magical Girls heal very quickly.

In fact, you've probably noticed that no matter how hard
you're beaten, the next morning you're fully recovered.
passages.content_zh:
魔法少女的痊癒速度非常快。

事實上，你可能已經注意到，無論多麼努力
你被打敗了，第二天早上你就完全康復了。

passages.content:
My daughter says we're like Wolverine, whoever that is.

For some reason, I've always healed faster than the others,
and it got stronger as I got older. It's not just wounds, either.
passages.content_zh:
我女兒說我們就像金鋼狼，不管那是誰。

出於某種原因，我總是比其他人恢復得更快，
隨著我年齡的增長，它變得更加強烈。這不僅僅是傷口。

passages.content:
First I found out I could no longer get sick. Awesome news,
right? Then I stopped aging... After that, things got really
crazy.
passages.content_zh:
首先我發現我不能再生病了。很棒的消息，
對嗎？然後我停止了衰老……在那之後，事情變得真的
瘋狂的。

passages.content:
One time, a dragon Magico incinerated me. And I don't just
mean that I got burned; it reduced me to charred bones.

I woke up, fully healed, during my own funeral.
passages.content_zh:
有一次，一隻龍魔法師把我燒成了灰燼。我不只是
意味著我被燒傷了；它讓我變成燒焦的骨頭。

在我自己的葬禮上，我醒來，完全痊癒了。

passages.content:
Now that I think about it, the people there made faces kind
of like yours.
passages.content_zh:
現在想起來，那裡的人都做了鬼臉，很友善
像你的一樣。

passages.content: Wuss.
She takes another sip.
passages.content_zh: 她又喝了一口。

passages.content: <[...]>Are you alright?

Yes, I'm just remembering the past.

How everything went so wrong...
passages.content_zh:
是的，我只是在回憶過去。

怎麼一切都變得如此糟糕......

passages.content:
Hey, while we're at it.

Do you want to hear a few stories about my adventures?
passages.content_zh:
嘿，當我們還在做的時候。

你想聽聽我的冒險故事嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Sorry, but I should be going.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>抱歉，但我該走了。

passages.content:
<[...]>(I probably should leave, but  looks kind of
lonely.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（我可能應該離開，但看起來有點
孤獨。 ）

passages.content:
You listen attentively to 's many vivid stories. Some
sound too incredible to be believed, but she insists they are
all true.
passages.content_zh:
你認真地聽著許多生動的故事。一些
聽起來難以置信，但她堅持認為它們是
都是真的。

passages.content:
...and then I said, "There's no way I'm going to be some
squid Magico's sex toy!" before I blasted it, and that's how
I rescued the man that became my first husband.
passages.content_zh:
……然後我說，「我不可能成為某個人
烏賊Magico的性玩具！ 「在我炸毀它之前，就是這樣
我救了那個成為我第一任丈夫的人。

passages.content: <[...]>You were married?
Four times. Got my heart broken by every single one of them.
passages.content_zh: 四次。他們每一個都讓我心碎。

passages.content: Fucking men!
passages.content_zh: 他媽的男人們！

passages.content: She throws her glass against the wall.
passages.content_zh: 她把杯子丟到牆上。

passages.content:
Sometimes I think I should've asked Phyre to mess with my
mind a bit to turn me into a dyke.
passages.content_zh:
有時我想我應該讓 Phyre 來擾亂我的
介意一點把我變成堤防。

passages.content:
The fourth time was the worst.

Funny... I should probably be used to it by now.
passages.content_zh:
第四次是最糟糕的一次。

有趣……我現在應該已經習慣了。

passages.content:
He didn't understand that in this war with the Magicos, we
have to make sacrifices, even if it affects our own children.
passages.content_zh:
他不明白，在這場與魔法師的戰爭中，我們
必須做出犧牲，即使這會影響我們自己的孩子。

passages.content:
It's worse than you can imagine. I've been to worlds that
were completely overrun by the Magicos.

It's... not a pretty sight.
passages.content_zh:
這比你想像的還要糟糕。我去過的世界
完全被Magicos佔領了。

這……景色不太好。

passages.content:
You just say that because you haven't seen what I've seen.
You don't know about the horrors those things are capable of.
Entire worlds devoid of any life other than their minions...
passages.content_zh:
你這麼說只是因為你沒有看到我所看到的。
你不知道那些東西能夠造成的恐怖。
整個世界除了他們的爪牙之外沒有任何生命......

passages.content:
<???>[...]?! [...]!

What on earth are you doing!? Get the alcohol and get out
of there!  will not wait forever!
passages.content_zh:
<???>[...]？ ！ [...]！

你到底在做什麼！ ？拿了酒然後出去
那裡！  不會永遠等待！

passages.content:
Do you want another swig?

Not that it helps me forgetting...
passages.content_zh:
你還想再喝一杯嗎？

並不是說它可以幫助我忘記......

passages.content: The two of you chat a few more minutes, until...
passages.content_zh: 你們兩個又聊了幾分鐘，直到…

passages.content: <[...]>Sorry, but really must leave.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>抱歉，但真的必須離開。

passages.content:
There you are, !

Young lady, do you have any idea how long I've been
waiting for you?
passages.content_zh:
你在那裡，！

年輕的女士，你知道我已經待了多久了嗎？
等你嗎？

passages.content: Hi, . What's up?
passages.content_zh: 你好， 。這是怎麼回事？

passages.content: Director ? I had no idea you were here.
passages.content_zh: 導演 ？我不知道你在這裡。

passages.content: As for the issue,  is late for her physical examination.
passages.content_zh: 至於問題，是她體檢遲到了。

passages.content:
Right. , you should go with ... Wait, why do
you look so nervous?
passages.content_zh:
正確的。 ，你應該選擇...等等，為什麼要這樣做
你看起來很緊張？

passages.content: Oh, I see. You're shy.
passages.content_zh: 我懂了。你很害羞。

passages.content: Well, just let me handle this.
passages.content_zh: 好吧，讓我來處理這個。

passages.content: I don't think that she needs to be examined, .
passages.content_zh: 我認為她不需要接受檢查。

passages.content:
I must object. It is essential that we know her physical
capabilities so that we can assess which missions are suitable
for her.
passages.content_zh:
我必須反對。我們必須了解她的身體狀況
能力，以便我們可以評估哪些任務適合
為了她。

passages.content: Come on, . We both know this is just a formality.
passages.content_zh: 快點， 。我們都知道這只是一種形式。

passages.content:
What if she has some physical abnormalities?

Like a weak endurance...
passages.content_zh:
如果她有一些身體異常怎麼辦？

比如耐力弱...

passages.content: has plenty of endurance. I mean, look.
passages.content_zh: 有足夠的耐力。我的意思是，看。

passages.content: <[...]>AAAAAaaaaaahhhhhhh!!!
Oops... I think I might have overdone it a bit...
passages.content_zh: 哎呀…我想我可能做得有點過頭了…

passages.content: A bit!? There's bone poking out of her arm!
passages.content_zh: 一點！ ？她的手臂上有骨頭突出來！

passages.content:
Yeah, sorry about that, . But don't worry! 's a
pretty good healer. She'll have you back on your feet in
no time.
passages.content_zh:
是的，對此感到抱歉。但別擔心！是一個
相當不錯的治療師。她會讓你重新站起來
沒有時間。

passages.content:
Nearly passing out from the pain, you are only capable of
moaning in response.
passages.content_zh:
幾乎要從痛苦中昏過去，你只能
呻吟作為回應。

passages.content:
Oh, and ? Since she's still alive after I've slapped
around her a bit, I think we can both agree she's physically
capable.
passages.content_zh:
哦，還有？因為我打了她一巴掌之後她還活著
在她身邊待一會兒，我想我們都同意她的身體狀況
有能力的。

passages.content: ...Yes, Director.
passages.content_zh: ……是的，導演。

passages.content:
Thanks to 's impressive magic, you are soon fully
healed. However, the experience leaves you exhausted, so
you retreat to your room to rest for the remainder of the day.
passages.content_zh:
感謝 令人印象深刻的魔法，你很快就完全康復了
痊癒了。然而，這種經驗會讓你精疲力竭，所以
你回到自己的房間休息一天剩下的時間。

passages.content: I see. , you should go with .
passages.content_zh: 我懂了。 ，你應該跟去。

passages.content: Don't make that face; she won't bite you.
passages.content_zh: 別露出那種表情；她不會咬你的。

passages.content: What is it, ?
passages.content_zh: 它是什麼？

passages.content: <[...]>I know this might sound strange, but I also need... uh...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我知道這可能聽起來很奇怪，但我也需要...呃...

passages.content: Just say it so I can get back to spending time with Mr. D.
passages.content_zh: 說出來吧，這樣我就可以回去和 D 先生共度時光了。

passages.content: <[...]>Panties! I need panties...

With no hesitation,  takes off hers from under her skirt
and hands them to you.

They are strangely childish, with a tiger motif.
passages.content_zh:
毫不猶豫地把裙子從裙子下脫下來
並將它們交給您。

它們異常幼稚，帶有老虎的圖案。

passages.content: No problem.
passages.content_zh: 沒問題。

passages.content: <[...]>Well, I gotta go.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>好吧，我得走了。

passages.content:
Alright.

Oh, and ?
passages.content_zh:
好吧。

哦，還有？

passages.content: Don't go down that path. It's not good for you.
passages.content_zh: 不要走那條路。這對你不好。

passages.content: <[...]>Well, that was embarrassing.
<[...]>But I got panties now, too.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>但我現在也有內褲了。

passages.content:
<[...]>...

(Let's not be too loud about that.)
Not now, . I'm trying to get drunk.
passages.content_zh: 現在不要， 。我正試著喝醉。

passages.content: <Maid>Hi there! I haven't seen you around before. You must be new.
passages.content_zh: <女僕>你好！我以前沒見過你。你一定是新人。

passages.content: <Giselle>I am Giselle, nice to meet you.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>我是吉賽爾，很高興認識你。

passages.content: <[...]>Hi Giselle, I'm .
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嗨吉賽爾，我是。

passages.content:
<Giselle>Oh yes, the girl that  has been talking about. Good to
finally meet you.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>哦，是的，就是我們一直在談論的那個女孩。很好
終於見到你了。

passages.content: <Giselle>Actually... I heard you are a maid, too.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>其實…我聽說你也是女僕。

passages.content: <Giselle>So, what will it be?
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>那麼，會是什麼？

passages.content: <Giselle>So, ... I heard you are a maid, too.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>那麼……我聽說你也是女僕。

passages.content: <[...]>I take it you know about the headband.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我想你了解頭帶。

passages.content:
<Giselle>Yes, it is the same as mine.

Well mine is a bit different, because I am a man and all.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>是的，和我的一樣。

嗯，我的有點不同，因為我是一個男人。

passages.content: <Giselle>Wait a minute, I was able to say it!?
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>等一下，我可以說了嗎！ ？

passages.content: <Giselle>Yes! The curse lets me talk about it with other maids!
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>是的！诅咒让我和其他女仆说起！

passages.content: <[...]>Wait, so you're a man!?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>等等，所以你是個男人！ ？

passages.content:
<Giselle>Yes, well... sort of?

The Director decided to make me not very manly, not that
I know how manly I used to be.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>是的，嗯……有點？

導演決定讓我變得不太有男子氣概，不是那樣
我知道我以前是多麼有男子氣概。

passages.content:
<Giselle>Besides turning me into a sissy maid, the Director erased
my memories. I have no idea who I was or why she did this.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>除了把我變成娘娘腔女僕外，導演還抹掉了
我的回憶。我不知道我是誰，也不知道她為什麼要這麼做。

passages.content: <[...]>That's awful, Giselle.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>太糟糕了，吉賽兒。

passages.content:
<Giselle>It gets worse. The Director loves to play games with me.
Sometimes, she'll give me fake clues about my identity,
which end up just being humiliating pranks.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>情況變得更糟。導演很喜歡和我一起玩遊戲。
有時，她會給我關於我身分的虛假線索，
這最終只是令人羞辱的惡作劇。

passages.content: <[...]>But why would she do that?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>但她為什麼要這麼做？

passages.content:
<Giselle>I don't know.

If you find any clues about my identity, please share them
with me.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>我不知道。

如果您發現任何有關我身分的線索，請分享
和我一起。

passages.content: <Giselle>Ah yes, take this: \I[242].
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>啊，是的，拿這個：\I[242]。

passages.content: <Giselle>It is the key to the Director's office.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>這是主任辦公室的鑰匙。

passages.content:
<Giselle>Just be careful if you go check her collection; some of her
possessions can be... frisky.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>如果你去看她的收藏，請小心；她的一些
財產可以是……活潑的。

passages.content:
<Giselle>Also, do not worry about getting into the office building.

Thanks to that headband, the spell protecting the building
will probably consider you as part of the staff.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>還有，不用擔心進入辦公大樓。

多虧了那個頭帶，保護建築物的咒語
可能會將您視為員工的一部分。

passages.content: <Giselle>Hi, ... What's the matter? You seem stressed today.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>嗨，……怎麼了？你今天看起來壓力很大。

passages.content:
<[...]>*Sigh*

Well...
<Giselle>Oh dear, it seems that  girl really has it in for you.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>天哪，看來那個女孩真的很喜歡你。

passages.content: <Giselle>Hang in there , I'm sure you will see this through.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>堅持住，我相信你會明白這一點的。

passages.content: <[...]>Thanks, Giselle.

<Giselle>I know I shouldn't do this, but I may be able to help you.

Part of my job is cleaning the students' rooms, so I should
be able to get you a key to hers... in theory at least.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>我知道我不應該這樣做，但我也許可以幫助你。

我的一部分工作是打掃學生的房間，所以我應該
能夠給你一把她的鑰匙……至少在理論上是這樣。

passages.content: <[...]>You clean the whole camp all by yourself?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你一個人打掃了整個營地？

passages.content:
<Giselle>Oh no, that would be too much for a single person.

Director  hired several domovoy back when she
was stationed at Russia.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>喔不，對一個人來說這太過分了。

導演當年雇了幾個domovoy回來
曾駐紮在俄羅斯。

passages.content: <[...]>Don't think I've seen any around.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我以為我沒見過任何東西。

passages.content:
<Giselle>They are invisible and very silent. I think they're shy.

Anyway, they won't notice if I borrow a copy of the key
you need... Probably.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>它們是隱形的，而且非常安靜。我覺得他們很害羞。

無論如何，如果我借了鑰匙的副本，他們不會注意到
你需要...可能。

passages.content: <Giselle>Just give me a sec...
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>請等我一下...

passages.content: Giselle leaves shortly to get the key.
passages.content_zh: 吉賽兒很快就離開去拿鑰匙。

passages.content: <Giselle>Here you go .
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>給你。

passages.content: <[...]>Thank you, Giselle.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>謝謝你，吉賽兒。

passages.content:
<Giselle>No problem, we cursed maids have to look out for each other
after all.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>沒問題，我們這些被詛咒的女僕必須互相照顧
畢竟。

passages.content: Good job minion.
passages.content_zh: 幹得好，小小兵。

passages.content:
<Giselle>Yeah, now that you mention it, it's probably best not to risk
angering the Director.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>是的，既然你提到了，最好不要冒險
激怒導演。

passages.content: <Giselle>Welcome back, . What will it be?
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>歡迎回來，。會是什麼？

passages.content: <Giselle>I am the lunch lady.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>我是午餐女士。

passages.content: <[...]>Yes, but are you a Magical Girl?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>是的，但是你是魔法少女嗎？

passages.content:
<Giselle>Of course not, silly. If I was, I wouldn't be working in the
cafeteria.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>當然不是，傻瓜。如果是的話，我就不會在這個行業工作了
自助餐廳。

passages.content: <[...]>You'll have to excuse this question, but... are you human?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你必須原諒這個問題，但是...你是人類嗎？

passages.content:
<Giselle>It's the red eyes, right?

They told me it's a side effect of being subjected to so much
transformative magic, but I am still human... I think.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>是紅眼睛，對吧？

他們告訴我這是承受太多壓力的副作用
改變魔法，但我仍然是人類……我想。

passages.content:
<Giselle>Whatever you do, do not get on her bad side. Trust me, she
is not somebody you want to anger.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>無論你做什麼，都不要對她不利。相信我，她
不是你想激怒的人。

passages.content: <[...]>Yeah, I heard she's especially bad with men...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>是的，我聽說她對男人特別不好...

passages.content:
<Giselle>For some reason, she has a chip on her shoulder against
men.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>出於某種原因，她對自己的行為感到不滿
男人。

passages.content: <[...]>Does she really turn them into farm animals?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>她真的把它們變成農場動物了嗎？

passages.content:
<Giselle>Sometimes, but that is far from the only thing she does.

If you are really unlucky, you may, hypothetically, end up
as a limp-dicked sissy maid.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>有時，但這遠不是她唯一做的事情。

如果你真的很不幸，假設你最終可能會
身為一個軟弱無力的娘娘腔女僕。

passages.content:
<Giselle>The worst part is that she could use her magic to force you
to act all happy and cheerful, even if inside you just want
somebody to put you out of your misery.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>最糟糕的是她可以用她的魔法強迫你
表現得開心快樂，即使內心只是想要
有人能讓你擺脫痛苦。

passages.content: <[...]>Ahahaha... haah...
<[...]>(I'm so fucked, aren't I?)
<[...]>I'll try to find some information about you, promise.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我會盡力找到一些關於你的信息，保證。

passages.content: <Giselle>Thank you, .
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>謝謝你，。

passages.content: <[...]>Giselle, are you-[...]

<Giselle>I am just talking hypothetically, of course.

The Director would be smart enough to add another spell
to prevent the hypothetical sissy maid from telling the truth
about herself.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>當然，我只是假設而已。

導演很聰明，可以再加一個咒語
為了防止假想的娘娘腔女僕說出真相
關於她自己。

passages.content:
<Giselle>To be honest, not very good, but... well, this is what they
give me to cook.
passages.content_zh:
〈吉賽兒>說實話，不太好，但…好吧，這就是他們的
給我做飯。

passages.content:
Giselle hands you a large can. The label reads:

"Gob-Gob's 100% Genuine Original Imitation Meat - Now
Spam-Flavoured!"
passages.content_zh:
吉賽兒遞給你一個大罐頭。標籤上寫著：

「Gob-Gob 的 100% 純正原味仿肉 - 現在
垃圾郵件口味！ 」

passages.content: <[...]>Imitation meat? What's in this thing?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>人造肉？這東西裡面有什麼？

passages.content: <Giselle>I really do not want to know.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>我真的不想知道。

passages.content: <Giselle>Coming right up.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>馬上就來。

passages.content:
<Giselle>I recommend also having a large soda. It helps drown out
the flavour.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>我建議也喝一大杯蘇打水。它有助於淹沒
味道。

passages.content: <Giselle>See you later, .
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>再見，。

passages.content: <[...]>So, are we going to join your friends?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那麼，我們要加入你的朋友嗎？

passages.content:
Ah... no.

They don't want to be with me right now.
passages.content_zh:
啊……不。

他們現在不想跟我在一起。

passages.content: <[...]>, did they find out-[...]
Don't worry about it, , I'll resolve it later.
passages.content_zh: 不用擔心，我稍後會解決它。

passages.content: Let's sit over there.
passages.content_zh: 我們坐那兒吧。

passages.content: <Giselle>Hello, , what is it going to be?
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>你好，請問會是什麼？

passages.content: <[...]>A special please. What about you, ?
Blergh! Are you really going to eat Giselle's "food"?
passages.content_zh: 布萊格！你真的要吃吉賽兒的「食物」嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>!? Sorry Giselle, she just means that-[...]

<Giselle>Don't worry about it, , I understand.

I mean, who in their right mind would eat the crap I
serve?
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>別擔心，我明白。

我的意思是，誰心智正常會吃我的垃圾？
服務？

passages.content: In any case, I brought my own dinner.
passages.content_zh: 無論如何，我帶了自己的晚餐。

passages.content: places a metallic bento-like box on the table.
passages.content_zh: 將一個金屬便當盒放在桌上。

passages.content: Darn, I forgot my canteen.
passages.content_zh: 該死，我忘了我的水壺了。

passages.content:
<[...]>Just ask for something. Unlike the food, the drinks here are
pretty normal.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>只是要求一些東西。與食物不同，這裡的飲料
很正常。

passages.content:
But minion, what if it is poisoned? My enemies have tried
to taint my food before.
passages.content_zh:
不過小弟，萬一中毒了怎麼辦？我的敵人已經嘗試過
之前污染了我的食物。

passages.content: <[...]>If it makes you feel safer, I will act as your food taster.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>如果這讓你感覺更安全，我會擔任你的食物品嚐師。

passages.content:
A taster wouldn't help against a delayed action toxin, or a
binary poison, or a custom gene-targeted agent, or-[...]
passages.content_zh:
品嚐者無法幫助對抗延遲作用的毒素，或者
二元毒藥，或定制的基因靶向劑，或-[...]

passages.content:
<[...]>Relax, .

You're in another dimension, do you really think your
brother could reach you here?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>放鬆，。

你在另一個維度，你真的認為你的
兄弟可以聯絡到你嗎？

passages.content:
I guess not, minion. Order something refreshing for your
mistress.
passages.content_zh:
我想不是，小兵。為您訂購一些清爽的東西
情婦。

passages.content: <[...]>Two colas please, Giselle.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>請給我兩杯可樂，吉賽兒。

passages.content:
<[...]>Wow, that's a lot of vegetables and... only vegetables.
Are you on a diet?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>哇，有很多蔬菜，而且…只是蔬菜。
你在節食嗎？

passages.content: Minion... are you calling me fat?
passages.content_zh: 小小兵……你是說我胖嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>No, no, no!

I was just surprised by how... health-conscious your
meal is.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>不，不，不！

我只是驚訝於你的...健康意識
餐群島

passages.content:
I don't eat meat.

Well actually, I can't eat meat. Vir just can't digest it.
passages.content_zh:
我不吃肉。

其實我不能吃肉。 Vir 就是無法消化它。

passages.content:
<[...]>So your people are vegetarians? Those animal rights groups
from Earth would like you guys.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>所以你們的人民都是素食主義者？那些動物權利組織
來自地球的人會喜歡你們。

passages.content:
We mostly feed by draining lifeforce, though plants are also
an integral part of our diet.
passages.content_zh:
我們主要透過消耗生命力來進食，儘管植物也是如此
我們飲食中不可或缺的一部分。

passages.content:
<[...]>I guess you aren't exactly vegetarians then. I mean, you
still have to kill animals, right?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我猜你不完全是素食主義者。我的意思是，你
還是得殺動物吧？

passages.content:
Yes, but we have far fewer livestock animals on average
than humans.
passages.content_zh:
是的，但我們的平均牲畜數量要少得多
比人類。

passages.content:
We much prefer the lifeforce of other sapient beings. It tastes
much better.
passages.content_zh:
我們更喜歡其他智慧生物的生命力。嚐起來
好多了。

passages.content: <[...]>...way worse than anything we do on Earth!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>...比我們在地球上所做的任何事情都糟糕得多！

passages.content:
It's not that bad. Losing small bits of lifeforce is perfectly
survivable.
passages.content_zh:
沒那麼糟。失去一點點生命力是完美的
可以生存。

passages.content: In fact, do you mind if I take a few nibbles?
passages.content_zh: 事實上，你介意我咬幾口嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Please don't look at me with those hungry eyes.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>請不要用那雙飢餓的眼睛看著我。

passages.content: But you look so delicious.
passages.content_zh: 但你看起來很好吃。

passages.content: She places a hand on your thigh.
passages.content_zh: 她將一隻手放在你的大腿上。

passages.content:
<[...]>Are you coming on to me or are you planning to literally
eat me?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你是來找我的還是打算真的
吃我嗎？

passages.content: Mhmmm, yes...
passages.content_zh: 嗯嗯，是的...

passages.content: <[...]>Just what the hell was in that drink, Giselle?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那杯飲料裡到底是什麼東西，吉賽兒？

passages.content:
<Giselle>I swear it was just a normal cola! Nothing besides the usual
things like sugar, water, some caffeine...
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>我發誓這只是一杯普通的可樂！除了平常沒有什麼
例如糖、水、咖啡因…

passages.content: What? Caffeine!?
passages.content_zh: 什麼？咖啡因！ ？

passages.content:
twists her lunch box, which opens a secret compartment
containing several pills and tablets.

She quickly swallows a grey tablet.
passages.content_zh:
扭轉她的午餐盒，打開一個秘密隔間
含有多種藥丸和藥片。

她很快吞下了一顆灰色藥片。

passages.content: Did... did you just try to drug me!?
passages.content_zh: 你……你是不是想給我下藥！ ？

passages.content:
Minion...? Are you in league with my brother? Or perhaps
you had other intentions?
passages.content_zh:
奴才……？你和我兄弟是一夥的嗎？或者也許
你還有其他意圖嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>I'm sorry, I didn't know caffeine is that bad for you!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>抱歉，我不知道咖啡因對你這麼有害！

passages.content: Unfortunately,  is not listening to your protests.
passages.content_zh: 不幸的是，不聽你的抗議。

passages.content: ...No, you can't be working with him!
passages.content_zh: ……不，你不能和他一起工作！

passages.content:
That means you wanted to... even though we both are
girls!?
passages.content_zh:
這意味著你想...即使我們都是
女孩們！ ？

passages.content: You sick pervert!
passages.content_zh: 你這個變態變態！

passages.content: I hate you!
passages.content_zh: 我恨你！

passages.content: runs away.
passages.content_zh: 逃跑了。

passages.content:
<[...]>(Well, all things considered, I guess that went about as well
as it could have.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（好吧，考慮到所有事情，我想這也是如此
因為它可以有。 ）

passages.content: <[...]>...and that's how elections work on Earth.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>...這就是地球上選舉的運作方式。

passages.content:
Really?

You just have everybody vote for your leaders?
passages.content_zh:
真的嗎？

你只是讓每個人都投票給你的領導人嗎？

passages.content: It sounds messy. Things are much simpler on Itone.
passages.content_zh: 聽起來很亂。 Itone 上的事情要簡單得多。

passages.content:
<[...]>You guys have a hereditary monarchy, right? So the oldest
heir gets the throne?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你們是世襲君主制，對吧？所以最老的
繼承人獲得王位？

passages.content:
In theory. More often, the crown goes to the last surviving
heir.
passages.content_zh:
理論上來說。更多時候，王冠屬於最後的倖存者
繼承人。

passages.content: <[...]>That sounds way messier than voting!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這聽起來比投票更混亂！

passages.content:
You think so?

From our point of view, it seems the best way to make sure
the throne goes to the most capable heir.
passages.content_zh:
你這麼認為嗎？

從我們的角度來看，這似乎是確保
王位傳給最有能力的繼承人。

passages.content:
<[...]>But doesn't that mean that only the most vicious and ruthless
nobles become Emperors?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>但這是否意味著只有最惡毒、最無情的人
貴族當皇帝？

passages.content: Exactly. Just as I said, the most capable.
passages.content_zh: 確切地。正如我所說，最有能力的人。

passages.content: <[...]>I think we have different definitions of "capable".
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我認為我們對「有能力」有不同的定義。

passages.content: Different species, different values... I guess.
passages.content_zh: 不同的物種，不同的價值觀……我想。

passages.content: fills her cup with a pink liquid from her canteen.
passages.content_zh: 她用食堂裡的粉紅色液體裝滿了她的杯子。

passages.content: <[...]>By the way, what are you drinking?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>順便問一下，你喝什麼？

passages.content:
Strawberry milk.

I must say, for all of your people's flaws, you have managed
to develop quite a few culinary delights.
passages.content_zh:
草莓牛奶。

我必須說，儘管你們的人民有所有的缺點，你們還是成功了
開發相當多的烹飪樂趣。

passages.content:
<[...]>The future Empress of the evil Vir Empire drinks strawberry
milk?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>邪惡維爾帝國的未來女皇喝草莓
牛奶？

passages.content:
What? "Evil"!?

Explain your slander at once, minion!
passages.content_zh:
什麼？ 「邪惡的」！ ？

趕快解釋一下你的誹謗吧，小弟！

passages.content: <[...]>Well... you drain other people's lifeforce, right?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嗯...你耗盡了別人的生命力，對吧？

passages.content: We have to eat!
passages.content_zh: 我們得吃飯！

passages.content: <[...]>You could just drain only animals, you know?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你只能排乾動物，知道嗎？

passages.content: So you expect us to only eat the equivalent of papier-mâché?
passages.content_zh: 所以你認為我們只吃紙漿的東西？

passages.content: <[...]>Well, that's a fair point.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嗯，這是一個公平的觀點。

passages.content:
<[...]>But anyway, you guys also have a rigid social hierarchy,
correct?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>但無論如何，你們也有嚴格的社會階級制度，
對嗎？

passages.content: An orderly society is a stable society.
passages.content_zh: 一個有秩序的社會才是一個穩定的社會。

passages.content: <[...]>...And you have slaves?

Less than you might think, as heavy automation has greatly
reduced the Empire's need for labour.
passages.content_zh:
比您想像的要少，因為重型自動化大大提高了
減少了帝國對勞動力的需求。

passages.content:
But yes, since we need to keep the prey species around,
they might as well do some work.
passages.content_zh:
但是，是的，因為我們需要保留獵物物種，
他們不妨做一些工作。

passages.content:
<[...]>And, now this is just a guess, but I don't think you are exactly
the most... peaceful people in the universe.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>而且，現在這只是一個猜測，但我認為你並不完全是
宇宙中最……平和的人。

passages.content:
Why yes, wars across the multiverse are an excellent way
of both expanding the Empire and removing inferior vir.
passages.content_zh:
為什麼是的，跨越多元宇宙的戰爭是一個很好的方式
既要擴張帝國，又要消除劣勢。

passages.content: <[...]>See!? You are like the textbook example of an evil empire!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>看到了嗎！ ？你就像邪惡帝國的教科書範例！

passages.content: Why you, I have never...
passages.content_zh: 為什麼你，我從來沒有...

passages.content: takes a big swig from her cup.
passages.content_zh: 從杯子裡喝了一大口。

passages.content:
Blargh, this tastes awful!

Huh, this isn't my cup.
passages.content_zh:
布拉格，這味道太糟了！

呃，這不是我的杯子。

passages.content: <Giselle>I am sorry, , but that was mine.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>對不起，但那是我的。

passages.content: What was that disgusting drink and why did it taste-[...]
passages.content_zh: 那是什麼令人噁心的飲料以及為什麼它嘗起來-[...]

passages.content: ...so relaxing...
passages.content_zh: ……好放鬆…

passages.content: <Giselle>Black coffee... errr, are you alright?
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>黑咖啡...呃，你還好嗎？

passages.content: Things are getting all warm and fuzzy...
passages.content_zh: 一切都變得溫暖而模糊…

passages.content:
<[...]>Listen to me, , you need to take that medicine from
the other day!
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>聽我說，你需要從
前幾天！

passages.content: HOW DARE YOU!?
passages.content_zh: 你怎麼敢！ ？

passages.content: lunges forward and grabs your breasts!
passages.content_zh: 向前衝刺並抓住你的乳房！

passages.content: <Giselle>Oh my.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>天哪。

passages.content:
You are my minion! SO HOW COME YOU HAVE BIGGER
BOOBS THAN ME!?
passages.content_zh:
