passages.content_zh: ……但這確實解釋了奇怪的禮物。

passages.content: Thanks, ! I'll be sure to pay you back some day.
passages.content_zh: 謝謝， ！總有一天我一定會還給你。

passages.content: <[...]>(A cute... potato fox?)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（一隻可愛的...馬鈴薯狐狸？）

passages.content: <[...]>(I shouldn't bother her while she's busy with her art.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（當她忙於藝術時我不應該打擾她。）

passages.content:
<[...]>(Huh, I don't think I've seen that girl before.

She seems kind of strange.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（呃，我好像以前沒見過那個女孩。

她看起來有點奇怪。 ）

passages.content: <Fox girl>Oh, hello there.
passages.content_zh: <狐狸女孩>哦，你好。

passages.content:
To your surprise, the girl in front of you seems to be some sort
of humanoid fox.
passages.content_zh:
令你驚訝的是，眼前這個女孩似乎是某種
的人形狐狸。

passages.content:
<Fox girl>Sorry, I didn't mean to startle you, but I guess I must look
pretty strange to you...
passages.content_zh:
<狐女>抱歉，我不是故意嚇你的，但我想我必須看看
對你來說很奇怪...

passages.content: <[...]>No, it's my bad. Sorry for gawking.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>不，是我的錯。抱歉看得一愣一愣的。

passages.content: <Fox girl>Wait... you are , aren't you?
passages.content_zh: <狐女>等等……你是，不是嗎？

passages.content:
Ohhh, it's an honour to meet you! I'm Agedia. The way your
team has been beating Magico after Magico has been an
inspiration for me and my friends.
passages.content_zh:
呵呵，很榮幸認識你！我是阿吉迪亞。你的方式
在 Magico 被擊敗後，球隊一直在擊敗 Magico
為我和我的朋友們帶來靈感。

passages.content: <[...]>Thank you!

Ah, but you're probably wondering about my unusual
appearance. I'm actually from Nera; people like me are
normal there.
passages.content_zh:
啊，但你可能想知道我的不尋常
外觀。我實際上來自內拉；像我這樣的人
那裡正常。

passages.content: <[...]>I guess we must look just as strange to you then.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我想我們在你看來一定也一樣奇怪。

passages.content:
At first I thought so, but honestly we're pretty similar on
the inside, as you would find out if you visited my home
world.
passages.content_zh:
一開始我也這麼認為，但說實話，我們在這一點上很相似
裡面，去過我家就會發現
世界。

passages.content:
In any case, please excuse me, but I should go back to my
drawings.
passages.content_zh:
無論如何，請原諒，但我該回去了
圖紙。

passages.content: <[...]>Your drawings?
Agedia shows you a colourful notebook.
passages.content_zh: Agedia 向您展示了一本彩色筆記本。

passages.content:
I got this and the quill when I first transformed into a Magical
Girl. They're much better than what I had back home, but
I still haven't gotten the hang of it quite yet.
passages.content_zh:
当我第一次变身为魔法师时，我得到了这个和羽毛笔
女孩。它們比我在家裡吃的要好得多，但是
我還沒有完全掌握它的竅門。

passages.content:
Oh, but say...

Would you mind if I draw you some day?
passages.content_zh:
哦，但是說...

你介意有一天我畫你嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>I don't mind.

Then please look forward to it, . I'm sure you will love
it.
passages.content_zh:
那就請大家期待吧。我相信你會喜歡的
它。

passages.content: <[...]>(The freezers are locked during the day.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（冰箱白天是鎖著的。）

passages.content: <[...]>(I think one is enough.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（我認為一個就足夠了。）

passages.content: Obtained Loli Cola.
passages.content_zh: 獲得蘿莉可樂。

passages.content: <[...]>Cola, nice!
<[...]>Wait, "Loli Cola"? Never heard of that brand before.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>等等，「蘿莉可樂」？以前從未聽過這個品牌。

passages.content: Obtained Gob-Gob Pudding.
passages.content_zh: 獲得戈布戈布布丁。

passages.content: <[...]>(This pudding doesn't seem very appetising.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（這個布丁看起來不太有食慾。）

passages.content: Obtained Questionable Alcohol.
passages.content_zh: 獲得了可疑的酒精。

passages.content: <[...]>...Should there really be alcohol in here?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>...這裡真的應該有酒精嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>(A plastic plant. And there's all sorts of weird old food dumped
in here. I guess a real plant wouldn't survive very long in this
environment.)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（塑膠植物。還有各種奇怪的舊食物被傾倒
在這裡。我猜真正的植物在這裡面活不了多久
環境。 ）

passages.content: Would you like more spaghetti, ?
passages.content_zh: 您想要更多義大利麵嗎？

passages.content: I, ahh... Sure, I guess. It is pretty good.
passages.content_zh: 我，啊...當然，我想。這是相當不錯的。

passages.content:
Here you go!

I know some people don't think that spaghetti is a good
breakfast food, but it's the only food magic I know, so I figured
it would be alright for today.
passages.content_zh:
幹得好！

我知道有些人認為義大利麵不好
早餐食物，但這是我所知道的唯一食物魔法，所以我想
今天就可以了。

passages.content:
Look, this is nice and all, but can we just get this over with?
It's weird sitting down with all of you.
passages.content_zh:
聽著，這一切都很好，但是我們能結束這一切嗎？
和你們大家坐在一起感覺很奇怪。

passages.content:
The feeling is very much mutual.

, would you please explain why you had us all gather
here like this?
passages.content_zh:
這種感覺是非常相互的。

，請你解釋為什麼讓我們大家聚在一起
這裡是這樣嗎？

passages.content:
And it had better be good. I'm skipping my morning spa
session to be here.
passages.content_zh:
而且最好是好的。我不做早上的水療
會議將在這裡舉行。

passages.content:
<[...]>As of today, I am in charge of 's Magical Girl training.
I'm essentially going to be her counsellor going forward.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>從今天開始，我負責魔法少女的訓練。
今後我基本上將成為她的顧問。

passages.content:
Really? Minion, I'm so proud of you! Already subjugating
your inferiors... And here I thought that silly moral code
of yours would keep you from evolving this far.
passages.content_zh:
真的嗎？小敏，我為你感到驕傲！已經征服了
你的下等人......在這裡我認為愚蠢的道德準則
你的那些會阻止你進化到這一步。

passages.content: Watch the "inferior" talk, short stuff.
passages.content_zh: 觀看“低等”談話，簡短的內容。

passages.content:
<[...]>Wait, , I need to make sure you understand what this is.
 is my\fi responsibility\fr, not my minion.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>等等，我需要確保你明白這是什麼。
 是我\fi的責任\fr，而不是我的奴才。

passages.content:
...So we can't force her to come to my tea parties and play
with my dolls?
passages.content_zh:
……所以我們不能強迫她來我的茶會玩
和我的娃娃一起？

passages.content: <[...]>No, but if you ask her nicely, maybe she'll say yes.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>不，但如果你善意地問她，也許她會答應。

passages.content: , would you like to-[...]
passages.content_zh: ， 你是否想要-[...]

passages.content: Not a chance in hell.
passages.content_zh: 地獄裡沒有機會。

passages.content:
<[...]>Everyone, please! I need us all to at least\fi try\fr to get along.
If  gets in trouble again, the consequences come down
on me as well, so let's all try really hard to make this work,
okay?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>請大家！我需要我們所有人至少\fi嘗試\fr相處。
如果再惹麻煩，後果自負
對我來說也是如此，所以讓我們都努力讓這項工作成功，
好嗎？

passages.content: I'll try, .
passages.content_zh: 我會盡力， 。

passages.content: <[...]>Thank you, . Now how about you two?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>謝謝你，。現在你們兩個怎麼樣？

passages.content: Hmmm...

...Of course! I am thrilled to welcome you into our circle of
friendship. May this be the start of a fruitful alliance for us all.
passages.content_zh:
……當然！我很高興歡迎您加入我們的圈子
友誼。願這成為我們大家富有成效的聯盟的開始。

passages.content:
...She's going to try to kill me the first moment she thinks
she can get away with it, isn't she?
passages.content_zh:
……她一想到就會想殺了我
她可以逃脫懲罰，不是嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Yes... but that's about as good a response as I expected...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>是的...但這與我預期的反應差不多...

passages.content:
Alright. Thank you, .

Now how about you, ? Can we at least keep things
professional between us until graduation?
passages.content_zh:
好吧。謝謝你， 。

現在你呢？我們至少可以保留東西嗎
我們之間的專業一直到畢業嗎？

passages.content: ...I suppose. But no tricks or you\fi will\fr regret it.
passages.content_zh: ……我想。但不要有任何技巧，否則你會後悔的。

passages.content:
Considering what the Director will do to me if I get caught
messing up again, you have my word.
passages.content_zh:
考慮一下如果我被抓住導演會對我做什麼
又搞砸了，我向你保證。

passages.content:
<[...]>Alright! Now that that's out of the way, let's move on to the
other things I wanted to talk about.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>好吧！現在這已經不成問題了，讓我們繼續
我想談的其他事情。

passages.content:
<[...]>First, I think there's something  would like to say to all
of us. Isn't that right?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>首先，我想有一些話想對大家說
我們。是不是這樣？

passages.content: ...You're really going to make me do this?
passages.content_zh: ……你真的要讓我這麼做嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>It's either this... or Ayame.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>要嘛是這個…要嘛是綾雨。

passages.content:
*Gulp*

...I'm sorry for stealing those cores from you. It was rude
of me to take advantage of you clueless twerps and I-[...]
passages.content_zh:
*咕嚕咕嚕*

……我很抱歉偷走了你的那些核心。這很粗魯
讓我利用你們這些無知的傻瓜，我-[...]

passages.content: <[...]>Hey, no insulting us in the apology!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嘿，道歉中不要侮辱我們！

passages.content: Fine, fine. I'm sorry I robbed you all. Okay?
passages.content_zh: 很好，很好。對不起，我搶了你們所有人。好的？

passages.content: <[...]>Almost. We just need one more thing from you...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>幾乎。我們只需要你再做一件事...

passages.content: Eugh... Alright, here.
passages.content_zh: 呃……好吧，就到這裡。

passages.content: ...But what about the rest?
passages.content_zh: ……但是剩下的呢？

passages.content:
I don't have 'em. If you want the other cores, you'll have to
take it up with their new owners.
passages.content_zh:
我沒有。如果你想要其他核心，你必須
與他們的新主人一起解決這個問題。

passages.content:
That's okay. We're one step closer to getting them all back now!
That's still pretty good news.
passages.content_zh:
沒關係。現在我們離讓他們全部回來又更近了一步！
這仍然是一個相當好的消息。

passages.content: And I'm sure we won't have any trouble with the others.
passages.content_zh: 我確信我們不會與其他人發生任何麻煩。

passages.content:
Hey, this is the Gloom Core! This was lost back on Earth when
we saved your worthless hide from that bat Magico!
passages.content_zh:
嘿，這是幽暗核心！當它回到地球時，它就失去了
我們從蝙蝠 Magico 手中拯救了你毫無價值的獸皮！

passages.content:
Oh~! That's certainly interesting.

Good observation, ...
passages.content_zh:
哦~！這當然很有趣。

善於觀察，...

passages.content: Now how did something like this end up in your possession?
passages.content_zh: 那麼這樣的東西怎麼會落在你的手上呢？

passages.content:
*Sigh*

Isn't it obvious? I lied back in the Director's office when
we were being debriefed.
passages.content_zh:
*嘆息*

這不是很明顯嗎？我躺在主任辦公室裡
我們正在接受報告。

passages.content:
I figured it would make her angrier if she thought the core
was lost. What I hadn't considered was the possibility that
she'd punish me for it, given I'd already graduated from this
hell hole.
passages.content_zh:
我想如果她想到核心的話會讓她更生氣
迷路了。我沒有考慮到的可能性是
她會為此懲罰我，因為我已經從這個專業畢業了
地獄洞。

passages.content: My mistake, I suppose...
passages.content_zh: 我的錯誤，我想...

passages.content: You are such a little sneak! How can you live with yourself!?
passages.content_zh: 你真是個小鬼啊！你怎麼能和自己一起生活！ ？

passages.content: Now, now, . No need for that.
passages.content_zh: 現在，現在，。沒必要這樣。

passages.content: ...Aren't you angry about this?
passages.content_zh: ……你不生氣嗎？

passages.content:
Not at all! She's just trying to save face, but the fact is that
her little scheme got her demoted while we walked away as
heroes for defeating a wild Magico.
passages.content_zh:
一點也不！她只是想挽回面子，但事實是
她的小計劃讓她被降職，而我們卻走開了
擊敗野生魔法師的英雄。

passages.content:
scoops up the Gloom Core from the table and begins
openly admiring it.
passages.content_zh:
從桌子上拿起幽暗核心並開始
公開地欣賞它。

passages.content: It's okay, . We forgive you.
passages.content_zh: 沒關係， 。我們原諒你。

passages.content:
I swear, as soon as I'm no longer under watch by that
psychopath , you're as good as-[...]
passages.content_zh:
我發誓，一旦我不再受到它的監視
精神病患，你就像-[...]

passages.content: ...Right.

A hush falls over the table, broken only by the sound of
nervously slurping up another mouthful of delicious mushroom
spaghetti.
passages.content_zh:
桌上一片寂靜，只有聲音打破了
緊張地又吞了一口美味的蘑菇
義大利麵。

passages.content:
<[...]>...Anyway, now that that's settled, there's something on my
mind I need to ask you about.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>...總之，既然事情已經解決了，我的事情就發生了。
我需要問你一下。

passages.content:
<[...]>Back on that zombie planet, you said that there was a place
you wanted me to see.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>回到那個殭屍星球，你說過有個地方
你想讓我看到。

passages.content: You've been to Phyre's Tower before, right?
passages.content_zh: 你以前去過菲瑞塔，對吧？

passages.content:
<[...]>Back on that zombie planet, you were saying that you couldn't
leave the camp, which doesn't make any sense. I figured
getting away from the Director would be your highest priority.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>回到那個殭屍星球，你說你不能
離開營地，這沒有任何意義。我想
遠離主任將是你的首要任務。

passages.content:
I was just trying to avoid getting sent to Director Ayame's
place. Do you know what they do to people there? It's horrible!
passages.content_zh:
我只是想避免被送到綾女主任那裡
地方。你知道他們對那裡的人做了什麼嗎？太可怕了！

passages.content:
<[...]>It sounded to me like there was something important here
that you still needed to take care of. Do you want to tell us
what that's all about?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我覺得這裡有一些重要的東西
你仍然需要照顧。你想告訴我們嗎
這是怎麼回事？

passages.content:
...Fine, so maybe there\fi is\fr something I need to do here.
And since I'm stuck trusting all of you now, I guess maybe
you can help me with that.
passages.content_zh:
……好吧，也許有\fi是\fr我需要在這裡做的事情。
既然我現在不得不相信你們所有人，我想也許
你可以幫助我。

passages.content: Of course we'll help!
passages.content_zh: 我們當然會幫忙！

passages.content: We certainly would\fi love\fr to!
passages.content_zh: 我們當然會\fi喜歡\fr！

passages.content: ...I suppose.
passages.content_zh: ……我想。

passages.content: Okay. You've been to Phyre's Tower before, right?
passages.content_zh: 好的。你以前去過菲瑞塔，對吧？

passages.content: <[...]>Yes, but we never finished exploring all of it.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>是的，但我們從未完成所有內容的探索。

passages.content:
That's for the best. It's pretty dangerous in there if you don't
know what you're doing.
passages.content_zh:
這是最好的。如果你不這樣做的話那裡很危險
知道你在做什麼。

passages.content:
Is that your way of saying you don't think we know what we're
doing?
passages.content_zh:
這就是你說你不認為我們知道自己是什麼的方式嗎
在做什麼？

passages.content:
In that tower? I'm certain you don't.

Phyre experimented with all sorts of things she shouldn't
have.
passages.content_zh:
在那座塔里？我確信你不知道。

Phyre 嘗試了各種她不該做的事情
有。

passages.content: <[...]> and the others went that one time.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>和其他人也去過一次。

passages.content: <[...]>I was asleep though.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>不過我已經睡著了。

passages.content: That's pretty dumb, going without your team leader. But whatever.
passages.content_zh: 沒有你的團隊領導，這太愚蠢了。但無論如何。

passages.content: We didn't find anything anyway.
passages.content_zh: 無論如何我們什麼也沒發現。

passages.content: <[...]>Yes, though there are parts of it we weren't able to access.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>是的，儘管我們無法存取其中的某些部分。

passages.content:
I'm not surprised you couldn't find your way in. My old
counselor was obsessed with keeping her secrets.
passages.content_zh:
我對你找不到路並不感到驚訝。我的老
輔導員熱衷於保守她的秘密。

passages.content: Secrets? Was she hiding things from the Director?
passages.content_zh: 秘密？難道她有事瞞著導演？

passages.content:
Of course! She was a literal mad scientist. She was keeping
secrets from everybody.

Given all the fucked-up things she was experimenting with,
she had to.
passages.content_zh:
當然！她是一位名副其實的瘋狂科學家。她當時正守著
每個人的秘密。

考慮到她正在嘗試的所有該死的事情，
她不得不這樣做。

passages.content:
<[...]>And you want us to go in there with you and just kind of poke
around until we find something important?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你希望我們跟你一起去那裡，只是戳一下
直到我們找到重要的東西？

passages.content:
That about sums it up.

You already know that the Director has done some pretty
questionable things, but she's a saint compared to Phyre. And
the easiest way for me to prove it is to just show it all to you.
passages.content_zh:
這大約總結了這一點。

你已經知道導演做了一些漂亮的事情
這是值得懷疑的事情，但與菲雷相比，她是個聖人。並且
對我來說，證明這一點的最簡單方法就是將其全部展示給您。

passages.content:
That's all very interesting, but you still haven't explained
why exactly you need to go there so badly.
passages.content_zh:
這很有趣，但你還沒解釋
為什麼你這麼需要去那裡。

passages.content:
I guess I didn't... But I do need to go there, and I have a
much better chance of getting in and out of there alive if you
all come with me. What do you say?
passages.content_zh:
我想我沒有……但我確實需要去那裡，而且我有一個
如果你活著進出那裡的機會更大
都跟我來。你怎麼說？

passages.content: <[...]>...We'll help you.

As the most technologically advanced species present,
I volunteer to handle disposal of any advanced weapons of
mass destruction we might come across.
passages.content_zh:
作為目前技術最先進的物種，
我自願處理任何先進武器的處置
我們可能會遇到大規模破壞。

passages.content: <[...]>That's very generous of you, ...
I need to prepare a few things, but I'd like to do this soon.
passages.content_zh: 我需要準備一些東西，但我想盡快完成。

passages.content:
Good. Come by my room in the morning when you're ready
to make this happen.
passages.content_zh:
好的。早上你準備好了就來我的房間吧
為了實現這一目標。

passages.content: ...And here's yours! Breakfast is served!
passages.content_zh: ……這是你的！早餐供應了！

passages.content: ...Spaghetti for breakfast?
passages.content_zh: ....早餐吃義大利麵嗎？

passages.content: It's the only food magic I know. Is that okay?
passages.content_zh: 這是我所知道的唯一的食物魔法。可以嗎？

passages.content:
*Slurp*

Of course! Spaghetti is a fun food. It's a scientific fact.
passages.content_zh:
*咕嚕咕嚕*

當然！義大利麵是一種有趣的食物。這是一個科學事實。

passages.content:
Right. By all means, enjoy it, but I think I'll pass. Aren't
there any other options available here? Ones with less unusual
ingredients?
passages.content_zh:
正確的。無論如何，享受它，但我想我會過去的。不是
這裡還有其他選擇嗎？那些不那麼異常的
成分？

passages.content:
...What do you mean by "unusual ingredients"?

, what's in your spaghetti?
passages.content_zh:
……「不尋常的成分」是什麼意思？

，你的義大利麵裡有什麼？

passages.content: You know... normal spaghetti stuff...?
passages.content_zh: 你知道嗎...普通的義大利麵...？

passages.content:
Are you summoning this spaghetti from Hell? Am I eating
demon noodles?
passages.content_zh:
你是從地獄召喚這個義大利麵嗎？我在吃東西嗎
惡魔麵條？

passages.content:
Well... I guess so? But it should be fine!

It's my mom's recipe.
passages.content_zh:
嗯……我想是這樣吧？不過應該沒問題吧！

這是我媽媽的食譜。

passages.content: ...I think I've had enough for today as well. Where's Giselle?
passages.content_zh: ……我想我今天也受夠了。吉賽爾在哪裡？

passages.content:
<[...]>Normally she'd be here, but Giselle was given the day off to
relax after what happened during the camping trip.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>通常她會在這裡，但是吉賽兒放了一天假
在露營旅行期間發生的事情之後放鬆一下。

passages.content:
<Giselle>That's true, but the Director never disabled my compulsion
to serve others, so having a day off is actually torture for me!

Is there anything I can get you?
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>確實如此，但導演並沒有解除我的強迫症
為了服務別人，所以休息一天對我來說其實是一種折磨！

有什麼我可以給你的嗎？

passages.content:
Ah, perfect timing! I will have a strawberry milkshake. How
about the rest of you?
passages.content_zh:
啊，完美的時機！我要一杯草莓奶昔。如何
你們其他人呢？

passages.content: One vanilla milkshake, please. Extra thick.
passages.content_zh: 請來一杯香草奶昔。特厚。

passages.content:
And if you have the time, could you please bake me some
brownies?
passages.content_zh:
如果你有時間的話，可以烤一些給我嗎
布朗尼蛋糕？

passages.content:
<Giselle>Of course! One strawberry milkshake, one vanilla, and a tray
of brownies. I'll get started on those right away!
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>當然！一份草莓奶昔、一份香草和一個托盤
布朗尼蛋糕。我會立即開始處理這些！

passages.content:
is so glad you saved Giselle. The camp would feel all
wrong without him.
passages.content_zh:
很高興你救了吉賽兒。營地會感覺到一切
沒有他就錯了。

passages.content: You mean "her".
passages.content_zh: 你說的是「她」。

passages.content: Oh. Right. My mistake.
passages.content_zh: 哦。正確的。我的錯誤。

passages.content:
<[...]>Yeah... but it's still bothering me that  was taken
away. That's actually why I asked you all to meet me here
this morning.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>是的...但它仍然困扰着我
離開。這其實就是為什麼我邀請大家來這裡見我
今天早上。

passages.content: What happened to her?
passages.content_zh: 她怎麼了？

passages.content:
<[...]>Apparently, Director  got tired of putting up with 's
behaviour and sent her off to another training centre in
Japan.

 did not seem happy about it.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>顯然，主管已經厭倦了忍受
行為並把她送到另一個訓練中心
日本。

 似乎對此並不高興。

passages.content: The Magical Café? From what I've heard, it's a lovely place.
passages.content_zh: 神奇的咖啡館？據我所知，這是一個可愛的地方。

passages.content:
<[...]> would disagree with you on that point. When
 and I were carrying her back through the
portal, it was like she'd just... given up on everything.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]> 在這一點上不同意你的觀點。當
 我背著她穿過
傳送門，就好像她剛剛……放棄了一切。

passages.content:
She was so sad on the trip back after that battle. I hope she
finds a way to feel better someday.
passages.content_zh:
那場戰鬥結束後，她在回來的路上非常難過。我希望她
有一天會找到讓自己感覺更好的方法。

passages.content: Why? She was a menace! Good riddance, if you ask me.
passages.content_zh: 為什麼？她是一個威脅！如果你問我的話，那就好了。

passages.content:
<[...]>Well, what's done is done and I don't think she's coming back
here any time soon.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>好吧，事情已經過去了，我認為她不會再回來了
很快就會到這裡。

passages.content: <[...]>On the plus side, I did find this outside my door this morning.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>從好的方面來說，今天早上我確實在門外發現了這個。

passages.content: The stolen cores!
passages.content_zh: 被偷的核心！

passages.content:
Are you sure? I don't think they're all here... but look,
here's the core that dropped when we beat up that
Gloomwing!
passages.content_zh:
你確定嗎？我不認為他們都在這裡...但是你看
這是當我們擊敗它時掉落的核心
暗翼！

passages.content:
Huh. Maybe Nele's fairy agents found it and decided we
earned it... But what about the rest of them?
passages.content_zh:
呵呵。也許尼爾的仙女特工發現了它並決定我們
賺到了……但是其他人呢？

passages.content:
<[...]>I think  sent over what she found while dealing
with 's things. The others must still be in the hands of
her team mates.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我想已經把她在交易時發現的東西寄過來了
與 的事。其他的肯定還在自己手上
她的隊友們。

passages.content: Well, we'll just collect those ourselves, now won't we?
passages.content_zh: 好吧，我們自己收集這些，不是嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>Eventually, but first there's something else that's been
bugging me regarding .

I made a promise to her right before she passed out.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>最終，但首先還有其他一些事情
打擾我關於 .

在她昏倒之前我向她做出了承諾。

passages.content:
<[...]>She was saying that she needed to do something here, and
she made me swear that I would try to do it. She seemed
really intent about whatever it was.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>她說她需要在這裡做點什麼，然後
她讓我發誓我會盡力做到這一點。她似乎
真正專注於無論它是什麼。

passages.content: What was the promise?
passages.content_zh: 承諾是什麼？

passages.content: <[...]>...I have no idea.
Wait, she didn't tell you what she wanted you to do?
passages.content_zh: 等等，她沒有告訴你她想讓你做什麼？

passages.content:
<[...]>Not really, no. So now I feel awful about it because I feel
like I made a promise I know I can't fulfil.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>不完全是，不。所以現在我對此感覺很糟糕因為我覺得
就像我做出了一個我知道無法實現的承諾。

passages.content:
Don't let it bother you. They're just words. A meaningless
promise to someone who will never know the difference.
Getting upset over it makes no sense at all.
passages.content_zh:
別讓它打擾你。它們只是言語。一個無意義的
向永遠不知道其中差異的人承諾。
為它感到不安根本沒有意義。

passages.content: <[...]>I suppose...
<Giselle>Actually, maybe I could help with that...
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>事實上，也許我可以幫忙...

passages.content: Food slave! Were you spying on us?
passages.content_zh: 糧食奴隸！你在監視我們嗎？

passages.content:
<Giselle>I'm sorry! It's hard not to hear what you're saying, especially
when the cafeteria is empty like this.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>對不起！很難聽不到你在說什麼，尤其是
當食堂像這樣空蕩蕩的時候。

passages.content: <Giselle>But first, here's your order!
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>但是首先，這是你的訂單！

passages.content: ...Be glad that I enjoy strawberry so much.
passages.content_zh: ....很高興我這麼喜歡草莓。

passages.content:
*Suck suck suck*

Mmmm... Thank you very much.
passages.content_zh:
*吸吸吸*

嗯……非常感謝。

passages.content:
<Giselle>My pleasure.

...You, uh, seem to have a little on your chin there.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>我很高興。

……你，呃，下巴上好像有一點。

passages.content: Sorry! It's just so good.
passages.content_zh: 對不起！真是太好了。

passages.content:
wipes the white fluid up with her finger and then slowly
sucks it clean, eyes closed and moaning softly.
passages.content_zh:
用手指擦去白色液體，然後慢慢地
吸乾淨，閉上眼睛，輕輕呻吟。

passages.content: <[...]>You, uh, sure seem to be enjoying that...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你，呃，看起來確實很享受...

passages.content: Use a napkin next time!!!
passages.content_zh: 下次用紙巾！ ！ ！

passages.content:
<Giselle>...Wow.

But as I was saying, I might be able to help you figure out
what  wanted. She gave me this book for safe-keeping.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>...哇。

但正如我所說，我也許可以幫助你弄清楚
想要什麼。她把這本書交給我保管。

passages.content: <[...]>Huh. What is it?

<Giselle>It's a notebook from back when she was studying under
Phyre. I think she suspected that her room was being
searched, so she asked me to keep her notes safe.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>這是她讀書時的筆記本
菲雷。我認為她懷疑她的房間被人
搜尋過，所以她要求我妥善保管她的筆記。

passages.content: <Giselle>I guess she thought I was beneath Phyre's attention.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>我猜她認為我受到了菲雷的關注。

passages.content:
<[...]>This is all about Phyre's Tower and how to bypass the locks
and traps inside! With this, we might just be able to break
in and figure out what she was talking about!
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>這是關於菲瑞之塔以及如何繞過鎖的全部內容
裡面還有陷阱！有了這個，我們或許就能打破
進來弄清楚她在說什麼！

passages.content:
How do we know this isn't just another trap? She might have
planted that journal, knowing it was her last shot at pranking
you hard.
passages.content_zh:
我們怎麼知道這不只是另一個陷阱？她可能有
種下那本日記，知道這是她惡作劇的最後機會
你辛苦了。

passages.content:
<Giselle>Oh, no, this is from long before  even showed up in
camp. It's real.
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>哦，不，這是很久以前出現的
營地。這是真的。

passages.content:
<[...]>Do you mind if we take this with us? It could really come
in handy.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你介意我們帶著這個嗎？它真的可以來
派上用場。

passages.content:
<Giselle>Of course not! And if you do find out anything about 's
past in there, let me know. She was always so secretive
about things...
passages.content_zh:
<吉賽兒>當然不是！如果你確實發現了關於 的任何事情
過去那裡，請告訴我。她總是那麼神秘
關於事情...

passages.content: You two were friends, huh?
passages.content_zh: 你們兩個是朋友吧？

passages.content: <Giselle>...Yes, I think so. I'm going to miss her.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>...是的，我想是的。我會想念她的。

passages.content:
<[...]>I understand. You'll be the first to know if we find out
anything.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我明白了。如果我們發現的話，您將是第一個知道的人
任何東西。

passages.content: <Giselle>Thank you! And good luck.
passages.content_zh: <吉賽兒>謝謝你！祝你好運。

passages.content:
<Magical Maid Minion>Dear player, it seems that you have reached the current
end of content, but don't despair! The\fb Magical Camp\fr
team is already hard at work on the next update.
passages.content_zh:
<魔法女僕小兵>親愛的玩家，您似乎已經到達了當前的階段
內容結束了，但不要絕望！魔法營\fb\fr
團隊已經在努力進行下一次更新。

passages.content:
<Magical Maid Minion>It is also possible that there is side content you have not
yet come across. Please feel free to examine the cheat sheet
in the blue dorm - located next to the debug switch - to see
if you have missed anything.
passages.content_zh:
<魔法女仆小兵>也有可能有你没有的支线内容
但還是遇到了。請隨時檢查備忘單
在藍色宿舍 - 位於調試開關旁 - 看看
如果你錯過了什麼。

passages.content: Oh! H-Hello, Miss ! Would you like to join me for supper?
passages.content_zh: 哦！ H-您好，小姐！你願意和我一起吃晚餐嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Sure, that sounds nice.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>當然，聽起來不錯。

passages.content:
*Giggle*

Good. I was hoping you would come by.
passages.content_zh:
*咯咯笑*

很好。我本來希望你能過來。

passages.content: Sooo, ummm... How was your day?
passages.content_zh: 蘇，嗯...今天過得怎麼樣？

passages.content:
<[...]>We were in the Sealed Archives in the morning. That place
is full of books, but many of them are magical and very
dangerous.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>早上我們來到了密封檔案館。那個地方
到處都是書，但其中很多都是神奇的，非常
危險的。

passages.content: Oh... Then I won't go there until I'm stronger.
passages.content_zh: 喔……那等我變強了我就不去了。

passages.content: <[...]>That's good to hear.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>很高興聽到這個消息。

passages.content: <[...]>It was okay. Nothing special. Another day of training, y'know?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>沒關係。沒什麼特別的。又是一天的訓練，知道嗎？

passages.content: I guess even training can be boring.
passages.content_zh: 我想即使是訓練也會很無聊。

passages.content:
<[...]>We did some scouting on a dungeon. We'll probably tackle it
some other day, though.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我們在地牢裡進行了一些偵察。我們可能會解決這個問題
不過，改天吧。

passages.content: Everyone says that preparation is important, so I get that.
passages.content_zh: 大家都說準備很重要，我懂。

passages.content: <[...]>Not so great... My team got beat up, it was pretty close...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>不太好...我的團隊被擊敗了，但非常接近...

passages.content:
<[...]>Not so great... My team got beat up, though at least no
harm done.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>不太好...我的團隊被打敗了，但至少沒有
造成的傷害。

passages.content: Awww, that's no good!
passages.content_zh: 哎喲，這樣不好啊！

passages.content: <[...]>Well, I'm sure tomorrow will go better.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>好吧，我相信明天會更好。

passages.content: You're looking on the bright side despite it?
passages.content_zh: 儘管如此，你還是看到了光明的一面嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Pretty much. Mistakes happen, so better here than out there.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>差不多了。错误总会发生，所以这里比外面好。

passages.content: <[...]>Not so great... To be honest, I'd rather not talk about it.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>不太好...說實話，我不想談論它。

passages.content: Oh no! I'm so sorry.
passages.content_zh: 哦不！我很抱歉。

passages.content: <[...]>It's okay. At least we all got out alive.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>沒關係。至少我們都活著出去了。

passages.content:
<[...]>Today went pretty well! My team really managed to work
together!
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>今天過得很順利！我的團隊確實成功地工作了
一起！

passages.content: That's nice to hear.
passages.content_zh: 很高興聽到這個消息。

passages.content: <[...]>How about yourself? How was your day?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那你自己呢？你今天過得怎麼樣？

passages.content: Ummm... It was fine...
passages.content_zh: 嗯……還好……

passages.content:
<[...]>Somehow I don't think you're being honest with me. What's
wrong?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>不知何故，我認為你對我並不誠實。怎麼了？

passages.content:
...I messed up at training. I let Miss  down today and
now she's angry with me.
passages.content_zh:
……我在訓練中搞砸了。我今天讓小姐失望了
現在她對我很生氣。

passages.content:
<[...]>Don't be silly! I'm sure she's not angry at you. She just wants
you to do well here.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>別傻了！我確信她沒有生你的氣。她只是想要
你在這裡做得很好。

passages.content: But I'm not doing well! I'm terrible at this!
passages.content_zh: 但我過得併不好！我對此很糟糕！

passages.content:
I don't even have a team yet, but Miss  wants me to
train anyway, so she had me go to that old palace full of
slime.
passages.content_zh:
我什至还没有团队，但小姐希望我能
无论如何，火车，所以她让我去那个充满了
粘液。

passages.content: <[...]>...All by yourself!?

She said that since the Magico there was already beaten,
I could practice on the weak minions that were left, but
I messed it all up.
passages.content_zh:
她說既然Magico那裡已經被打了，
我可以用剩下的弱小兵來練習，但是
我把一切都搞砸了。

passages.content:
A weird naked blue lady threw her boogies at me and a rat
bit my leg and I ran back to camp as fast as I could.
passages.content_zh:
一個奇怪的裸體藍色女士向我和一隻老鼠扔了她的布吉
咬住我的腿，我以最快的速度跑回營地。

passages.content:
<[...]>Oh, , that's terrible! You really shouldn't be trying
that sort of thing without a team. I'm honestly surprised
 thought that was a good idea.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>哦，太糟糕了！你真的不應該嘗試
沒有團隊就可以做這樣的事情。老實說我很驚訝
 我認為這是個好主意。

passages.content: She said that she's worried that I'll fall behind if I don't try.
passages.content_zh: 她說她擔心我如果不努力就會落後。

passages.content:
When I got back, she told me I should ask you for some
extra training. So I guess after dinner we can do that...
passages.content_zh:
當我回來時，她告訴我我應該向你要一些
額外的培訓。所以我想晚餐後我們可以這樣做...

passages.content:
<[...]>But you must be exhausted by what you went through today
already.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>但是今天經歷的事情一定讓你筋疲力盡
已經。

passages.content: I am a little tired...
passages.content_zh: 我有點累了...

passages.content: <[...]>Hmmm... Okay, I have an idea!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嗯...好吧，我有一個主意！

passages.content:
watches in confusion as you reach over and pick up
a delicious Gob-Gob brand Shish-KeGob from her plate and
hold it in the air.
passages.content_zh:
當你伸手接起時，你困惑地看著
她的盤子裡有美味的 Gob-Gob 牌 Shish-KeGob 和
將其舉在空中。

passages.content:
<[...]>Tonight, we'll work on target practice! I want you to blow up
this rat on a stick.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>今晚，我們將進行目標練習！我要你爆炸
這隻老鼠在棍子上。

passages.content: *Giggle*

*Giggle*

...Ewwww, that's not really rat meat, is it???
passages.content_zh:
*咯咯笑*

……Ewwww，那不是真正的老鼠肉，是嗎？ ？ ？

passages.content: <[...]>I don't know. The food here is really suspicious sometimes...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我不知道。這裡的食物有時真的很可疑...

passages.content: You're being silly.
passages.content_zh: 你真傻。

passages.content: But either way, I was told not to play with my food!
passages.content_zh: 但無論如何，我被告知不要玩弄我的食物！

passages.content: <[...]>This isn't play. This is\fi super serious training!\fr
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這不是玩。這是\fi超嚴肅的訓練！ \fr

passages.content: <[...]>Just pick up your wand, take aim, and... blammo!!!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>只要拿起你的魔杖，瞄準，然後...blammo！ ！ ！

passages.content:
...Okay... Give me a second so I don't accidentally hit
you...
passages.content_zh:
……好吧...給我一點時間，這樣我就不會不小心撞到了
你...

passages.content:
You reach the kebob out as far away from your body as you
can. Some of the other girls in the cafeteria have taken
notice and are watching, amused. Others get out of the way,
just in case.
passages.content_zh:
你將烤肉串伸到離身體盡可能遠的地方
運河食堂裡的其他一些女孩已經採取了
注意到並正在觀看，被逗樂了。其他人讓開，
以防萬一。

passages.content: Caustic Ray!
passages.content_zh: 腐蝕性射線！

passages.content:
A ray of green energy erupts from 's staff and strikes
the morsel of "meat" at the end of the stick. A moment later,
all that remains in your hand is a rapidly-disintegrating wooden
stub.
passages.content_zh:
一道綠色能量從法杖上爆發而出，襲來
棍子末端的一小塊「肉」。過了一會兒，
你手中剩下的只是一個快速分解的木頭
存根。

passages.content: <[...]>Riiight, I forgot your magic was so... melty.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>好吧，我忘了你的魔法是如此...融化。

passages.content: I-I didn't hit you, did I!?
passages.content_zh: 我、我沒有打你吧！ ？

passages.content: <[...]>Nah, I'm fine. Still got all my fingers, see?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>不，我很好。我的手指還剩著，懂嗎？

passages.content:
You grin as you show the young girl your hands and splayed
fingers. Her worry is quickly replaced with a relieved smile.
passages.content_zh:
你微笑著向年輕女孩展示你的雙手並張開
手指。她的擔憂很快就被如釋重負的微笑取代。

passages.content:
<[...]>Oh. I was expecting something... cuter, maybe? Not so
acidic.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>哦。我在期待一些……更可愛的東西，也許？並非如此
呈酸性。

passages.content: Sorry, it's just what I know how to do.
passages.content_zh: 抱歉，這只是我知道該怎麼做。

passages.content: I can also heal, though!
passages.content_zh: 不過我也能治癒！

passages.content:
<[...]>That's good! Being able to do both makes you more versatile.
That's always a good thing.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>那很好！能夠做到這兩點會讓你變得更多才多藝。
這總是一件好事。

passages.content:
seems much more relaxed now than when you first
arrived. Suddenly overtaken by her exhaustion, she covers
her mouth as she yawns.
passages.content_zh:
現在看起來比剛開始時輕鬆多了
到了。突然，她感到精疲力盡，她摀住了
她打哈欠時的嘴。

passages.content:
<[...]>You've had a pretty rough day already, haven't you? Maybe
we should just get you off to bed. I know I always feel better
after a good night's sleep.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你已經度過了相當艱難的一天，不是嗎？也許
我們應該讓你去睡覺。我知道我總是感覺更好
經過一夜良好的睡眠後。

passages.content: Don't we need to keep training?
passages.content_zh: 我們不需要繼續訓練嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>Not today. There's no point in forcing it any further when
you need rest. Next time, we'll take it a little more seriously,
alright?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>今天不行。沒有必要再強迫它了
你需要休息。下次我們會認真一點
好吧？

passages.content: Okay!
With dinner settled, you take the young girl to her room.
passages.content_zh: 吃完晚飯，你帶著小女孩去她的房間。

passages.content:
<[...]>Sorry, . I'm busy right now. We'll hang out some other
time, okay?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>抱歉，。我現在很忙。我們會出去玩其他的
時間，好嗎？

passages.content: What happens if Isabelle is left un-dinnered until after ZW?
passages.content_zh: 如果伊莎貝爾直到 ZW 之後才吃飯會怎樣？

passages.content:
<[...]>Oh, ! Funny running into you here. Looks like
you're enjoying some free time for once.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>哦，！在這裡遇見你真有趣。看起來像
你正在享受這一次的空閒時間。

passages.content:
Hello, . You are quite right; I decided it was about time
I took an evening off.
passages.content_zh:
你好， 。你說得很對；我決定是時候了
我請了一個晚上假。

passages.content: <[...]>Would you mind if I join you?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你介意我加入嗎？

passages.content: Wh-What? Join me?
passages.content_zh: 什-什麼？加入我嗎？

passages.content:
Your question seems to catch her off guard, and it takes a
moment before the look of honest surprise on her face is
replaced with a pleased smile.
passages.content_zh:
你的問題似乎讓她措手不及，需要一段時間
就在她臉上露出真誠的驚訝表情之前的那一刻
取而代之的是欣慰的笑容。

passages.content: ...Certainly. I would appreciate the company.
passages.content_zh: ……當然。我會很感激這家公司。

passages.content: So, ... umm...
How is your training proceeding?
passages.content_zh: 你的訓練進度如何？

passages.content: <[...]>It's going great! No troubles at all.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>進展順利！完全沒有麻煩。

passages.content:
<[...]>(Wait... why did I agree to this!? We don't have anything
to talk about except the camp, and I definitely can't let her
discover my secret!)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（等等...為什麼我要同意這個！？我們什麼都沒有
除了營地，我絕對不能讓她談論
發現我的秘密！ ）

passages.content:
That's good to hear. Your team has performed exceptionally
well thus far... even if you have required discipline on
occasion.
passages.content_zh:
很高興聽到這個消息。您的團隊表現出色
到目前為止...即使你有紀律要求
場合。

passages.content:
That's good to hear. Your team's performance thus far has
been exceptional, and I am certain it is in large part thanks
to your leadership.
passages.content_zh:
很高興聽到這個消息。您的團隊迄今為止的表現
非常出色，我確信這在很大程度上要感謝
給您的領導。

passages.content:
It's just a shame that you arrived at camp so late into the
curriculum.

Tell me, what kind of upbringing did you have? Any prior
combat training?
passages.content_zh:
真遺憾你這麼晚才到達營地
課程。

告訴我，你是受過什麼樣的教育？任何先前的
戰鬥訓練？

passages.content: <[...]>(Shit, shit shit! Gotta change the topic!)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（該死，該死！該換話題了！）

passages.content: <[...]>A-Actually, I was hoping we could talk about you tonight!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>A-事實上，我希望我們今晚能談談你！

passages.content:
<[...]>I'm just a regular person, I guess?

But actually, I was hoping we could talk about you tonight.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我只是一個普通人，我猜？

但實際上，我希望今晚我們能談談你。

passages.content: Me? Whatever for?
passages.content_zh: 我？為了什麼？

passages.content: <[...]>Why not? We're friends, right?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>為什麼不呢？我們是朋友，對吧？

passages.content: I... suppose that is a fair assessment of our relationship.
passages.content_zh: 我...認為這是對我們關係的公正評估。

passages.content: <[...]>And yet I know next to nothing about you.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>但我對你卻幾乎一無所知。

passages.content:
I generally find it inappropriate for camp staff to get too...
chummy with the trainees.
passages.content_zh:
我通常認為營地工作人員太不合適...
與練習生們關係融洽。

passages.content:
<[...]>That makes sense, at least for the newer trainees, but I'd
like to think I've proven myself by this point.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>這是有道理的，至少對於新學員來說，但我會
我想我已經在這一點上證明了自己。

passages.content: You\fi have\fr demonstrated yourself to be responsible...
passages.content_zh: 你\fi已經\fr證明了自己有責任感...

passages.content: <[...]>Thank you. So why not share something with me?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>謝謝。那為什麼不跟我分享一些東西呢？

passages.content: "Something"? As in...
passages.content_zh: 「某物」？正如在...

passages.content:
<[...]>Something personal. Something about you that not just
anyone gets to know.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>一些個人的東西。關於你的一些事情不僅僅是
任何人都會知道。

passages.content:
Responsible and\fi nosy\fr.

One thing, is that it? If I tell you one personal detail, you'll
be satisfied?
passages.content_zh:
負責任且\fi愛管閒事\fr。

一件事，是這樣嗎？如果我告訴你一個個人細節，你就會
滿意嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Absolutely. You have my word.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>當然。我向你保證。

passages.content: Fine. In that case... I am older than Director .
passages.content_zh: 美好的。那麼……我比主任還大。

passages.content: <[...]>Wait, really!? That's crazy! She's been alive for so long!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>等等，真的嗎！ ？太瘋狂了！她已經活了這麼久了！

passages.content:
She has been alive for close to two centuries, correct. But
I've been around longer.
passages.content_zh:
她已經活了近兩個世紀了，是的。但是
我已經呆得更久了。

passages.content: <[...]>So does that mean you're-[...]
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那麼這是否意味著你-[...]

passages.content:
Ah ah ah, have you forgotten already?

You gave me your word you would be satisfied with one
detail.
passages.content_zh:
啊啊啊，你已經忘記了嗎？

你向我保證你會對一個感到滿意
細節。

passages.content: <[...]>Really? I would've guessed you were a little younger.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>真的嗎？我猜你還年輕一點。

passages.content: Well, now you know better. Appearances can be deceiving.
passages.content_zh: 好吧，現在你知道更多了。外表可能具有欺騙性。

passages.content: Now, my turn.
passages.content_zh: 現在，輪到我了。

passages.content:
I shared something with you. So now you should have to
share something with me. It is only fair, after all.
passages.content_zh:
我和你分享了一些事情。所以現在你應該必須
與我分享一些東西。畢竟，這是公平的。

passages.content:
<[...]>I suppose?

(Uh-oh.)
<[...]>I suppose?

During your time here at camp, you've had a lot of success
making friends, correct?
passages.content_zh:
在你在營地的這段時間裡，你取得了許多成功
交朋友，對嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>That's your question?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這就是你的問題？

passages.content: Indeed.

<[...]>Well, I guess I have, yeah. My best friends here are probably
my team mates, but I think I get along pretty well with
almost everyone.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>嗯，我想我有，是的。我在這裡最好的朋友可能是
我的隊友，但我認為我和他們相處得很好
幾乎每個人。

passages.content: Good. That is just what I wanted to hear.
passages.content_zh: 好的。這正是我想聽到的。

passages.content:
You know, this is actually rather fun. What is this game
called? Truth and Dare?
passages.content_zh:
你知道，這實際上很有趣。這是什麼遊戲
叫？真心話與大冒險？

passages.content:
<[...]>Err, Truth\fi or\fr Dare. And this isn't exactly how it's played,
but that's not important.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>呃，真相\fi或\fr敢。而這並不是完全的玩法，
但這並不重要。

passages.content: In any case, I believe it is your turn.
passages.content_zh: 無論如何，我相信輪到你了。

passages.content:
<[...]>Hmmm... Okay, I've got a question for you.

Is there\fi anything\fr you can do about the quality of the
food here?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>嗯...好吧，我有一個問題想問你。

您可以採取什麼措施來提高產品的品質嗎？
這裡有食物嗎？

passages.content:
Actually, there is. I could start getting quotes from competing
suppliers and perhaps find a way to work the change into
the budget.
passages.content_zh:
事實上，是有的。我可以開始從競爭對手那裡獲取報價
供應商也許會找到一種方法來實現這一轉變
預算。

passages.content:
But be careful what you wish for. Gob-Gob cuisine is a recent
development, and from what I hear, it is quite a marked
improvement over some of our earlier menus.
passages.content_zh:
但要小心你的願望。 Gob-Gob美食是最近才出現的
發展，據我所知，這是一個相當顯著的發展
比我們早期的一些菜單有所改進。

passages.content: <[...]>You're kidding. What could be worse than this!?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你在開玩笑。還有什麼比這更糟糕的呢！ ？

passages.content:
You hold up a quivering spoonful of dusky orange slime.

Despite Giselle's claim that it is tapioca pudding, you have
your doubts.
passages.content_zh:
你顫抖著舉起一匙暗橙色的黏液。

儘管吉賽爾聲稱這是木薯布丁，但你有
你的疑問。

passages.content:
It wasn't all that long ago that the camp served nothing but
MREs purchased from a Guatemalan military surplus depot.
The owner was friends with the Director and felt it would be
doing her a favour.
passages.content_zh:
就在不久之前，這個營地除了服務之外什麼也沒做。
MRE 是從危地馬拉軍事剩餘倉庫購買的。
業主是導演的朋友，覺得會是
幫她一個忙。

passages.content: <[...]>That doesn't sound too bad.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>聽起來還不錯。

passages.content:
Not until you realise that the MREs were at least a decade
expired when the Director's friend acquired them in the first
place. I never tried one, but they certainly\fi looked\fr
repulsive.
passages.content_zh:
直到你意識到 MRE 至少有十年
当导演的朋友第一次获得它们时就过期了
地方。我從未嘗試過，但它們確實\fi看起來\fr
令人厭惡的。

passages.content:
Eventually, we were forced to switch over to Gob-Gob when
it became apparent trainees were hunting and eating Pocket
Dimension wildlife in order to avoid going to the cafeteria.
passages.content_zh:
最終，我們被迫切換到 Gob-Gob
很明顯，學員們正在狩獵和吃 Pocket
對野生動物進行測量，以避免去自助餐廳。

passages.content:
No longer awkward or nervous, the two of you chat and share
stories with surprising ease.
passages.content_zh:
不再尷尬、緊張，兩人聊天分享
故事輕鬆得令人驚訝。

passages.content:
You wonder silently how long it has been since  last
had a chance to open up like this. She never entirely
abandons decorum, but her smile nonetheless seems sincere.
passages.content_zh:
你默默地想知道距離上次已經過了多久
有機會像這樣敞開心扉。她從來沒有完全
放棄了禮節，但她的笑容卻顯得真誠。

passages.content:
Before you can even finish your Gob-Loaf, however, she
checks her pocket watch and informs you she must be off.

Disappointed, you bid her goodnight and return to your
dorm room.
passages.content_zh:
然而，在你吃完你的 Gob-Loaf 之前，她
檢查她的懷錶並告訴你她必須走了。

你失望地向她道晚安，然後回到自己的家。
宿舍房間。

passages.content: <[...]>Well, enjoy your evening.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>好吧，祝您有個愉快的夜晚。

passages.content: Yes, good evening to you too.
passages.content_zh: 是的，你也晚上好。

passages.content:
Phyre's Tower? What could she possibly want with that
robot-infested ruin?
passages.content_zh:
菲雷之塔？她可能想要什麼？
機器人出沒的廢墟？

passages.content: Do you think she plans to siphon the cores in her possession?
passages.content_zh: 你認為她打算吸走她擁有的核心嗎？

passages.content:
That thief! That backstabbing coward! She wouldn't dare!
I want those cores back in pristine condition!!!
passages.content_zh:
那個小偷！那個背後捅刀子的膽小鬼！她不敢！
我希望這些核心恢復到原始狀態！

passages.content:
<[...]>But that doesn't make much sense... Why would she wait
until after we fought to power herself up like this?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>但這沒有太大意義...她為什麼要等
直到我們這樣努力增強自己的力量之後？

passages.content:
Simple. She believed she had sufficient skill to defeat us until
we demonstrated our overwhelming superiority.
passages.content_zh:
簡單的。她相信她有足夠的能力打敗我們，直到
我們展現了壓倒性的優勢。

passages.content:
Maybe she was aware of the side-effects that come with the
process and wanted to avoid doing so unless she had no other
choice?
passages.content_zh:
也許她意識到了隨之而來的副作用
過程並希望避免這樣做，除非她沒有其他辦法
選擇？

passages.content:
We don't know much about the process. Perhaps doing so
comes with some kind of unpleasant side effect?
passages.content_zh:
我們對這個過程了解不多。也許這樣做
會帶來某種令人不快的副作用嗎？

passages.content:
It is strange, true, but can you think of any other explanation?
What else is in that tower she might want to make use of?
passages.content_zh:
這確實很奇怪，但你還能想到其他解釋嗎？
塔里還有什麼她可能想利用的？

passages.content:
Who knows? We never really explored the place thoroughly.
And when you consider the Magical Girl who made this place,
the possibilities are endless.
passages.content_zh:
誰知道？我們從未真正徹底探索過這個地方。
當你想到創造這個地方的魔法少女時，
可能性是無限的。

passages.content:
Damn, you're right. I was an idiot to let us leave before we
finished our search. The lair of a disturbed military scientist?
This place is bound to be hiding some serious firepower.
passages.content_zh:
該死，你是對的。我真是個白痴讓我們在我們離開之前就離開
完成了我們的搜尋。一個心煩意亂的軍事科學家的巢穴？
這裡必然隱藏著強大的火力。

passages.content:
Does that mean Yoshida has some kind of... Super Awesome
Magical Girl Blaster now?
passages.content_zh:
這是否意味著吉田有某種…超級棒
現在是魔法少女爆破嗎？

passages.content: Phyre's Tower? Not the first place I imagined her heading.
passages.content_zh: 菲雷之塔？這不是我想像中她要去的第一個地方。

passages.content: <[...]>Umm... Remind me again what that place is?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嗯...再次提醒我那個地方是什麼？

passages.content:
Phyre's Tower was the laboratory of the reclusive mad genius,
Phyre. She was supposedly an extremely powerful Magical
Girl and a brilliant inventor, but also very unstable.
passages.content_zh:
費雷之塔是隱居的瘋狂天才的實驗室，
菲雷。據說她是一位極其強大的魔法師
女孩又是一位才華洋溢的發明家，但也很不穩定。

passages.content:
It's not an official dungeon for us to explore, but sometimes
Magical Girls snoop around in there anyway, hoping to find
weird old technology.

It's not a very friendly place...
passages.content_zh:
這不是一個供我們探索的官方地下城，但有時
無論如何，魔法少女們都會在那裡窺探，希望能找到
奇怪的舊技術。

這不是一個很友善的地方...

passages.content:
She's probably in there right now, readying some kind of
advanced arsenal to use against us! And she beat us to the
punch!
passages.content_zh:
她現在可能就在那裡，準備某種東西
先進的武器庫來對付我們！她打敗了我們
衝！

passages.content:
Oh no! She was mean enough the last time we fought her.
What sort of crazy weapons might she find in here?
passages.content_zh:
哦不！上次我們和她打架時她很刻薄。
她會在這裡找到什麼樣的瘋狂武器？

passages.content: <[...]>No idea, but we're about to go find out.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>不知道，但我們要去找出答案。

passages.content: <[...]>Everyone doing alright?

*Yawn*

I'm sleepy... and sore... and could really use a hug...
passages.content_zh:
*打哈欠*

我很睏……而且很痛……真的需要一個擁抱……

passages.content: <[...]>Aww, come here.
Yay!

I could use some healing, but I'll be alright so long as\fi
someone here\fr picks their battles a little more cautiously...
passages.content_zh:
我需要一些治療，但只要\fi我就沒事
這裡有人\fr在選擇戰鬥時更加謹慎...

passages.content: <[...]>Sorry, sorry...

I feel rather weary myself. Nothing a fresh little batch of
lifeforce wouldn't fix though...
passages.content_zh:
我自己也覺得比較累。沒什麼新鮮的一小批
但生命力無法修復...

passages.content: Nope.
<[...]>I don't think so.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我不這麼認為。

passages.content: Not a chance.
passages.content_zh: 沒有機會。

passages.content:
Fine. If none of you are offering, I'll just have to settle for
Magico minions.
passages.content_zh:
美好的。如果你們都不提供，我就只能滿足了
魔法小兵。

passages.content:
As your team prepares to head out for the day's training, you
notice  seems quieter than usual. You decide to check
on her.
passages.content_zh:
當您的團隊準備出發進行當天的訓練時，您
通知似乎比平常安靜。你決定檢查一下
在她身上。

passages.content: <[...]>Hey, are you okay? I heard last night went-[...]
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嘿，你還好嗎？我聽說昨晚去了-[...]

passages.content:
Minion, don't. Just... don't.

Last night was not my finest moment.
passages.content_zh:
小敏，別這樣。只是...不要。

昨晚不是我最美好的時刻。

passages.content: Come on. Let's go find something to kill.
passages.content_zh: 快點。我們去找點東西來殺掉吧。

passages.content:
<[...]>Maybe another time. I don't want to bother  any
more than we already have...
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>也許下次吧。我不想打擾任何人
比我們已經擁有的還要多…

passages.content: Huh? How'd you get into Phyre's tower? I thought it's sealed.
passages.content_zh: 啊？你是怎麼進入Phyre的塔樓的？我以為是密封的呢

passages.content: <[...]>I... sort of found the key.

Ah, okay. Guess somebody must've left it lying around.

I don't think there are any Magicos there, but Phyre did make
a lot of strange magical experiments. Maybe you'll find
something interesting in there.
passages.content_zh:
啊，好吧。我猜肯定有人把它丢在一边了。

我不认为那里有任何 Magicos，但 Phyre 确实创造了
很多奇怪的魔法实验。也许你会发现
裡面有一些有趣的東西。

passages.content: <[...]>Who was Phyre?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>Phyre 是誰？

passages.content:
Phyre was a Magical Girl in mom's party. She was born in a
magic-rich world, so she was already an experienced spell
caster when she became a Magical Girl.
passages.content_zh:
菲雷是媽媽派對上的魔法少女。她出生在一個
魔法世界豐富，所以她已經是個經驗豐富的魔法師了
當她成為魔法少女時的施法者。

passages.content:
She was also a magical researcher of sorts and a lot of the
spells used to create this place were invented by her.
passages.content_zh:
她也是一位魔法研究員，也是許多
用來創造這個地方的咒語是她發明的。

passages.content:
That being said, she... Well, she was kind of twisted. She
loved to reshape people, both mentally and physically.
passages.content_zh:
話雖這麼說，她……嗯，她有點扭曲。她
喜歡重塑人們的精神和身體。

passages.content:
One day she went too far, so mom sealed her in that small
tower in camp.
passages.content_zh:
有一天，她太過分了，所以媽媽把她封在那個小房間裡。
營地中的塔。

passages.content:
You look a little queasy, . Did you eat something that
didn't agree with you?
passages.content_zh:
你看起來有點不舒服，。你吃了什麼東西嗎
不同意你的觀點？

passages.content: There's something in here.
passages.content_zh: 這裡有東西。

passages.content:
Phyre must've left all sorts of guardians. She was known
for creating a variety of golems.
passages.content_zh:
Phyre一定已經離開了各種不同的守護者。她被人熟知
用於創建各種傀儡。

passages.content: It's not a golem... There's something evil in here.
passages.content_zh: 這不是傀儡……這裡有邪惡的東西。

passages.content:
Don't worry, , there's nothing in this musty old tower
more dangerous than us.
passages.content_zh:
別擔心，這座發霉的老塔裡什麼都沒有
比我們還危險。

passages.content: If you say so. But be careful, just in case.
passages.content_zh: 如果你這麼說的話。但要小心，以防萬一。

passages.content:
<[...]>We could teleport directly to the ritual
room.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我們可以直接傳送到儀式現場
房間。

passages.content: Welcome to the pleasure palace of Sultan Zel-[...]
passages.content_zh: 歡迎來到蘇丹澤爾的遊樂宮殿-[...]

passages.content: I mean, Sultan Zeling-[...]
passages.content_zh: 我的意思是，蘇丹澤林-[...]

passages.content: Maybe it was Zeil...?
passages.content_zh: 也許是澤爾…？

passages.content: Welcome to some pervy elf's vacation home!
passages.content_zh: 歡迎來到一些變態小精靈的度假屋！

passages.content: <[...]>Pervy elf?

This place is from a plane where the dominant race is a type
of dark elves.
passages.content_zh:
這個地方來自一個位面，那裡的主導種族是一種類型
的黑暗精靈。

passages.content:
Interesting place, actually.

For the most part, the culture and architecture resembles
ancient Arabia, but in a bizarre twist, the common language
seems to have derived from Polish.
passages.content_zh:
實際上，有趣的地方。

在很大程度上，文化和建築類似於
古老的阿拉伯語，但有一個奇怪的轉折，共同語言
似乎源自波蘭語。

passages.content: Polish Arab elves?
passages.content_zh: 波蘭阿拉伯精靈？

passages.content:
I can't say for certain how that happened, but my guess is
that there was some cross-dimensional contact in the past.

That kind of thing does happen from time to time.
passages.content_zh:
我不能肯定地說這是怎麼發生的，但我的猜測是
過去曾有過一些跨維度的接觸。

這種事情確實時有發生。

passages.content:
Since this place is here, does that mean that things went like
they did in the Misty Woods...?
passages.content_zh:
既然這裡在這裡，是不是就意味著事情的發展是這樣的
他們在迷霧森林裡做的事…？

passages.content: Not at all.
passages.content_zh: 一點也不。

passages.content:
Fufufu, thanks to a\fi certain lovely Magical Girl\fr, the Magico
invasion was nipped in the bud... with relatively little
collateral damage.
passages.content_zh:
呼呼呼，多虧了某個可愛的魔法少女\fr，Magico
入侵被消滅在萌芽狀態......相對較少
附帶損害。

passages.content: But you still took the palace?
passages.content_zh: 但你還是佔領了宮殿？

passages.content:
Zali... Zeli... Whatever. The prince's flirting was driving
me insane, so I cut a few corners.
passages.content_zh:
札利...澤利...隨便。王子的調情正在開車
我瘋了，所以我抄近路了。

passages.content: <[...]>So what was the guy's name anyway?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那麼這個人到底叫什麼名字？

passages.content:
...I'll just write it on a piece of paper and teleport it to you.
You can figure it out yourself.
passages.content_zh:
……我就把它寫在一張紙上然後傳送給你。
你可以自己弄清楚。

passages.content: <[...]>Zelin... Zegline?
Żeligniew. His name is Żeligniew.
passages.content_zh: 熱利格涅夫。他的名字叫熱利格涅夫。

passages.content:
Żeligniew is pretty easy to pronounce. I don't know why you
were having so much trouble.
passages.content_zh:
Żelgniew 很容易發音。我不知道你為什麼
我們遇到了很多麻煩。

passages.content: Huh? How did you...?
passages.content_zh: 啊？你怎麼...?

passages.content: <[...]>Let's just focus on what's important.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>讓我們專注於重要的事情。

passages.content: Right! Time for the Fluffy Kitten to show its claws!
passages.content_zh: 正確的！是時候讓毛茸茸的小貓展示它的利爪了！

passages.content: <[...]>According to the map, this is the place.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>根據地圖，就是這個地方。

passages.content: What a dump.
passages.content_zh: 真是個垃圾場。

passages.content: <[...]>Is this house like Phantasmalia's, ?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這房子像Phantasmalia的那樣嗎？

passages.content: No, . It's just old and dilapidated.
passages.content_zh: 不， 。它只是又舊又破舊。

passages.content:
Since this is your first time, [...], I think we should go
somewhere that isn't too dangerous.

I think the weakest enemies are in a ruined castle in a
forest east of here.
passages.content_zh:
既然這是你第一次，[...]，我想我們應該去
一個不太危險的地方。

我認為最弱的敵人是在一座廢棄的城堡裡
這裡東邊的森林。

passages.content: <[...]>I guess you've been there before?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我猜你以前來過那裡嗎？

passages.content: I have, but...
passages.content_zh: 我有，但是...

passages.content:
The monsters there use acid... I can handle fire just fine,
but acid and the cold are terrible for me.
passages.content_zh:
那裡的怪物使用酸……我可以很好地處理火，
但酸和寒冷對我來說很可怕。

passages.content:
Now that you've beaten the Slime Princess, I think you're
ready to go after stronger enemies.
passages.content_zh:
現在你已經打敗了史萊姆公主，我認為你
準備好追擊更強大的敵人。

passages.content:
There're two nearby Magicos that I think are at your level.

One is in the ruined house near the dead forest, the other's
hidden somewhere in the eastern forest.
passages.content_zh:
我認為附近有兩個 Magicos 與你水平相當。

一個在死亡森林附近的廢墟房子裡，另一個在
隱藏在東部森林的某個地方。

passages.content: <[...]>Where do you think we should go next?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你認為我們下一步該去哪裡？

passages.content: For your next Magico, I recommend-[...]
passages.content_zh: 對於您的下一個 Magico，我建議 -[...]

passages.content:
You know, normally you should be asking your counsellor
that.
passages.content_zh:
你知道，通常你應該問你的輔導員
那個。

passages.content: Mother!? But how?
passages.content_zh: 母親！ ？但如何呢？

passages.content:
It wasn't hard. I'd suspected that you were giving a bit of
extra guidance to  ever since I found your tampering
with the computer.
passages.content_zh:
這並不難。我懷疑你付出了一點
自從我發現你的篡改以來提供額外的指導
與電腦。

passages.content:
I'm just trying to help her.

Things can be hard for a new Magical Girl... and she's
my friend...
passages.content_zh:
我只是想幫助她。

對於新魔法少女來說，事情可能會很困難……而她
我的朋友...

passages.content: Oh? Are you are finally opening up to others, ?
passages.content_zh: 哦？你終於向別人敞開心扉了嗎？

passages.content: I... yes...
passages.content_zh: 我……是的……

passages.content: I see.
Feel free to keep advising her however you see fit.
passages.content_zh: 請隨意繼續為她提供您認為合適的建議。

passages.content: ...Thank you, mom.
passages.content_zh: ……謝謝你，媽媽。

passages.content:
Now, about their training.

, can you hear me?
passages.content_zh:
現在，關於他們的訓練。

， 你聽得到我嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Yes, loud and clear.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>是的，響亮而清晰。

passages.content:
Good. I think it's time you move on to tougher Magicos.

The core we dropped in the hills last week should already
have regenerated into a full Magico. Go and get it.
passages.content_zh:
好的。我想你是時候轉向更強硬的 Magicos 了。

上週我們在山上掉落的核心應該已經
已再生為完整的Magico。去拿吧。

passages.content:
You could also check that cold warehouse Phyre set up a few
years ago. I don't think anybody's beaten the Magico in it
for some time now.
passages.content_zh:
你也可以檢查Phyre設定了一些冷庫
幾年前。我認為沒有人能打敗 Magico
已經有一段時間了。

passages.content:
Lastly, you could also try the Misty Woods we recently brought
over.

If you like horror stories, you'll feel right at home.
passages.content_zh:
最後，你也可以試試我們最近帶來的迷霧森林
結束了。

如果你喜歡恐怖故事，你會有賓至如歸的感覺。

passages.content: I guess today we could check-[...]
passages.content_zh: 我想今天我們可以檢查-[...]

passages.content: What would be the point of that?
passages.content_zh: 那有什麼意義呢？

passages.content: You all seem down today.
passages.content_zh: 你們今天看起來都很沮喪。

passages.content:
<[...]>Of course we're down. That ninja bitch keeps stealing our
cores!
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我們當然失敗了。那個忍者母狗一直在偷我們的東西
核心！

passages.content:
You're right, this has gone on for too long! Come to my room
so we can brainstorm something.
passages.content_zh:
你說得對，這種情況已經持續太久了！到我的房間來
這樣我們就可以集思廣益。

passages.content: <[...]>Do you know where the Tomb of Garak is, ?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你知道加拉克之墓在哪裡嗎？

passages.content:
It's north-west of the camp near the mountains. Why, are
you planning to go check it out?
passages.content_zh:
它位於營地的西北部，靠近山脈。為什麼，是
你打算去看看嗎？

passages.content: Okay, but be careful. The Magico there is pretty strong.
passages.content_zh: 好的，但是要小心。那裡的Magico很強。

passages.content: What the hell are you doing in Garak's Tomb!?
passages.content_zh: 你到底在加拉克墳墓裡做什麼！ ？

passages.content: Come back to the camp this instant. That place is dangerous!
passages.content_zh: 立即返回營地。那個地方很危險！

passages.content:
<[...]>Calm down, . If things really go south, we'll just
be teleported back to camp, right?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>冷靜點，。如果事情真的向南發展，我們就
被傳送回營地吧？

passages.content: ...I guess you're right, but be careful.
passages.content_zh: ……我想你是對的，但要小心。

passages.content: With Garak, you never know what's going to happen.
passages.content_zh: 和蓋瑞克在一起，你永遠不知道會發生什麼事。

passages.content: <[...]>Who's this Garak guy? A Magico?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這個加拉克人是誰？魔術師？

passages.content:
Garak is a powerful Magico Lord who once almost conquered
Thrudmadra.
passages.content_zh:
蓋拉克是一位強大的魔法領主，曾經幾乎征服了
斯魯德馬德拉。

passages.content: Oh, that's ' homeworld.
passages.content_zh: 哦，那是『家園』。

passages.content: Wait...! He almost conquered a whole world!?
passages.content_zh: 等待...！他几乎征服了整个世界！ ？

passages.content: <[...]>Where's that? In Asia?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那是哪裡？在亞洲？

passages.content: No, , it's another world.
passages.content_zh: 不，這是另一個世界。

passages.content: He almost conquered a whole world!?
passages.content_zh: 他幾乎征服了整個世界！ ？

passages.content: That's terrifying.
passages.content_zh: 太可怕了。

passages.content:
That's right. Besides transforming people into his minions,
Garak is also capable of possessing and animating the dead.
passages.content_zh:
這是正確的。除了把人變成他的爪牙之外，
蓋拉克也能夠附身並啟動死者。

passages.content: He used that power to create a huge army of the undead.
passages.content_zh: 他利用這種力量創造了一支龐大的亡靈大軍。

passages.content:
He was only stopped when mom sealed him inside the body
he was possessing and then twisted it with magic into something
fairly harmless.
passages.content_zh:
當媽媽把他封印在體內時他才停下來
他佔有並用魔法將其扭曲成某種東西
相當無害。

passages.content:
Anyway, enough with the history lesson! If you insist on
exploring that place, be careful, because Garak is way out
of your league!
passages.content_zh:
無論如何，歷史課已經夠了！如果你堅持
探索那個地方，要小心，因為Garak太遠了
你的聯盟！

passages.content:
I wonder how Kaylin's doing. I hope she got back home
without any trouble.
passages.content_zh:
我想知道凱琳怎麼樣了。我希望她能回到家
沒有任何麻煩。

passages.content:
She's safe and sound with the other centaurs. I teleported
her directly to their camp.

If you want to check on her, their camp is near near the
volcano to the north.
passages.content_zh:
她和其他半人馬一起安然無恙。我傳送了
她直接到了他們的營地。

如果你想看看她的情況，他們的營地就在附近
火山在北邊。

passages.content: Don't give me that look! It's extinct.
passages.content_zh: 別用那種眼神看我！它已經滅絕了。

passages.content: <[...]>Do you have any idea where  went, ?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你知道去哪裡了嗎？

passages.content:
Not really. She's probably just chasing after girls...
somewhere. Why?
passages.content_zh:
並不真地。她大概只是在追女生吧…
somewhere.為什麼？

passages.content:
<[...]>I'm a bit worried about her. I mean, she almost got turned
into a bee not too long ago.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我有點擔心她。我的意思是，她差一點就轉身了
不久前變成了一隻蜜蜂。

passages.content:
I wouldn't worry too much.  has always been a free
spirit, but since you are concerned, let me scan for her...

She's at the Farysanian Tree. Guess that's to be expected
from a dryad.
passages.content_zh:
我不會太擔心。  一直都是免費的
精神，不過既然你擔心，那我就掃描一下她吧…

她在法瑞萨尼亚树那里。我想这是可以预料的
來自樹妖。

passages.content: <[...]>What's the Farysanian Tree?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>Farysanian 樹是什麼？

passages.content:
It's a really, really big tree roughly north of the place where
you fought the Slime Princess. Just look around; there's no
way you can miss the thing.
passages.content_zh:
這是一棵非常非常大的樹，位於那個地方的北邊
你與史萊姆公主戰鬥了。環顧四周；沒有
這樣你就可能會錯過這件事。

passages.content:
In front of you stands an unbelievably huge tree that easily
dwarfs some buildings.
passages.content_zh:
在你面前矗立著一棵令人難以置信的大樹，很容易
使一些建築物相形見絀。

passages.content:
Incredible! On all the planets I visited, I have never seen
a plant of this size.
passages.content_zh:
極好的！在我訪問過的所有行星上，我從未見過
這種大小的植物。

passages.content:
Yeah, it's huge, but mom told me that once there were trees
in Farysa bigger than skyscrapers.
passages.content_zh:
是的，它很大，但媽媽告訴我，曾經有樹
在法裡薩，比摩天大樓還要大。

passages.content:
Farysa, you say? I've never heard of it.

What happened there? Did nuclear war destroy the ecosystem,
like on Itone?
passages.content_zh:
法莉莎，你說？我從來沒有聽過。

那裡發生了什麼事？核戰摧毀了生態系統嗎？
就像伊通一樣？

passages.content:
No, the Magicos conquered Farysa. There's not much remaining
life there. This tree was the only thing mom managed to save.
passages.content_zh:
不，魔術師征服了法瑞薩。所剩無幾
那裡的生活。這棵樹是媽媽唯一能拯救的東西。

passages.content:
I don't see  anywhere around here. Do you think she's
on top of the tree?
passages.content_zh:
我看不到這附近有什麼地方。你認為她是
在樹頂上？

passages.content: She's probably inside of it.
passages.content_zh: 她很可能就在裡面。

passages.content: But there aren't any openings. How do we get into the tree?
passages.content_zh: 但没有任何空缺。我們要怎麼進入樹呢？

passages.content: <[...]>I think I have that covered...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我想我已經涵蓋了...

passages.content:
Recalling 's teachings, you reach with your magic into
the tree. Once you find a hollow section, you create an
opening.
passages.content_zh:
回憶起他的教誨，你用你的魔法到達了
樹。一旦找到空心部分，就可以建立一個
開放。

passages.content:
Hehe, good to see you're experimenting with new spells,
Magical Girl .
passages.content_zh:
呵呵，很高興看到你正在嘗試新咒語，
魔法少女。

passages.content:
<[...]>That memo said that the Magico was sealed in a small building
south of the forest where we fought the bees.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>那份備忘錄說Magico被封在一棟小建築裡
我們在森林南邊與蜜蜂搏鬥的地方。

passages.content:
<[...]>Maybe this is a chance to beat a Magico without having to go
through a dungeon.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>也許這是一個無需離開就能擊敗Magico的機會
穿過一個地牢。

passages.content:
Huh?

What're you doing in that temporary Magico holding cell?
passages.content_zh:
啊？

你在那個臨時的 Magico 拘留室裡做什麼？

passages.content: <[...]>I thought we could beat the Magico in here.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我以為我們可以在這裡擊敗Magico。

passages.content: Are you just trying to skip the work of going through a dungeon?
passages.content_zh: 你只是想跳過穿越地牢的工作嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>Well... yes.

Do you think that could get us in trouble?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>嗯...是的。

你認為這會給我們帶來麻煩嗎？

passages.content:
Maybe, but then again that's the kind of pragmatic thinking
that mother would approve of.
passages.content_zh:
也許吧，但話又說回來，這就是一種務實的思維
那個母親會同意的。

passages.content: Anyway, how'd you even find out about that place?
passages.content_zh: 無論如何，你是怎麼知道那個地方的？

passages.content:
<[...]>I kind of read about it on a paper I found in 's
room.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我在 的一篇論文中讀到相關內容
房間。

passages.content:
What!? Are you crazy!?

Do you have any idea of the kind of things mother keeps
in her room?
passages.content_zh:
什麼！ ？你瘋了！ ？

你知道媽媽會保留哪些東西嗎
在她的房間？

passages.content:
I once caught a curse from one of the magical items in her
collection that forced me to be a ganguro girl for almost a
year!
passages.content_zh:
我曾經因為她體內的一件魔法物品而受到詛咒
該系列迫使我成為 ganguro 女孩幾乎一年
年！

passages.content: <[...]>What's ganguro?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>什麼是ganguro？

passages.content: An alternative Japanese fashion that-[...]
passages.content_zh: 另類日本時尚—[...]

passages.content:
Look, it's not important; just search it on the internet some
other time.
passages.content_zh:
看吧，這並不重要；只是在網路上搜尋一些
其他時間。

passages.content:
What I mean is, be careful with mother's things. She collects
a lot of dangerous stuff.
passages.content_zh:
我的意思是，媽媽的東西要小心。她收集
很多危險的東西。

passages.content: <[...]>What can you tell us about the Magico here, ?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>您能告訴我們有關 Magico 的什麼資訊嗎？

passages.content:
Absolutely nothing. The only thing I know is that mom dropped
a core somewhere around here.
passages.content_zh:
絕對沒有。我唯一知道的是媽媽跌倒了
這裡有一個核心。

passages.content: You mean the Magico is unsealed?
passages.content_zh: 你的意思是Magico沒有解封？

passages.content:
No. There's definitely a seal around these hills, so at least
the Magico can't leave.
passages.content_zh:
不，這些山丘周圍一定有海豹，所以至少
魔法師不能離開。

passages.content: The harpies are the bigger problem.
passages.content_zh: 鷹身女妖是更大的問題。

passages.content:
Harpies? You mean bird women from Greek mythology?
Or is it a code word for something?
passages.content_zh:
鷹身女妖？你是說希臘神話中的鳥女嗎？
還是它是某物的代號？

passages.content: The former. Mother let a bunch of those birdbrains nest here.
passages.content_zh: 前者。媽媽讓一堆鳥腦子在這裡築巢。

passages.content:
Be careful. They're very territorial and don't like having other
women on their turf.
passages.content_zh:
當心。他們的領地意識很強，不喜歡有其他人
婦女在她們的地盤上。

passages.content: Brrr, it's so cold... Do we really have to be here?
passages.content_zh: 嗚嗚嗚，好冷啊……我們真的必須在這裡嗎？

passages.content: I agree with . We are not dressed for this.
passages.content_zh: 我同意。我們穿衣服不是為了這個。

passages.content: Just bear with it! War does not wait for good weather.
passages.content_zh: 忍耐吧！戰爭不會等待好天氣。

passages.content: Maybe war doesn't, but couldn't we?
passages.content_zh: 也許戰爭不會，但我們不能嗎？

passages.content:
What if a Magico went around eating people during a blizzard?
Would you just decide to wait for the summer?
passages.content_zh:
如果暴風雪期間魔法師到處吃人怎麼辦？
你會決定等待夏天嗎？

passages.content: I guess not... but I wish I had a coat.
passages.content_zh: 我想不是……但我希望我有一件外套。

passages.content: <[...]>What can you tell us about this place, ?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你能告訴我們關於這個地方的什麼嗎？

passages.content:
This dungeon was designed by Phyre around a particularly
nasty, ice-based Magico.
passages.content_zh:
這個地牢是由 Phyre 圍繞一個特別的主題設計的。
令人討厭的、基於冰的Magico。

passages.content:
The Magico in here has been defeated several times, but the
dungeon proved popular enough that mom always allows it
to regenerate from its core.
passages.content_zh:
這裡的魔法師已經被打敗過好幾次了，但是
事實證明，地牢很受歡迎，媽媽總是允許它
從其核心再生。

passages.content:
I wish I could tell you more, but I never went through that
dungeon myself.

Just remember, the minions here are probably ice-based, so
have  keep her fire magic ready.
passages.content_zh:
我希望我能告诉你更多，但我从未经历过
地牢我自己。

请记住，这里的小兵可能是冰系的，所以
讓她的火魔法做好準備。

passages.content: <[...]>Wow! Where'd all this mist come from?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>哇！這些霧氣是從哪裡來的？

passages.content:
It's always like this here.

It's some sort of magical effect that was pulled along with
this piece of land when it was added to the pocket plane.
passages.content_zh:
這裡總是這樣。

這是某種神奇的效果，伴隨而來的是
當這片土地被添加到袖珍飛機中。

passages.content: "Added to the pocket plane"?
passages.content_zh: “加入袖珍飛機”？

passages.content:
Sometimes, instead of just sealing a Magico, we teleport the
whole region it was terrorizing along with it.
passages.content_zh:
有時，我們不只是封印 Magico，而是傳送
整個地區都受到了恐懼。

passages.content: It gives trainees a more natural layout for practice.
passages.content_zh: 它為學員提供了更自然的練習佈局。

passages.content:
Of course, we only do that when the Magico has killed or driven
off everyone around its lair...
passages.content_zh:
Of course, we only do that when the Magico has killed or driven
趕走它巢穴周圍的所有人…

passages.content: Everyone...
passages.content_zh: 每個人...

passages.content: Unforgivable! We shall punish the Magico without mercy!
passages.content_zh: 不可原諒！我們將毫不留情地懲罰魔法師！

passages.content: That's the spirit, !
passages.content_zh: 這就是精神，！

passages.content:
Come, let us dye this wilderness red with the blood of our
foes!
passages.content_zh:
來吧，讓我們用我們的鮮血染紅這片荒野
敵人！

passages.content: Dye the wilderness with...
passages.content_zh: 把荒野染成…

passages.content: Why is everybody looking at me like that?
passages.content_zh: 為什麼每個人都這樣看著我？

passages.content: I was just giving a little motivational speech...
passages.content_zh: 我只是發表了一些勵志演講...

passages.content: <[...]>Sometimes you kind of make us feel like we're the bad guys.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>有時你會讓我們覺得自己是壞人。

passages.content:
*Sigh*

Let's just chalk it up to cultural differences.
passages.content_zh:
*嘆息*

讓我們將其歸因於文化差異。

passages.content: Fine.
But I did nothing wrong.
passages.content_zh: 但我沒有做錯什麼。

passages.content:
What are you doing, ? Don't run ahead of the rest of
the party!

Do you want to be ambushed by some roving monster?
passages.content_zh:
你在幹什麼， ？不要跑在其他人前面
聚會！

你想被一些遊蕩的怪物伏擊嗎？

passages.content:
Sorry, . You're right, I should just stay behind and cast
spells while the Magicos beat you up.
passages.content_zh:
對不起， 。你說得對，我應該留下來施展
當魔術師毆打你時施咒語。

passages.content:
Yes. After all, you are pretty frail, so I will just draw the
enemies' attacks and-[...]
passages.content_zh:
是的。畢竟你身體很弱，所以我就畫一下
敵人的攻擊和-[...]

passages.content:
I mean, no!

Don't treat me like some sort of Magico punching bag!
passages.content_zh:
我的意思是，不！

別把我當成魔法出氣筒！

passages.content:
You don't have to worry about anything.  can just heal
you if things get out of hand.
passages.content_zh:
您無需擔心任何事情。  可以治愈
如果事情失控了。

passages.content:
I would really prefer it if  doesn't get hurt in the first
place.
passages.content_zh:
如果一開始就沒有受傷的話我真的比較喜歡
地方。

passages.content:
You don't understand, . It's the job of people like her
to get hurt instead of us.
passages.content_zh:
你不明白，。這是像她這樣的人的工作
代替我們受到傷害。

passages.content: Ah, so she's the party's tank?
passages.content_zh: 啊，所以她是派對的坦克？

passages.content: Hell no!

They spend a while discussing their strengths and weaknesses,
and their preferred roles in combat.
passages.content_zh:
他們花了一些時間討論自己的優點和缺點，
以及他們在戰鬥中喜歡的角色。

passages.content:
Despite the incessant bickering between  and ,
you cannot deny that the party's teamwork seems to have
improved a little.
passages.content_zh:
儘管和之間爭吵不斷，
你不能否認黨的團隊合作似乎已經
改善了一點。

passages.content:
's MHP+100

's AGI+10

 learned the spell Life's Radiance.
passages.content_zh:
的MHP+100

的AGI+10

 學會了生命光輝法術。

passages.content:
's MHP+200

's DEF+5

's MDF+5

 learned the skill Luring Flare.
passages.content_zh:
的MHP+200

防禦力+5

中纖板+5

 學會了引誘閃光技巧。

passages.content:
's MAT+10

's MDF+10

 learned the spell Mental Blast.
passages.content_zh:
的 MAT+10

中密度纖維板+10

 學會了法術「精神衝擊」。

passages.content: Let's go, [...]! I'm ready for another day of training.
passages.content_zh: 我們走吧， [...]！我已經準備好迎接新一天的訓練了。

passages.content: <[...]>You seem full of energy today, .
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你今天看起來精力充沛，。

passages.content: I'm just happy that I finally made a friend.
passages.content_zh: 我很高興我終於交了一個朋友。

passages.content:
Now that I have somebody with me, I feel like I can take
on the world.
passages.content_zh:
現在有人陪著我，我覺得我可以承受
關於世界。

passages.content: 's ATK+5
I wanted to thank you.
passages.content_zh: 我想謝謝你。

passages.content: <[...]>Thank me? Why?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>謝謝我？為什麼？

passages.content:
We've already beaten two Magicos!

That might not seem like a lot, but most new Magical Girls
take a lot longer than this just to beat their first.
passages.content_zh:
我們已經打敗了兩個魔術師！

這可能看起來不多，但大多數新魔法少女
僅僅為了擊敗他們的第一個，就需要比這更長的時間。

passages.content:
I don't think I could've done it alone, so thank you, [...].
Because of all this training, my magic has really improved.
passages.content_zh:
我認為我無法獨自完成這件事，所以謝謝你，[...]。
經過這些訓練，我的魔法確實提高了。

passages.content:
's MAT+5

's MDF+5

 learned the spell Abyssal Inferno.
passages.content_zh:
的 MAT+5

中纖板+5

 學會了深淵地獄咒語。

passages.content: Thank you, [...].
<[...]>For what, ?

For being my friend and listening to me. Before you came
to the camp, I was so lonely.

You know, there's this strong spell I was afraid to use because
I didn't think the other girls would like it.
passages.content_zh:
因為成為我的朋友並聽我說話。在你來之前
到了營地，我是那麼的孤獨。

你知道，有一個我不敢使用的強大咒語，因為
我沒想到其他女孩會喜歡它。

passages.content: But I'm sure you won't leave me if I start using it.
passages.content_zh: 但我確信如果我開始使用它，你就不會離開我。

passages.content:
's MMP+10

 learned the spell Grasp of the Pit.
passages.content_zh:
的MMP+10

 學習了咒語「深淵之握」。

passages.content: Good morning everyone.
passages.content_zh: 大家早安。

passages.content: Good morning.
Morning, .
passages.content_zh: 早晨， 。

passages.content: <[...]>You seem in a good mood today. Did something happen?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你今天心情不錯。發生什麼事了嗎？

passages.content: I'm just happy to have so many wonderful friends now.
passages.content_zh: 我很高興現在有這麼多好朋友。

passages.content:
's MAT+5

's LUK+5

 learned the spell Salvation.
passages.content_zh:
的 MAT+5

的LUK+5

 學會了救贖咒語。

passages.content: Ready for our next adventure?
passages.content_zh: 準備好我們的下一次冒險了嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Totally ready. How about you?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>完全準備好了。你呢？

passages.content: It's good to see you feeling so confident.
passages.content_zh: 很高興看到你如此自信。

passages.content: <[...]>About as ready as usual. How about you?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>和平常一樣準備好了。你呢？

passages.content: I feel that with you and the others by my side, I'm invincible!
passages.content_zh: 我覺得有你和其他人在我身邊，我就無敵了！

passages.content:
's ATK+5

's MDF+5

 learned the spell Radiant Restoration.
passages.content_zh:
攻擊力+5

中纖板+5

 學會了光輝恢復法術。

passages.content: Minion, come over here!
passages.content_zh: 小敏，過來一下！

passages.content: <[...]>What is it, ?

Your support up until now has been surprisingly adequate.

While I would be perfectly capable of overcoming the
challenges we have faced so far by myself, it would be wrong
to deny you have made things a bit easier.
passages.content_zh:
到目前為止，您的支持出乎意料地充足。

雖然我完全有能力克服
迄今為止我們獨自面臨的挑戰，這是錯誤的
否認你讓事情變得更容易了。

passages.content: You're welcome. Just don't start slacking off.
passages.content_zh: 不客氣。只是不要開始懈怠。

passages.content:
Despite her words,  seems to be more motivated than
usual.
passages.content_zh:
儘管她這麼說，但似乎更有動力
通常。

passages.content: <[...]>What's the matter, ? Why are you looking at me like that?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>怎麼了？為什麼這樣看著我？

passages.content: What...!? I... well... I mean, minion...
passages.content_zh: 什麼...！ ？我……嗯……我的意思是，小小兵……

passages.content: I HATE YOU!
passages.content_zh: 我恨你！

passages.content:
turns her back on you.

But despite her outburst,  seems more motivated.
passages.content_zh:
讓她背棄你。

但儘管她脾氣暴躁，但似乎更有動力。

passages.content:
's MAT+5

's MDF+5

 learned the spell Thermal Drain.
passages.content_zh:
的 MAT+5

中纖板+5

 學會了熱能流失咒語。

passages.content: Gather around me, minions. I have an announcement.
passages.content_zh: 奴才們，聚集在我周圍。我有公告。

passages.content:
I've noticed that the increasing strength of our enemies has
been putting a strain on 's healing magic.
passages.content_zh:
我注意到我們敵人的實力不斷增強
一直對治療魔法造成壓力。

passages.content:
To reduce the burden on our main healer, I've delved into
ancient Itonian mysticism.
passages.content_zh:
為了減輕我們主治療師的負擔，我深入研究了
古代伊東神秘主義。

passages.content:
While most of it is was superstitious nonsense, I did manage
to adapt a few Itonian techniques which I believe should
prove useful to our future endeavors.
passages.content_zh:
雖然大部分都是迷信的廢話，但我確實做到了
適應一些我認為應該的伊頓技術
證明對我們未來的努力有用。

passages.content:
's ATK+5

's DEF+5

 learned the spell Lifeforce Harvest.
passages.content_zh:
攻擊力+5

防禦力+5

 學會了生命力收穫咒語。

passages.content: Oh, ?
<[...]>Errr... , what are you doing?
Without a word, she lets you go.

passages.content:

， 我們必須... ！ ？

I cast a spell on the wand I gave you that allows me to

There's actually a huge ward around all of these lands.

If a monster defeats a party of Magical Girls, they're

如果你失敗了，你就必須停止剩下的訓練

 isn't properly registered as a Magical Girl, so I had

 沒有正確登記為魔法少女，所以我

.

 out.

 出去。

 is in the level below this. It's not as slimy there.

 是在這個水平以下。那裡沒那麼黏糊糊的。

, if you want to become a good Magical Girl, you

，如果你想成為一個優秀的魔法少女，你
