passages.content_zh: <[...]>我看起來像是想成為魔法少女嗎！ ？

passages.content:
Whatever, now listen:

this place's Magico's powe- *buzzzzzz*...
passages.content_zh:
不管怎樣，現在聽：

這個地方是 Magico 的力量 - *buzzzzzz*...

passages.content: <[...]>What? Come again?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>什麼？再來一次？

passages.content: It-*Buzzzz* and-*Buzzzz*-[...]
passages.content_zh: 它-*Buzzzz* 和-*Buzzzz*-[...]

passages.content: You hear nothing but static.
passages.content_zh: 除了靜電噪音，你什麼也聽不到。

passages.content:
<[...]>I guess we're off the grid. I didn't think that could even
happen with magic.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我想我們已經脫離電網了。我沒想到這甚至可以
與魔法一起發生。

passages.content:
Don't worry about it. Let's just beat the Magico and then we
can go back to chatting with .
passages.content_zh:
別擔心。讓我們打敗Magico 然後我們
可以回去與 聊天。

passages.content: The rusty key snaps after you open the door.
passages.content_zh: 打開門後，生鏽的鑰匙就會斷裂。

passages.content: The door is locked.
passages.content_zh: 門是鎖著的。

passages.content: <[...]>I guess we need a key.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我想我們需要一把鑰匙。

passages.content: <Little Girl>Please save Amy.
passages.content_zh: <小女孩>請救救艾米。

passages.content:
<Little Girl>Waaaahhh!

Please don't hurt me!
passages.content_zh:
<小女孩>哇啊啊啊！

請不要傷害我！

passages.content:
*Gasp*!

, there's a little girl in here!
passages.content_zh:
*喘氣*！

，這裡有一個小女孩！

passages.content: <[...]>Don't worry, we're here to help.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>別擔心，我們隨時為您提供協助。

passages.content: <Little Girl>Really?
passages.content_zh: <小女孩>真的嗎？

passages.content:
Yes, don't worry.

We're Magical Girls and we'll protect you from all the evil
monsters.
passages.content_zh:
是的，不用擔心。

我们是魔法少女，我们会保护你免受所有邪恶的侵害
怪物。

passages.content: <[...]>How did you get in here?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你是怎麼進來的？

passages.content:
<Little Girl>My sister and I found this glowing ticket in the street. When
we picked it up, there was this flash and then we were here...
passages.content_zh:
<小女孩>我和姊姊在街上發現了這張發光的票。當
我們拿起它，看到一道閃光，然後我們就到了這裡…

passages.content:
Your sister? Oh no, you mean there's someone else trapped
in here?
passages.content_zh:
你姐姐？喔不，你的意思是還有其他人被困
在這裡？

passages.content:
<Little Girl>Yes, we got split up when she went into a room to explore.

I opened the door with a key I found, but then it closed
by itself when Amy went in.
passages.content_zh:
<小女孩>是的，當她進入房間探索時我們就分開了。

我用找到的鑰匙打開了門，但隨後門就關上了
當艾米進去的時候，它自己就這樣了。

passages.content:
<Little Girl>I tried to open it again, but then a monster appeared and
I got scared.
passages.content_zh:
<小女孩>我試著再次打開它，但隨後出現了一個怪物並且
我害怕了。

passages.content: <[...]>Give us the key. We'll save your sister.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>給我們鑰匙。我們會救你妹妹的。

passages.content: <Little Girl>Thank you, ladies.
passages.content_zh: <小女孩>謝謝你們，女士們。

passages.content: Rusty Key was found!
passages.content_zh: 生鏽的鑰匙被發現了！

passages.content:
<[...]>You must be Amy.

We're here to rescue you.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你一定是艾米。

我們是來救你的。

passages.content: Yes, I'm Amy... but, lady...
passages.content_zh: 是的，我是艾米……但是，女士……

passages.content: You are too late!
passages.content_zh: 你來得太晚了！

passages.content: Kitchen Knife was found!
passages.content_zh: 菜刀被發現了！

passages.content:
<[...]>It doesn't seem very complicated. Let me see if I can play
it...
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>看起來並不是很複雜。讓我看看能不能玩
它...

passages.content: <[...]>Did something just open in the main hall?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>主廳裡剛剛有東西打開了嗎？

passages.content: This piano is preserved much better than the rest of the house.
passages.content_zh: 這架鋼琴比房子的其他部分保存得更好。

passages.content: <[...]>Hm, I could try to play a little.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嗯，我可以嘗試玩一下。

passages.content: You play a tune you learned when you were younger.
passages.content_zh: 你演奏一首年輕時學過的曲子。

passages.content: Wow! , that's beautiful.
passages.content_zh: 哇！ ， 那好美麗。

passages.content:
<[...]>When my parents were still together, my mother taught me
how to play a little.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>當我父母還在一起的時候，我媽媽就教我
怎麼玩一點。

passages.content: I wish my sisters had taught me something like that.
passages.content_zh: 我希望我的姊妹們能教我這樣的事。

passages.content: ! ! Are you okay?
passages.content_zh: ！ ！你還好嗎？

passages.content: ? ! Are you okay?
passages.content_zh: ？ ！你還好嗎？

passages.content: That was a nasty trap!
passages.content_zh: 那是一個骯髒的圈套！

passages.content: <[...]>Ouch! I guess it could've been worse. How about you?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>哎呀！我想情況可能會更糟。你呢？

passages.content: Don't worry, fire doesn't hurt me.
passages.content_zh: 別擔心，火不會傷害我。

passages.content: I'm alright... but seriously angry now!
passages.content_zh: 我沒事……但現在真的很生氣！

passages.content: <[...]>Damn, it's dark in here.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>該死，這裡太黑了。

passages.content: ...I sense something.
passages.content_zh: ……我感覺到了什麼。

passages.content: <[...]>Wh-What is it?
I... think it's a Magical Girl.
passages.content_zh: 我……認為這是魔法少女。

passages.content: <[...]>What? Do you think she was taken prisoner?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>什麼？你認為她被俘虜了嗎？

passages.content: In that case we have to rescue her!
passages.content_zh: 既然如此，我們就得救她！

passages.content: Yes, let's go!
passages.content_zh: 是的，我們走吧！

passages.content:
It's possible.

[...], we have to rescue her!
passages.content_zh:
這是有可能的。

[……]，我們一定要救她！

passages.content: Seal of Purity was found!
passages.content_zh: 純潔印記被發現了！

passages.content: Fairy's Dust was found!
passages.content_zh: 找到了仙女之塵！

passages.content: Candle of Bravery was found!
passages.content_zh: 勇敢蠟燭被發現了！

passages.content: You can't escape from me!
passages.content_zh: 你逃不出我的手掌心！

passages.content: I'm starting to get sick of all these illusions!
passages.content_zh: 我開始厭倦這些幻想了！

passages.content: <[...]>I'm just glad they aren't real.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我很高興它們不是真的。

passages.content: <[...]>Oh crap! I think we're trapped in here!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>喔糟糕！我想我們被困在這裡了！

passages.content: That was painful.
passages.content_zh: 那很痛苦。

passages.content: That hurt!
passages.content_zh: 好痛啊！

passages.content: The key is too big for the lock.
passages.content_zh: 鑰匙對於鎖來說太大了。

passages.content: <[...]>What's this doing here?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這是在做什麼？

passages.content: Music Sheet was found!
passages.content_zh: 樂譜找到了！

passages.content: White Crystal was found!
passages.content_zh: 發現白水晶了！

passages.content: Elegant Corset was found!
passages.content_zh: 優雅的緊身胸衣被發現了！

passages.content: <[...]>(A switch. Wonder if I should flip it.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（一個開關。不知道我是否應該翻轉它。）

passages.content: <[...]>A switch. Wonder if I should flip it.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>一個開關。想知道我是否應該翻轉它。

passages.content: <Magical Girl>...help...
passages.content_zh: <魔法少女>……救命……

passages.content: Don't worry, we're here.
passages.content_zh: 別擔心，我們就在這裡。

passages.content: casts Healing Light.
passages.content_zh: 施放治療之光。

passages.content: <Magical Girl>Thanks, I thought I was a goner.
passages.content_zh: <魔法少女>謝謝，我以為我已經死了。

passages.content:
We're happy to help. Magical Girls have to stick together
after all.
passages.content_zh:
我們很樂意提供協助。魔法少女們必須團結起來
畢竟。

passages.content:
<Magical Girl>...!?

I never imagined you would help me.
passages.content_zh:
〈魔法少女〉……！ ？

我從沒想過你會幫助我。

passages.content:
<[...]>How were you caught? I thought that when we get beaten,
we just get teleported back to camp.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你是怎麼被抓到的？我以為當我們被打敗時
我們只是被傳送回營地。

passages.content: <Magical Girl>They didn't beat me. I just collapsed.
passages.content_zh: <魔法少女>他們沒有打敗我。我簡直崩潰了。

passages.content: Collapsed?
passages.content_zh: 崩潰了？

passages.content:
<Magical Girl>I don't know why, but I've been feeling very tired lately. It
started when I went to the Tomb of Garak with .
passages.content_zh:
<魔法少女>不知道為什麼，最近我覺得很累。它
從我和我一起去蓋拉克之墓開始。

passages.content:
<[...]>The "Tomb of Garak"? It might be a good idea to check that
dungeon.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>「蓋拉克之墓」？檢查一下可能是個好主意
地牢。

passages.content: <Magical Girl>Thanks again for saving me. I'm\fi out\fi of here.
passages.content_zh: <魔法少女>再次感謝你救了我。我\fi離開\fi這裡。

passages.content: Golden Hairband was found!
passages.content_zh: 金髮帶被發現了！

passages.content: 300 were found!
passages.content_zh: 已找到300個！

passages.content: 2 Purple Crystals were found!
passages.content_zh: 發現2顆紫色水晶！

passages.content: 2 Candles of Bravery were found!
passages.content_zh: 發現了 2 根勇敢蠟燭！

passages.content:
...? !

Come on, you've got to be here somewhere!
passages.content_zh:
……？ ！

來吧，你一定在這兒的某個地方！

passages.content:
Don't give up hope, team! The Cutie Knights can never be
separated!
passages.content_zh:
不要放棄希望，團隊！可愛騎士團永遠不可能
分開了！

passages.content: ! If you can hear us, say something!
passages.content_zh: ！如果你聽得到我們的聲音，請說句話！

passages.content: This is moronic... Wherever  is, I'm sure she's fine.
passages.content_zh: 這太白痴了……無論在哪裡，我相信她都很好。

passages.content: How can you be so sure?
passages.content_zh: 你怎麼能這麼肯定？

passages.content:
She's one of the strongest fighters I've ever encountered.
I'm sure she'll come back on her own by morning. Probably
with a new Magico core to show off.
passages.content_zh:
她是我遇到過的最強大的戰士之一。
我確信她早上會自己回來。大概
帶有新的 Magico 核心可供炫耀。

passages.content: ...That's very optimistic of you.
passages.content_zh: ……你真是太樂觀了。

passages.content: Well what's the alternative??? To assume the worst?
passages.content_zh: 那麼還有什麼選擇呢？ ？ ？假設最壞的情況？

passages.content:
I just can't think of any reason why she'd head out alone...
and if the teleportation stones weren't used recently, then
there's not really anywhere safe she could have gone...
passages.content_zh:
我實在想不出她為什麼要一個人出去…
而如果最近沒有使用傳送石的話，那麼
她根本就沒有安全的地方可以去…

passages.content: Stop talking like that! I won't hear such cowardice!
passages.content_zh: 別再這樣說話了！我不會聽到這樣的懦弱！

passages.content: Stop it, both of you! You aren't helping with the search!
passages.content_zh: 你們兩個都停下吧！你沒有幫忙尋找！

passages.content:
It's obvious  isn't here. So we'll have to move to another
dungeon.

, what's next on your list?
passages.content_zh:
很明顯不在這裡。所以我們必須搬到另一個地方
地牢。

，你的清單上的下一個是什麼？

passages.content: Next up is-[...]
passages.content_zh: 接下來是-[...]

passages.content: ...Wait... Do you feel that?
passages.content_zh: ……等等……你有這種感覺嗎？

passages.content: Ack!
Wait, ???
She's alive!
passages.content_zh: 她還活著！

passages.content: Oh,  is so glad...
passages.content_zh: 噢，真是太高興了…

passages.content: ! I'm so happy to see you! I-[...]
passages.content_zh: ！我很高興見到你！我-[...]

passages.content: ! You're alright! You're still alive!
passages.content_zh: ！你沒事吧！你還活著！

passages.content:
<[...]>Hah... Yeah, I suppose I am...

But where am I? This place looks kind of familiar...
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>哈...是的，我想我是...

但我在哪裡？這個地方看起來有點眼熟…

passages.content: That doesn't matter. All that matters is that you're okay. You...
passages.content_zh: 那沒關係。重要的是你沒事。你...

passages.content:
...You scared me there. , if something had happened
to you, I... I don't know what I would've done.
passages.content_zh:
……你嚇到我了。 ，如果發生了什麼事
對你來說，我……我不知道我會做什麼。

passages.content:
<[...]>It's okay, . I'm fine. I just got summoned by
some wannabe demon-owners.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>沒關係，。我很好。我剛剛被召喚
一些想成為惡魔擁有者的人。

passages.content:
Summoned...? Ohh, that makes sense. Here, let me fix
something for you.
passages.content_zh:
被召喚了…？哦，這是有道理的。在這裡，讓我修復一下
給你的東西。

passages.content:
As your girlfriend touches your tattoo, you feel a strange
sense of grounding, as though your world was suddenly
realigned in her direction.
passages.content_zh:
當你的女朋友觸摸你的刺青時，你感到一種奇怪的感覺
腳踏實地的感覺，彷彿你的世界突然變得
重新調整到她的方向。

passages.content: <[...]>What was that?

I just connected our demonic identities a little more closely.
Now if anyone wants to summon you, they have to be powerful
enough to summon a lilim as well.
passages.content_zh:
我只是把我們的惡魔身分連結得更緊密了一點。
現在如果有人想召喚你，他們必須很強大
也足以召喚莉莉姆。

passages.content:
<[...]>Well, that's a relief. They were hoping to coerce me into
having sex with them.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>嗯，這讓人鬆了一口氣。他們希望脅迫我
與他們發生性關係。

passages.content:
<[...]>, I don't think I've ever been that angry before. It was
kind of frightening.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>，我想我以前從來沒有這麼生氣過。原來是
有點可怕。

passages.content:
Well, you\fi are\fr a demon now... Most of our kind are pretty
short-tempered, after all.
passages.content_zh:
好吧，你現在\fi是\fr一個惡魔...我們大多數人都很漂亮
畢竟脾氣暴躁。

passages.content: [...]'s Succubus Form' ATK+5
passages.content_zh: [...]的魅魔形態 ATK+5

passages.content:
<[...]>Well that's a relief. They were trying to coerce me into having
sex with them, but I outsmarted them pretty easily.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>好吧，這真是一種解脫。他們試圖強迫我
和他們發生性關係，但我很容易就比他們聰明。

passages.content:
<[...]>To be honest, it felt really good to mess with their heads
like that.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>說實話，搞亂他們的腦袋感覺真好
像那樣。

passages.content:
Well, you\fi are\fr a demon now... Most of our kind find
it fun to play games with the lives of others.
passages.content_zh:
好吧，你現在\fi是個惡魔...我們大多數人都發現
拿別人的生活做遊戲很有趣。

passages.content: [...]'s Succubus Form' MAT+5
passages.content_zh: [...]的魅魔形態'MAT+5

passages.content:
Just promise me you won't go causing trouble for people
who don't deserve it!
passages.content_zh:
答應我你不會給別人帶來麻煩
誰不值得！

passages.content: <[...]>I promise...
Anyway, the good news is that you're safe and sound!
passages.content_zh: 不管怎樣，好消息是你安然無恙！

passages.content:
Now let's get back to camp and call it a day. I still need to
let  know you didn't try to run away...
passages.content_zh:
現在讓我們回到營地，今天就到此為止。我還需要
讓你知道你並沒有試圖逃跑...

passages.content: That's going to be a looot of paperwork...
passages.content_zh: 這將是一大筆文書工作......

passages.content: <[...]>I'm sorry, .

Don't worry about it, it wasn't your fault. Let's get back to
camp and hope tomorrow is back to normal.
passages.content_zh:
別擔心，這不是你的錯。讓我們回到
營地，希望明天恢復正常。

passages.content:
Once back in camp, you feel utterly exhausted from your
ordeal. You fall into your bed and are fast asleep in no time.
passages.content_zh:
回到營地後，你會感到精疲力盡
考驗。你倒在床上，很快就睡著了。

passages.content: <Magico>Back for more?
passages.content_zh: <Magico>回來了解更多嗎？

passages.content:
<Little Girl>Ladies, you found me again! Those scary monsters grabbed
me and-[...]
passages.content_zh:
<小女孩>女士們，你們又找到我了！那些可怕的怪物抓住了
我和-[...]

passages.content:
<[...]>, are you positively, one hundred percent sure that
those ghosts were illusions?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>，您百分之百肯定嗎
那些鬼是幻覺嗎？

passages.content: Yes!
<[...]>In that case...
\fiShe\fr has to be the Magico!
passages.content_zh: \fi她\fr 一定是Magico！

passages.content:
<Little Girl>L-Ladies? What are you doing?

No, stay away! Somebody help meee!
passages.content_zh:
<小女孩>L-女士們？你在幹什麼？

不，遠離！有人幫幫我吧！

passages.content: <Magico>Oh my! What is this?
passages.content_zh: 〈魔術師>天啊！這是什麼？

passages.content:
<Magico>Poor girl, it seems you were left all alone.

Don't worry, I will take good care of you.
passages.content_zh:
<Magico>可憐的女孩，看來只剩下你一個人了。

放心吧，我會好好照顧你的。

passages.content:
<[...]>*Gasp*!

Stay back!
<Magico>I am going to enjoy this~.
passages.content_zh: <Magico>我會喜歡這個的~。

passages.content: The Magico rips your hat off and grabs the top of your head.
passages.content_zh: Magico 會扯掉你的帽子並抓住你的頭頂。

passages.content: <Magico>Oh? What is this?
passages.content_zh: <魔術師>哦？這是什麼？

passages.content:
<Magico>It seems I am not the only one pretending to be something
I am not.
passages.content_zh:
<Magico>看來我不是唯一一個假裝什麼的人
我不是。

passages.content: <Magico>Let me give you a hand with that.
passages.content_zh: <Magico>讓我來幫你吧。

passages.content:
Some kind of evil magic is directly pumped into your head.

Almost immediately, it feels as if your head is on fire, and
you cannot help but scream in pain.
passages.content_zh:
某種邪惡的魔法直接注入你的腦海中。

幾乎立刻，你就覺得自己的頭著火了，
你忍不住痛苦地尖叫。

passages.content:
<Magico>Yeees, scream more for me!

My cute, poor, little-[...]

<Magico>是的，為我尖叫更多！

我可愛的、可憐的、小-[...]

passages.content: <[...]>That was disturbing.
Good riddance!

passages.content: <[...]>Errr... , please calm down.
Sorry, , this Magico's tricks just pissed me off.

passages.content: I knew you could do it.

<[...]>Look, , this illusion isn't attacking.

Maybe it's because we beat Phantasmalia.

<[...]>看，這個幻象沒有攻擊。

也許是因為我們打敗了幻影。

passages.content: <[...]>Wow, this one's far more detailed than the others.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>哇，這個比其他的詳細得多。

passages.content: About that...
passages.content_zh: 關於那個...

passages.content: <[...]>Look at this! My hands go right through it.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>看看這個！我的手直接穿過它。

passages.content: That one isn't an illusion.
passages.content_zh: 那不是幻覺。

passages.content: <[...]>Huh...!? AAAAAAAHHHHH!!!
<Ghost Lady>How rude! Young lady, your lack of manners is disgraceful.
passages.content_zh: <鬼女>太粗魯了！小姐，妳的無禮是可恥的。

passages.content: I'm sorry about .
passages.content_zh: 我很抱歉。

passages.content: She... is still recovering from the fight with the Magico.

passages.content:
<[...]>You're right, that was terribly rude of me. I apologise for my
actions.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你是對的，這對我來說非常無禮。我為我的行為道歉
行動。

passages.content:
<[...]>Even if everything else we've run into in this house has been
an illusion, I shouldn't have assumed you were the same.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>即使我們在這房子裡遇到的一切都是
幻覺，我不應該假設你是一樣的。

passages.content: <[...]>Please forgive me.
You curtsy, eyes turned to the floor.
passages.content_zh: 你行屈膝禮，眼神轉向地板。

passages.content: You instinctively curtsy, despite your embarrassment.
passages.content_zh: 儘管你很尷尬，你還是本能地行了屈膝禮。

passages.content:
<Ghost Lady>Oh, was it you that dealt with that dreadful beast? You have
my gratitude. That thing made a complete mess of my home.
passages.content_zh:
<鬼女>哦，那隻可怕的野獸是你幹的嗎？你有
我的感激之情。那件事把我的家弄得一團糟。

passages.content:
Yes, I can't imagine how must have been to have your home
filled with those ridiculous illusions.
passages.content_zh:
是的，我無法想像擁有你的家會是什麼樣子
充滿了那些可笑的幻想。

passages.content: <[...]>Wait, so... she's a ghost? A REAL GHOST???
passages.content_zh: <[...]>等等，所以...她是鬼？真正的幽靈？ ？ ？

passages.content:
<Ghost Lady>*Sigh*

You are a perfect young lady, but your friend has terribly
unladylike manners.
passages.content_zh:
<幽靈女士>*嘆氣*

你是一位完美的年輕女士，但你的朋友很糟糕
不合淑女的舉止

passages.content: I'm sorry.
passages.content_zh: 對不起。

passages.content:
<Ghost Lady>Oh, you need not apologise, dear.

But, I think your friend needs a lesson on how to be more
proper.
passages.content_zh:
<幽靈女士>哦，親愛的，你不用道歉。

但是，我認為你的朋友需要一個關於如何變得更加優秀的課程
正確的。

passages.content: <[...]>Lesson!?
The ghost snaps her fingers.
passages.content_zh: 鬼魂打響指。

passages.content: Suddenly, you feel a terrible pressure around your waist!
passages.content_zh: 突然，你感覺到腰部有一股可怕的壓力！

passages.content:
<[...]>AAAAAHHHHHH!

OH SHIT, WHAT IS THIS!?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>啊啊啊啊啊！

喔該死，這是什麼！ ？

passages.content:
<Ghost Lady>Tsk tsk, such foul language!

This for your own good, my dear.
passages.content_zh:
<鬼女>嘖嘖，髒話啊！

這是為了你好，親愛的。

passages.content: <[...]>IT'S GETTING TIGHTER!

<Ghost Lady>This corset will come off by itself once you become more
ladylike.

You should thank me. There is something almost masculine
about you. This will help you become a better woman.
passages.content_zh:
<鬼女>一旦你變大了，這件緊身胸衣就會自己脫落

你應該感謝我。有一種近乎男性化的東西

passages.content: But...!

<Ghost Lady>Once again, my gratitude for defeating that monster, but now

<鬼女>再次感謝打敗那個怪物，但現在

passages.content:
<Ghost Lady>In any case, I must think of a way to properly reward you for

You know, young lady, you remind me of my daughter...

<鬼女>無論如何，我得想個辦法好好犒賞你
你的幫助。

你知道嗎，年輕的女士，你讓我想起了我的女兒......

passages.content:
<Ghost Lady>...Actually, I suppose not. You are much better mannered than

passages.content_zh:
<幽靈女士>……事實上，我想不是。你比你有禮貌

passages.content:
<Ghost Lady>No matter. You have the makings of a proper young lady,

<幽靈女士>沒關係。你有一個合格的年輕女士的氣質，

passages.content: <[...]>Oh, a corset! Thank you so much!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>哦，緊身胸衣！太感謝了！

passages.content: <[...]>(What the heck am I supposed to do with this???)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（我到底該怎麼處理這個？？？）

passages.content: <Ghost Lady>Here, let me help you try it on.
passages.content_zh: <鬼女>來，我幫你試穿。

passages.content:
The ghost snaps her fingers, and suddenly the corset lashes
itself into place around your torso, squeezing tightly.

鬼魂打了個響指，緊身胸衣突然猛烈地鞭打

passages.content: <[...]>T-Tight! It's... too tight!
<Ghost Lady>Poppycock! You just need a little adjusting.
passages.content_zh: <幽靈女士>胡說八道！你只需要稍微調整一下。

passages.content:
The ghost steps forward and places her hands on your waist.
You feel a cold tingling sensation that numbs your sides,
followed by relief. The corset is now much less restrictive.
passages.content_zh:
鬼魂向前一步，將雙手放在你的腰部。
你會感到一陣冰冷的刺痛感，讓你的身體兩側都麻木了
隨後是緩解。現在緊身胸衣的限制要少得多。

passages.content: <[...]>Whew... That's much better. Thank you.

You take a moment to examine the corset, luxurious black with

你花點時間檢查一下緊身胸衣，奢華的黑色，
紅色穿線。你會情不自禁地註意到它是如何凸顯你的
身體的曲線。

passages.content:
[...] can now equip corsets.

[...] has equipped a Vintage Corset.

[...]現在可以裝備緊身胸衣。

[...] 裝備了復古緊身胸衣。

passages.content: <[...]>(As if I needed more girly stuff in my life.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（好像我的生活中需要更多少女的東西。）

passages.content:
As you watch, the corset seems to glow for a brief moment

當你觀看時，緊身胸衣似乎會短暫發光

passages.content: <[...]>That's strange, I feel healthier than before.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>奇怪了，我感覺比以前更健康了。

passages.content: <Ghost Lady>Just one last gift for you as a reward for your service.

passages.content:
<Ghost Lady>It was no trouble at all. Unfortunately, I really must return

passages.content_zh:
<幽靈女士>一點也不麻煩。不幸的是，我真的必須回來

passages.content: , are you ok?
passages.content_zh: ，你還好嗎？

passages.content:
I hate to say this, but it seems like it's cursed.

I don't think we can remove it, but maybe somebody back

我不想這麼說，但它看起來像是被詛咒了。

既然你已經有了纖細的腰，束腹就不會痛

It's been a while since I've gone on a stroll through the

我已經有一段時間沒有去逛街了

Not exactly, but close enough. Don't worry about that for now,

The Magico sealed in here isn't very strong, but it's capable

, you probably don't know this, but Magical Girls can

Now, there is a dryad somewhere in this forest. Just find

passages.content_zh:
，你可能不知道，但魔法少女可以

現在，這片森林的某個地方有一個樹妖。只要找到

什麼？哦，對了，我明白為什麼森林之靈不想要

But don't worry. I know , and I'm sure she'll help if

但不用擔心。我知道，而且我相信她會幫忙的

Don't you dare hurt her, !

 out!

你不敢傷害她！

 出去！

It kind of looks like beeswax.

Wow! It's incredibly hard!

它看起來有點像蜂蠟。

Oh no! That's the way to 's grove. Did the Magico

哦不！這就是去小樹林的路。魔術師有嗎

Magical Girls, you now have a new mission:

魔法少女們，你們現在有了新的使命：

Good job, girls! I will just teleport the

幹得好，女孩們！我只會傳送

<Nele>Good work, dearies!

<Nele>幹得好，親愛的！

<Nele>Don't worry. I am just taking over

<內萊>別擔心。我只是接手

<Nele>She's busy undoing the Magico's

如果不是你們，女孩們，她們就會

Please wait, Miss Nele.

請稍等，奈爾小姐。

Please wait, Miss Nele.

請稍等，奈爾小姐。

Please wait, Miss Nele.

請稍等，奈爾小姐。
賦予魔法。她是

<Nele>You're right girls.

<Nele>你們是對的，女孩們。
我發現這很神奇

passages.content:

passages.content:

<內萊>你是對的。

<Nele>做得很好。隨意用它來對抗那些

<[...]>...Judging by her voice, I guess Nele hates

<[...]> ...從她的聲音來看，我猜妮蕾討厭

passages.content:
<Nele>I just gave you a bit of my wind magic.

<Nele>我刚刚给了你一些我的风系魔法。
一定要嘗試一下，因為它特別

passages.content: <[...]>This place is like a giant beehive!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這個地方就像一個巨大的蜂巢！

passages.content: The Magico must be insect-based.
passages.content_zh: Magico 必須是基於昆蟲的。

passages.content: Well duh, you've been fighting bees, remember?

If I were you, I would avoid the bees for now and concentrate

Once you can deal with their poison, you can squash bugs

如果我是你，我會暫時避開蜜蜂並集中精力

一旦你能處理掉它們的毒素，你就可以消滅蟲子

<[...]>Nevermind...

Look! It's another Magical Girl!

Hi! It's me, . You're part of 's team, right?

看！這又是一個魔法少女啊！

你好！這就是我， 。你是我們團隊的一員，對嗎？

passages.content: <Drill-twintailed Magical Girl>...Yes, this is it.

passages.content: Hey, stop ignoring me...

passages.content: So, did you find anything, friend?
passages.content_zh: 那麼，朋友，你有發現什麼嗎？

passages.content:
<Drill-twintailed Magical Girl>Yes, .

This is the nexus of the hive's collective consciousness.
passages.content_zh:
<鑽雙馬尾魔法少女>是的，。

這是蜂巢集體意識的紐帶。

passages.content:
Ooohhh! So that is how the Magico is doing it. She sublimated
herself into the collective hive mind.
passages.content_zh:
哦哦！ Magico 就是這麼做的。她昇華了
她自己融入了集體蜂巢思維。

passages.content: Really!?
Wait, what is the Magico doing?
passages.content_zh: 等等，魔法師在做什麼？

passages.content: That's none of your business!
passages.content_zh: 那不關你的事！

passages.content: Let's go home, friend.
passages.content_zh: 我們回家吧，朋友。

passages.content: <Drill-twintailed Magical Girl>Yes, .
passages.content_zh: <鑽雙馬尾魔法少女>是的，。

passages.content: <[...]>Uhm, didn't 's friend seem a bit... strange?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>呃，你的朋友是不是看起來有點……奇怪？

passages.content:
I don't trust that doll girl and her "friends". They're ALL
strange, even the tiny blonde.
passages.content_zh:
我不相信那個娃娃女孩和她的「朋友」。他們都是
很奇怪，即使是那個小小的金髮女郎。

passages.content: <[...]>Hey, ? Didn't 's friend seem a bit... strange?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>嘿，？難道你的朋友看起來有點……奇怪嗎？

passages.content:
Yeah. How does she manage to keep her hair so perfect
with those huge twin tails?

She must be using a special shampoo.
passages.content_zh:
是的。她是如何讓頭髮保持如此完美的
那些巨大的雙尾巴？

她一定是用了特殊的洗髮精。

passages.content: <[...]>Not that, she was acting like a zombie.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>不是那樣，她表現得像個殭屍。

passages.content: She was...? But she didn't even try to eat our brains.
passages.content_zh: 她...？但她甚至沒有嘗試吃掉我們的大腦。

passages.content: <[...]>...Sometimes you can be such a ditz.
I know. People say that a lot.
passages.content_zh: 我知道。人們常這麼說。

passages.content: This crystal is covered in honey and beeswax.
passages.content_zh: 這種水晶覆蓋著蜂蜜和蜂蠟。

passages.content:
<[...]>"Sublimated into the hive mind..."

"Nexus of collective consciousness..."
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>“昇華到蜂巢意識中…”

“集體意識的紐帶…”

passages.content:
What is it, ?

Did you understand any of what  and her friend were
talking about?
passages.content_zh:
它是什麼？

你明白她的朋友是什麼嗎
談什麼？

passages.content: Yes, ; did you see through 's master plan?
passages.content_zh: 是的， ;你看透總體規劃了嗎？

passages.content:
EEP! Sorry, . I forgot you were with us for a moment
there.
passages.content_zh:
埃普！對不起， 。我忘了你和我們在一起的那一刻
那裡。

passages.content:
It's okay, . I am having a wonderful time watching you
work out my puzzle.
passages.content_zh:
沒關係， 。看著你我很開心
解決我的難題。

passages.content:
<[...]>... is it possible for the Magico to hide itself in...
well... I guess you could call it the "minds" of the bees?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>...Magico 是否有可能將自己隱藏在...
嗯……我想你可以稱之為蜜蜂的「思想」？

passages.content: That's very good, ! You're beginning to catch on.
passages.content_zh: 那就太好了，！你開始明白了。

passages.content:
Powerful magic-users can sublimate their physical bodies
to exist as beings of pure thought to enter and dominate the
minds of others.
passages.content_zh:
強大的魔法使用者可以昇華自己的肉身
作為純粹思想的存在而存在，進入並主宰
別人的想法。

passages.content: It is really quite fun.
passages.content_zh: 這真的很有趣。

passages.content:
(I'm beginning to wonder if I wasn't better off working with
Garak.)
passages.content_zh:
（我開始懷疑與他們一起工作是否會更好
加拉克。 ）

passages.content:
Of course, even magical bees have very small minds. So
how would our Magico be able to get around that?
passages.content_zh:
當然，即使是神奇的蜜蜂也有非常小的頭腦。所以
我們的 Magico 該如何解決這個問題呢？

passages.content: ...By using a lot of bees?
passages.content_zh: ……透過使用大量蜜蜂？

passages.content: Very good, !  has such clever teammates.
passages.content_zh: 非常好， ！  有這麼聰明的隊友。

passages.content:
Then how are we going to catch it? We can't beat all the bees;
there're just too many.
passages.content_zh:
那我們要怎麼抓住它呢？我們無法打敗所有的蜜蜂；
實在是太多了。

passages.content:
That part is easy. Do you remember how you foiled 's
plan to make everyone in camp be 's friends?
passages.content_zh:
那部分很容易。你還記得你是如何挫敗的嗎
計劃讓營地裡的每個人都成為朋友嗎？

passages.content:
Her smile never fades, but for just a moment her gaze is pure
ice.
passages.content_zh:
她的笑容從未褪色，但有那麼一刻，她的目光是純淨的
冰。

passages.content:
<[...]>When we showed up and your crystal broke, that seemed
to do the trick.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>當我們出現時，你的水晶碎了，看起來
來做到這一點。

passages.content:
<[...]>But this crystal looks much tougher. Maybe if we had something
heavy, we-[...]
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>但這塊水晶看起來要堅韌得多。也許如果我們有什麼
沉重，我們-[...]

passages.content:
<[...]>I'm not sure, but...

, are you there?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我不確定，但是...

，你在嗎？

passages.content: Of course. Did you even have to ask?
passages.content_zh: 當然。還需要問嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>I was wondering, ... is it possible for the Magico
to hide itself in... well... I guess you could call it the
"minds" of the bees?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我想知道...Magico 是否有可能
把自己隱藏在……好吧……我想你可以稱它為
蜜蜂的「思想」？

passages.content:
Using powerful magic, it is indeed possible to sublimate the
physical body and exist as a being of pure thought inside
somebody else's mind.
passages.content_zh:
使用強大的魔法，確實可以昇華
物理身體並作為內在純粹思想的存在而存在
別人的心思。

passages.content:
But bees, even magical ones, have simple minds. They
wouldn't be able to support much of anything, unless...
passages.content_zh:
但蜜蜂，即使是神奇的蜜蜂，也有簡單的頭腦。他們
無法支持任何東西，除非......

passages.content:
Unless you use a LOT of bees! So that's where the Magico
is hiding!
passages.content_zh:
除非你使用很多蜜蜂！這就是Magico的地方
正在隱藏！

passages.content:
<[...]>Well, if this is a "nexus" or whatever, I think something will
happen if we get rid of it.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>好吧，如果這是一個「聯繫」或其他什麼，我認為有些東西會
如果我們擺脫它就會發生。

passages.content:
<[...]>The crystal looks tough, but I think if I had something heavy,
we-[...]
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>水晶看起來很堅硬，但我想如果我有很重的東西，
我們-[...]

passages.content: Sure, we could do that, or-[...]
passages.content_zh: 當然，我們可以這樣做，或者-[...]

passages.content: If the fire is hot enough, almost anything burns.
passages.content_zh: 如果火夠熱，幾乎任何東西都會燃燒。

passages.content: <[...]>I guess that's one way of dealing with it.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我想這是處理它的一種方法。

passages.content:
...Thank you for not doing that in my dorm room.

I do not think I could be friends with you if you had engulfed
everything I love in flames.
passages.content_zh:
……謝謝你沒有在我的宿舍裡這樣做。

如果你吞沒了，我想我不可能跟你成為朋友
我所愛的一切都在火焰中。

passages.content:
Anyway, the Magico should have a physical body now. She's
probably hiding in her throne room.
passages.content_zh:
無論如何，Magico現在應該有肉身了。她是
可能躲在她的王座房間裡。

passages.content:
Good work, girls. I just picked up the Magico's signal in the
throne room.
passages.content_zh:
幹得好，女孩們。我剛剛收到 Magico 的訊號
王座室。

passages.content: Let's squash that Magico!
passages.content_zh: 讓我們粉碎那個魔法師吧！

passages.content:
<[...]>There's something here.

It's a key. One of those girls must've dropped it.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>這裡有東西。

這是一把鑰匙。肯定是其中一個女孩把它掉了。

passages.content: Seems like the bees used this passage to surprise .
passages.content_zh: 看來蜜蜂是用這段話來嚇人的。

passages.content: <[...]>Damn! We should've guessed this place would be guarded.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>該死！我們應該猜到這個地方會有人把守。

passages.content: As if a few bugs could stop us!
passages.content_zh: 好像一些錯誤就可以阻止我們一樣！

passages.content: Less talking, more fighting! Attack!
passages.content_zh: 少說話，多戰鬥！攻擊！

passages.content:
<[...]>It seems like normal water. Are you sure this is going to
help ?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>看起來就像普通的水。你確定會嗎
幫忙？

passages.content: Yes. Just hurry up and take it to her!
passages.content_zh: 是的。趕緊拿給她吧！

passages.content:
This looks like the Magico's throne room. Come on, !
Let's get it!
passages.content_zh:
這看起來就像是 Magico 的王座室。快點， ！
讓我們得到它！

passages.content: <[...]>Wait, ! We should at least-[...]
CHARGE!
...Where's the Magico?
passages.content_zh: ……魔法師在哪裡？

passages.content: Let me scan for it...
passages.content_zh: 讓我掃描一下...

passages.content: What the hell!?
passages.content_zh: 我勒個去！ ？

passages.content: <[...]>What? Where is it?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>什麼？它在哪裡？

passages.content:
According to the readings I'm getting, the Magico is...
everywhere in the hive.
passages.content_zh:
根據我得到的讀數，Magico 是...
蜂巢內各處。

passages.content:
Did this thing break again?

I knew we shouldn't have canceled the maintenance plan!
passages.content_zh:
這東西又壞了？

我就知道我們不應該取消維護計劃！

passages.content:
The Magico must be hiding somewhere in the hive.

Don't worry, . We'll find it!
passages.content_zh:
魔法師肯定藏在蜂巢的某個地方。

不用擔心， 。我們會找到它的！

passages.content: That's the spirit, .
passages.content_zh: 這就是精神，。

passages.content: <[...]>Wait a second.
<[...]>I think I have an idea. We should check out that crystal.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我想我有個主意。我們應該檢查一下那個水晶。

passages.content:
<[...]>First Slime Princess, now a queen bee...? ,
do Magicos have some kind of obsession with royalty?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>第一位史萊姆公主，現在是蜂王…？ ,
Magicos 對皇室有某種痴迷嗎？

passages.content: It's not an uncommon theme, but there are plenty that don't.
passages.content_zh: 這不是一個不常見的主題，但也有很多不常見的主題。

passages.content: Remember Phantasmalia?
passages.content_zh: 還記得幻影嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Oh, right.

Most of the more dangerous Magicos keep a low profile,
gathering power in the background to avoid attention.
passages.content_zh:
大多數更危險的魔法師都保持低調，
在後台聚集力量以避免引起注意。

passages.content:
The Magicos we have you girls train against tend to be stupid
ones who lack any real skill at subtlety.
passages.content_zh:
我們讓你們女孩們訓練的魔術師往往很愚蠢
缺乏真正的微妙技巧的人。

passages.content:
Makes sense. There's no better way for someone to put a
target on their own back than to make a claim for the throne.
passages.content_zh:
有道理。對某人來說，沒有比這更好的方法了
他們的目標遠勝於爭奪王位。

passages.content:
Pretty much. You just have to watch out for the rare few who
actually manage to survive.
passages.content_zh:
差不多了。你只需要留意極少數的人
實際上能夠生存下來。

passages.content:
Of course, if you come across any Magicos in the wild that
like to show off, watch out. Those are the ones that were
actually strong enough to survive.
passages.content_zh:
當然，如果你在野外遇到任何魔法師
喜歡炫耀，小心點。那些是那些
其實夠堅強才能生存。

passages.content:
Hmm... If we want to find a Bee Magico, we'll need to
think like a Bee Magico!
passages.content_zh:
嗯...如果我們想找到蜜蜂魔法師，我們需要
像蜜蜂魔術師一樣思考！

passages.content: Hmmmmm!

<[...]>Uhh... ?

You don't seem to be wearing any underwear.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>呃...？

你好像沒穿內衣。

passages.content: OH!
Sorry, I wasn't thinking.
passages.content_zh: 抱歉，我沒有多想。

passages.content:
Now this is more like it. A proper seat from which I can speak
to those beneath me.
passages.content_zh:
現在這更像了。一個適合我講話的座位
給那些在我之下的人。

passages.content: <[...]>Enjoying the view from up there, Princess?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>欣賞上面的景色嗎，公主？

passages.content: Very much so, yes.
passages.content_zh: 非常如此，是的。

passages.content:
...But I suppose we have a Magico to hunt down. Come along,
minions.
passages.content_zh:
……但我想我們有一個Magico要追捕。來吧，
奴才。

passages.content: Hmm...
Is something wrong, ?
passages.content_zh: 有什麼問題嗎？

passages.content: No, I guess not. It's just hard when things don't go your way.
passages.content_zh: 不，我想不是。當事情不按你的意願發展時，事情就很難了。

passages.content: Aww, that's true. I'm sorry.
passages.content_zh: 哇，這是真的。對不起。

passages.content:
But cheer up! I'm sure your next plan will go off without a
hitch.
passages.content_zh:
但振作起來！我確信你的下一個計劃將會順利進行
搭便車。

passages.content: Thank you.  hopes so.
passages.content_zh: 謝謝。  希望如此。

passages.content:
There you are!

You have no place to run to anymore, Magico!
passages.content_zh:
你在那裡！

你已經無處可逃了，Magico！

passages.content:
<Magico>You destroyed the focusing crystal. Damn you!

I was so close to discovering how to transfer myself into
the minds of Magical Girls.
passages.content_zh:
<Magico>你破壞了聚焦水晶。該死的你！

我差點就發現如何將自己轉移到
魔法少女們的心。

passages.content: <[...]>So that was your plan.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這就是你的計畫。

passages.content:
<Magico>Yes, it was the perfect way of not only escaping, but also
infiltrating the Magical Girls' ranks.

You'll be sorry for ruining it!
passages.content_zh:
<Magico>是的，這不僅是逃脫的完美方式，也是
滲透到魔法少女的隊伍中。

毀了它你會後悔的！

passages.content:
<Monarch Insect>Oh, back for another go? You really must wish to become
drones after all!
passages.content_zh:
<帝王蟲>哦，又回來了？你一定希望成為
畢竟是無人機！

passages.content:
<Monarch Insect>Damn it!

I hate how they disappear just when I beat them!
passages.content_zh:
<帝王蟲>可惡！

我討厭當我擊敗他們時他們就消失了！

passages.content: <Monarch Insect>But wait, what's this? One is still here!
passages.content_zh: <帝王蟲>等等，這是什麼？有一個還在這裡！

passages.content: <[...]>No! What are you doing!?
The Magico stabs your left buttock with her stinger.
passages.content_zh: 魔法師用她的毒刺刺傷你的左臀部。

passages.content: <[...]>AAAAAAHHHHHH!

<Monarch Insect>It's not every day I get the chance to transform a Magical
Girl into a drone.
passages.content_zh:
<帝王蟲>不是每天都有機會變魔法的
女孩進入無人機。

passages.content:
<Monarch Insect>A single dose of my mutagenic poison is enough to start the
transformation, but you Magical Girls have been a pain in
my ass, so...
passages.content_zh:
<帝王蟲>我的一劑致突變毒就足以啟動
變身，但是你們魔法少女們一直很痛苦
我的屁股，所以…

passages.content: The Magico stings your right buttock.
passages.content_zh: Magico 會刺痛你的右臀部。

passages.content: <[...]>It hurts! It hurts!

<Monarch Insect>It's supposed to hurt! But don't worry, it will get better once
you are a drone...
passages.content_zh:
<帝王蟲>應該很痛吧！但別擔心，一次就會好起來
你是一架無人機...

passages.content: <Monarch Insect>Damn it! She disappeared!
passages.content_zh: <帝王蟲>可惡！她消失了！

passages.content: There's room for only one matriarch here!
passages.content_zh: 這裡只能容納一位女族長！

passages.content: Another victory for the Cutie Knights!
passages.content_zh: 可愛騎士隊的另一場勝利！

passages.content: <[...]>I'm not so sure about that name...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我不太確定這個名字...

passages.content: Come on, , it's time for our victory pose!
passages.content_zh: 來吧，我們擺出勝利姿勢的時間到了！

passages.content: Come on, girls, it's time for our victory pose!
passages.content_zh: 來吧，女孩們，是時候擺出勝利姿勢了！

passages.content: <[...]>Victory pose?
Oh right, we still don't have a victory pose.
passages.content_zh: 喔對了，我們還沒有擺出勝利的姿勢。

passages.content: We should work on that someday.
passages.content_zh: 有一天我們應該為此努力。

passages.content:
Anyway, good job smashing that Magico.
I can teleport you back if you want.
passages.content_zh:
無論如何，幹得好，粉碎了那個 Magico。
如果你願意的話我可以傳送你回來。

passages.content:
...?

Didn't you want to ask  for help?
passages.content_zh:
……？

你不想尋求幫助嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>Oh right!

Yes, let's do that first.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>哦，對了！

是的，我們先這樣做。

passages.content: Let's go!

HAVE YOU FORGOTTEN ABOUT \NU[16] ALREADY!?

GO AND RESCUE HER, DAMMIT! \NU[9] OUT!
passages.content_zh:
你已經忘記\NU[16]了嗎！ ？

去救她吧，該死！ \NU[9] 出局！

passages.content: <[...]>Oh right! Let's rescue her ASAP!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>哦，對了！我們盡快救她吧！

passages.content: We'll save her from those buzzing bullies!
passages.content_zh: 我們會把她從那些喧鬧的惡霸手中救出來！

passages.content: Okay, have fun.
passages.content_zh: 好吧，玩得開心。

passages.content: <[...]>Huh, this throne is actually pretty comfy.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>呃，這個王座其實還蠻舒服的。

passages.content:
<[...]>Oof, this throne is hard as a rock! How could anyone stand
sitting here all day?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>哎喲，這王座堅硬如磐石！怎麼會有人站得住
整天坐在這裡？

passages.content: Ahem.
...My name is... Umm...
<[...]>, is everything alright?
Sorry, I thought I had something, but...
passages.content_zh: 抱歉，我以為我有東西，但...

passages.content: Never mind.
passages.content_zh: 沒關係。

passages.content:
♪ My name is ,

a queen bee black and yella!

But I'd sooner be a friend, you see,

than ever sting a fella!♪
passages.content_zh:
♪ 我的名字是，

一隻黑蜂王和耶拉！

但我更願意成為朋友，你看，

比以往任何時候都刺痛一個傢伙！ ♪

passages.content_zh: <[...]>但是你不更喜歡真正的朋友嗎？

passages.content:
glares at you. You can feel the room temperature falling
rapidly.
passages.content_zh:
瞪著你。你能感覺到室溫下降
迅速。

passages.content: They\fi are\fr real!
passages.content_zh: 它們\fi是\fr真實的！

passages.content:
<[...]>Calm down, , I just wondered if you wouldn't prefer
friends who talk back to you.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>冷靜點，我只是想知道你是否不喜歡
和你頂嘴的朋友。

passages.content:
Ah, shows what you know.

My dolls do talk back to me.
passages.content_zh:
啊，顯示你所知道的。

我的娃娃確實會跟我頂嘴。

passages.content:
And I think that pretty soon, they're going to talk with you,
too.
passages.content_zh:
我認為很快他們就會和你談談
也是。

passages.content: <[...]>Errr... okay, sure , whatever you say.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>呃...好吧，當然，無論你說什麼。

passages.content: Come back any time.
passages.content_zh: 隨時回來。

passages.content:
<[...]>Hi, .

What're you making?
<[...]>How are you doing, ?
I'm perfectly fine.
passages.content_zh: 我很好。

passages.content: [...]... don't you want to be happy...?
passages.content_zh: [……]……你不想幸福嗎……？

passages.content:
<[...]>Why do you keep asking me
about happiness?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你為什麼老問我
關於幸福？

passages.content: Happiness is important, [...].
passages.content_zh: 幸福很重要，[...]。

passages.content: Everyone deserves to be happy.
passages.content_zh: 每個人都應該得到幸福。

passages.content:
<[...]>I suppose that with your past it is
natural that you would develop an
obsession with happiness.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我想你的過去就是這樣
很自然地你會開發一個
對幸福的執著。

passages.content:
<[...]>But , you can't force people
to be happy.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>但是，你不能強迫別人
快樂。

passages.content:
You are wrong! Oh, if only you would let
me show you...
passages.content_zh:
您錯了！哦，如果你願意的話
我給你看...

passages.content:
<[...]>It's not true happiness if you just
force somebody to be happy.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>如果你只是
強迫某人快樂。

passages.content:
Why does it matter where happiness
comes from?
passages.content_zh:
為什麼幸福在哪裡很重要
來自？

passages.content:
<[...]>What if it comes from something that
hurts you in the long run, like drugs?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>如果它來自某個東西怎麼辦？
長遠來看，會像毒品一樣傷害你嗎？

passages.content: Well... I mean...
passages.content_zh: 嗯...我的意思是...

passages.content: My methods don't cause any harm!
passages.content_zh: 我的方法不會造成任何傷害！

passages.content: <[...]>I'm not so sure about that...

You two spend a long time discussing the nature
of happiness.
passages.content_zh:
你們兩個花了很長時間討論自然
的幸福。

passages.content:
Despite her above average intelligence,
is a poor debater.
passages.content_zh:
儘管她的智力高於平均水平，
是一個糟糕的辯手。

passages.content:
But [...], can't you see that my
way is the only one that leads to
eternal happiness?
passages.content_zh:
但是[...]，你看不到我的
方法是唯一通往
永恆的幸福？

passages.content:
<[...]>Perhaps, but maybe feeling sadness
from time to time makes those happy
moments so much better.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>也許，但也許感到悲傷
時不時讓那些人開心
瞬間好多了。

passages.content:
I need to think about what you
just said.
passages.content_zh:
我需要想想你在做什麼
剛才說。

passages.content:
You stay a bit longer in 's room before the two of
you head out for dinner.
She seems to appreciate the company.
passages.content_zh:
在兩個人之前你在房間裡待的時間長一點
你出去吃晚餐。
她似乎很欣賞這家公司。

passages.content: Please let me make you happy...
passages.content_zh: 請讓我讓你幸福...

passages.content: <[...]>Not this again .
Sorry, I...
passages.content_zh: 對不起，我...

passages.content: Oh, okay.
Good evening, [...].
<[...]>Evening, .
<[...]>Is something bothering you?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>有什麼事情讓你煩惱嗎？

passages.content:
I... I have been thinking about what you said... About
free will... and about my dolls...
passages.content_zh:
我...我一直在想你說的...關於
自由意志……還有我的娃娃……

passages.content:
I think I need to see how it really feels. But I need your
help to see how it really is.
passages.content_zh:
我想我需要看看它的真實感受。但我需要你的
幫助了解它到底是怎樣的。

passages.content: <[...]>What are you talking about?
Dolls and happiness...
passages.content_zh: 娃娃和幸福...

passages.content: This might be a little strange, but will you help me?
passages.content_zh: 這可能有點奇怪，但是你能幫我嗎？

passages.content: Help me set things up...
passages.content_zh: 幫我安排...

passages.content: Okay... sorry for bothering you...
passages.content_zh: 好吧…抱歉打擾您了…

passages.content:
<[...]>Damn, 's room always creeps
me out. It just feels like her dolls' eyes
are following me.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>該死，房間總是令人毛骨悚然
我出去。感覺就像她洋娃娃的眼睛
正在跟著我。

passages.content: <[...]>(Wow,  is really tidy. I wonder, maybe in this drawer...?)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（哇，真整潔。我想，也許在這個抽屜裡......？）

passages.content: <[...]>Yes! I found it:\I[841]!
<[...]>(...Shit, I feel like a pervert.)
passages.content_zh: <[...]>（...該死，我覺得自己像個變態。）

passages.content: <[...]>I hope  doesn't find out.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我希望沒有發現。

passages.content:
<[...]>(What the...? I'm back home and no longer dressed in
that ridiculous Magical Girl outfit!)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（什麼...？我回到家了，不再穿衣服了
那件可笑的魔法少女服裝！ ）

passages.content:
<[...]>(Wait a second, what Magical Girl outfit?

What the hell am I thinking about!?)
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>（等一下，什麼魔法少女服裝？

我到底在想什麼！ ？ ）

passages.content: <Father>Hurry up, , your mother and brother are already ready!
passages.content_zh: <爸爸>快點，你媽媽和弟弟已經準備好了！

passages.content:
<[...]>They are...?

But wait, aren't they gone?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>他們是...？

但等等，他們不是走了嗎？

passages.content:
<Father>What are you mumbling about, ? Hurry up, we're all
waiting for you!
passages.content_zh:
<父親>你在嘀咕什麼？快點，我們都
等著你！

passages.content: <[...]>Sorry, I'm coming!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>對不起，我來了！

passages.content: , no!

<[...]>WHAT THE FUCK!?

A cosplayer just blew a hole in my room!
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>他媽的是什麼！ ？

一個角色扮演者剛剛在我的房間裡炸了一個洞！

passages.content: What's wrong, ? It's me, .
passages.content_zh: 怎麼了， ？這就是我， 。

passages.content:
<[...]>Oh it's you, ... no, wait... who...? My head feels
so heavy...

It's this place, .  is trying to control you!

Please come with me, it's the only way to escape.
passages.content_zh:
就是這個地方，。  正在試圖控制你！

請跟我來，這是唯一的逃生之路。

passages.content:
(There's no way in hell I'm going to follow some cosplaying
freak while my family's waiting for me.)
passages.content_zh:
（我根本不可能去追隨一些角色扮演
當我的家人在等我時，我感到很奇怪。 ）

passages.content: <[...]>Great... and just like that, I'm crossdressing again.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>太好了...就這樣，我又變裝了。

passages.content:
, you made it!

I was afraid you'd fall for 's tricks.
passages.content_zh:
，你成功了！

我怕你中了他的詭計。

passages.content: <[...]>Do you have any idea where we are, ?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你知道我們在哪裡嗎？

passages.content: I think we're still in 's room.
passages.content_zh: 我想我們還在房間裡。

passages.content: <[...]>We are!? But how'd it end up like this?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我們是！ ？但事情怎麼會變成這樣呢？

passages.content:
I'm not 100% sure, but it seems she's trying to brainwash
us.

She seems to be using the old trick of showing an idealised
version of one's life to soften the target's mental resistance.
passages.content_zh:
我不是100%確定，但她似乎在試著洗腦
我們。

她似乎在用老把戲來表現理想化的形象
一個人的生活版本，以軟化目標的心理抵抗。

passages.content:
Good thing our mindscapes became entangled, so I was
able to find you.
passages.content_zh:
還好我們的思維糾纏在一起，所以我
能夠找到你。

passages.content: <[...]>Thank you, . But how did you escape?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>謝謝你，。但你是怎麼逃出來的呢？

passages.content:
Well... I found myself in bed back in my old home.

I was almost falling asleep when one of my older sisters
came to my room to kiss me good night and tell me she
loved me.
passages.content_zh:
嗯……我發現自己回到了老家的床上。

我快要睡著的時候，我的一個姐姐
來到我的房間吻我晚安並告訴我她
愛我。

passages.content:
That's when I understood it wasn't real, because she'd never
do that.
passages.content_zh:
那時我才明白這不是真的，因為她從來沒有
這樣做。

passages.content: <[...]>...It's a good thing you escaped, but that's...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>...你逃脫了是件好事，但那是...

passages.content:
Now's not the time to talk. We have to find a way to wake
up before we become 's slaves.
passages.content_zh:
現在不是說話的時候。我們必須找到一種叫醒的方法
在我們成為 的奴隸之前。

passages.content: <Man>Time to go to bed, little princess.
passages.content_zh: <男>該睡了，小公主。

passages.content: <Girl>But dad, I'm not tired yet.
passages.content_zh: <女孩>但是爸爸，我還沒累。

passages.content:
<Woman>Now now, , you heard your father. Be a good girl and
go to bed.
passages.content_zh:
<女人>現在，現在，你聽到了你父親的聲音。做一個好女孩並且
去睡覺吧。

passages.content: <Girl>Okay mom, but would you read me another story?
passages.content_zh: <女孩>好的，媽媽，但是你能再給我讀一個故事嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>""?

, do you we think we're in...?

In 's memories?

Yes, I think so.
passages.content_zh:
記憶裡？

是的，我想是的。

passages.content:
<Detective>...suffered multiple vicious stab wounds. Whoever did this
was angry. Very angry.
passages.content_zh:
<偵探>...遭受多處惡性刺傷。誰做了這事
很生氣。很生氣。

passages.content: Detective, the girl is still alive!
passages.content_zh: 偵探，那個女孩還活著！

passages.content: <Detective>Quick, get the paramedics in here!
passages.content_zh: <偵探>快，讓醫護人員過來！

passages.content:
Miss Nele told me  was an orphan, but I didn't know it
had been like this...
passages.content_zh:
內勒小姐告訴我是個孤兒，但我並不知道
本來就是這樣...

passages.content: <[...]>Poor girl. No wonder she ended up so deranged...
passages.content_zh: <[...]>可憐的女孩。難怪她最後會如此喪心病狂…

passages.content:
<Detective>...so far, there are no clues. We believe it was a burglary
gone violent.
passages.content_zh:
<偵探>…到目前為止，還沒有任何線索。我們相信這是一起入室盜竊案
變得暴力。

passages.content:
I always told my brother he needed some better security.
With all the money he had, he could have protected himself
better.
passages.content_zh:
我總是告訴我的兄弟他需要更好的安全。
憑藉他所有的錢，他可以保護自己
更好。

passages.content: <Detective>How is little ?
passages.content_zh: <偵探>小怎麼樣？

passages.content:
Heavily medicated. I'm afraid she isn't in any condition to
answer your questions, detective.
passages.content_zh:
用藥甚重。恐怕她沒有任何條件
回答你的問題，偵探。

passages.content:
<Detective>I see. Do you have any idea when she'll be able to talk
with us?
passages.content_zh:
<偵探>我明白了。你知道她什麼時候會說話嗎
和我們一起嗎？

passages.content:
I understand the importance of your investigation, detective,
but my niece suffered severe damage to her spine and several
internal organs.

For now, we're focusing on stabilising her condition.
passages.content_zh:
我理解你調查的重要性 偵探
但我姪女的脊椎和幾處都受到了嚴重損傷
內臟器官。

目前，我們的重點是穩定她的病情。

passages.content:
<Detective>Poor girl. Good thing her uncle is a doctor.

By the way, I see you've moved her doll collection here.
I take it they meant a lot to her?
passages.content_zh:
<偵探>可憐的女孩。幸好她叔叔是醫生。

順便說一句，我看到你已經把她收藏的娃娃搬到這裡了。
我想他們對她來說意義重大吧？

passages.content:
I want my niece to feel at home when she wakes up...
whenever that might be...
passages.content_zh:
我希望我的侄女醒來時有賓至如歸的感覺...
每當這可能是...

passages.content: <Detective>That's a nice gesture. But I wonder, can she even hear us?
passages.content_zh: <偵探>這是一個很好的舉動。但我想知道，她聽得到我們說話嗎？

passages.content: Unlikely detective, very unlikely...
passages.content_zh: 不可能是偵探，非常不可能......

passages.content: 's uncle is visibly inebriated.
passages.content_zh: 叔叔顯然喝醉了。

passages.content:
Happy 18th birthday, .

You really are starting to look like your mother. How are
you feeling today?
passages.content_zh:
18 歲生日快樂，。

你真的開始像你媽媽了。怎麼樣
你今天感覺怎麼樣？

passages.content: Mmmm... hurts...
passages.content_zh: 嗯嗯……痛……

passages.content:
Hmpf, guess I'll have to raise the dose again. Your medicines
are beginning to cost me a small fortune. Good thing my
useless brother was loaded.
passages.content_zh:
嗯，我想我得再次增加劑量了。你的藥物
開始花我一大筆錢。好東西我的
沒用的兄弟被裝了。

passages.content: I... I remember...
passages.content_zh: 我……我記得……

passages.content:
You remember... what?

WAIT, YOU DON'T MEAN!?
passages.content_zh:
你還記得……什麼？

等等，你不是這個意思！ ？

passages.content: It was you... you did it...
passages.content_zh: 是你……你做到了……

passages.content:
Huh, I always thought you'd already forgotten.

Well, it's true. I killed my bastard brother.
passages.content_zh:
呵呵，我一直以為你已經忘記了。

嗯，這是真的。我殺了我的私生兄弟。

passages.content: ...But why...?

Simple. I have expensive vices and ended up owing money
to the wrong people.

I needed some money fast, but that self-righteous asshole
refused to help me.
passages.content_zh:
簡單的。我有昂貴的惡習並最終欠了錢
給錯誤的人。

我急需一些錢，但那個自以為是的混蛋
拒絕幫助我。

passages.content:
Good thing you survived, by the way.

My brother's will said that if you died before your 18th birthday,
all of his money would go to charity. Imagine the arrogance.
passages.content_zh:
順便說一句，幸好你活了下來。

我哥哥的遺囑裡說，如果你在18歲生日前過世，
他所有的錢都會捐給慈善機構。想像一下那種傲慢。

passages.content:
But of course, being your legal guardian, I had control over
your trust fund.
passages.content_zh:
但當然，身為你的法定監護人，我可以控制
您的信託基金。

passages.content:
...Why am I even wasting time talking to you?

I should give you your birthday gift.
passages.content_zh:
……我为什么要浪费时间跟你说话？

我應該送你生日禮物。

passages.content: He takes a syringe and injects  with something.
passages.content_zh: 他拿起注射器，注射了一些東西。

passages.content:
In a few hours, you should suffer a massive heart attack,
killing you painfully.

Quite tragic, but considering your condition, it was merely
a matter of time.
passages.content_zh:
幾個小時後，你就會遭受嚴重的心臟病發作，
痛苦地殺死你。

相當悲慘，但考慮到你的情況，這只是
這是時間問題。

passages.content:
Oh, and before I forget:

Happy birthday. .
passages.content_zh:
哦，在我忘記之前：

生日快樂。 。

passages.content: Nele is holding a fairy-sized cell phone.
passages.content_zh: 尼爾拿著一部仙女大小的手機。

passages.content:
<Nele>Yes, Director, this girl has mad magical potential, but she's
going to need some magic before-[...]
passages.content_zh:
<Nele>是的，導演，這個女孩有瘋狂的魔法潛力，但她
之前需要一些魔法-[...]

passages.content: <Nele>Yes, I know we are not a charity, but-[...]
passages.content_zh: <Nele>是的，我知道我們不是慈善機構，但是-[...]

passages.content:
<Nele>With all due respect ma'am, we can save her! Why are
you refusing-[...]
passages.content_zh:
<Nele>恕我直言，女士，我們可以救她！為什麼是
你拒絕-[...]

passages.content: Nele covers her cell phone and mutters.
passages.content_zh: 奈樂摀住手機，小聲嘀咕。

passages.content: <Nele>Oh, fuck this!
passages.content_zh: <Nele>哦，操這個！

passages.content: Nele begins to blow into the cell phone.
passages.content_zh: 內勒開始對著手機吹氣。

passages.content:
<Nele>Director, are you there?

Sorry, I'm losing you, but did you just say yes?

I can't quite hear you, but that sounded like a yes!
passages.content_zh:
<Nele>導演，你在嗎？

抱歉，我要失去你了，但你剛剛答應了嗎？

我聽不太清楚，但這聽起來像是肯定的！

passages.content: <Nele>There, there. How do you feel, dearie?
passages.content_zh: 〈內萊>那兒，那兒。親愛的，你感覺怎麼樣？

passages.content: The pain is gone... was that magic?
passages.content_zh: 疼痛消失了……這就是魔法嗎？

passages.content:
<Nele>Yes dearie, and now that you are a Magical Girl, you'll also
be able to use it.

Of course, you will need some training before you-[...]
passages.content_zh:
<Nele>是的，親愛的，既然你是魔法少女，你也會
能夠使用它。

當然，您在開始之前需要一些培訓-[...]

passages.content:
<Nele>Orrr you could just reshape your body like that with no
formal training.

(Damn, this girl is going to be really powerful.)
passages.content_zh:
<Nele>哦，你可以像那樣重塑你的身體，無需
正式培訓。

（媽的，這丫頭的威力可真大啊。）

passages.content: There, this body feels much better.
passages.content_zh: 在那裡，這個身體感覺好多了。

passages.content:
<Nele>But dearie, after reshaping yourself so radically, I doubt it'll
be possible to turn you back to normal.
passages.content_zh:
<Nele>但是親愛的，在如此徹底地重塑自己之後，我懷疑它會
有可能讓你恢復正常。

passages.content: That's alright, my old body wasn't very good anyway.
passages.content_zh: 沒關係，反正我以前的身體也不太好。

passages.content:
<Nele>I see. Well, you should start packing, we'll have to go to the
camp as soon as possible.
passages.content_zh:
<内莱>我明白了。好吧，你應該開始收拾行李了，我們得去
尽快扎营。

passages.content: Let me just say goodbye to my uncle first.
passages.content_zh: 讓我先跟叔叔說再見吧。

passages.content: <Nele>But of course dearie, take your time.
passages.content_zh: <Nele>當然，親愛的，慢慢來。

passages.content: I will.

Now if you'll excuse me, I fear this farewell will probably
involve a lot of... tears.
passages.content_zh:
現在請原諒，我擔心這次告別可能會
涉及很多……眼淚。

passages.content: Found you!
passages.content_zh: 找到你了！

passages.content: Hmph, this is taking longer than I expected.
passages.content_zh: 哼，這比我預期的要長。

passages.content:
Stop resisting and become my dolls, you'll be happier that
way!
passages.content_zh:
別再反抗了，成為我的玩偶吧，你會更幸福
方式！

passages.content: I lost my grip on their minds? No way, where did they go?
passages.content_zh: 我失去了對他們思想的控制？不可能吧，他們去哪了？

passages.content:
Wait a minute, did they manage to enter my mind instead?

They did!? Oh no, if I don't find them quickly...!
passages.content_zh:
等一下，他們竟然進入我的腦海了嗎？

他們做到了！ ？喔不，如果我不快點找到他們的話…！

passages.content: <[...]>Wow, my bed feels way more comfortable today.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>哇，今天我的床感覺舒服多了。

passages.content:
<Gentle Voice>I am glad you like it, [...], but could you get up now so we
can have little a chat?
passages.content_zh:
<溫柔的聲音>我很高興你喜歡它，[...]，但你現在可以起床嗎？
可以聊聊嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Just five more minutes, .
<Gentle Voice>? I am afraid you are mistaken.
passages.content_zh: <溫柔的聲音>？恐怕你誤會了。

passages.content: Hello, [...].
<[...]>Who are you? And where am I?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你是誰？而我在哪裡？

passages.content:
I am a friend, [...].

As for your second question, do not worry. You are still
back in your room, peacefully sleeping.
passages.content_zh:
我是一個朋友，[...]。

至於你的第二個問題，不用擔心。你還在
回到自己的房間，安靜地睡覺。

passages.content: <[...]>You mean this is a dream?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你的意思是說這是一個夢？

passages.content: Hmmm, something like that.
passages.content_zh: 嗯，類似的事情。

passages.content: <[...]>This doesn't feel like a normal dream! Why am I here?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這感覺不像是個正常的夢！我為什麼在這裡？

passages.content:
I have been following the progression of your training with
great interest.
passages.content_zh:
我一直在關注你的訓練進展
極大的興趣。

passages.content:
While you have made remarkable progress during your short
time in the camp, your lack of basic skills is hurting your
growth as a Magical Girl.
passages.content_zh:
雖然你在短期內取得了顯著的進步
在營地的時候，你缺乏基本技能正在傷害你
作為魔法少女的成長。

passages.content:
I am here to fix that.

Take this.
passages.content_zh:
我來這裡是為了解決這個問題。

拿這個。

passages.content:
She gives you a purple and pink box, shaped like a heart and
decorated with gold trim.
passages.content_zh:
她給了你一個紫色和粉紅色的盒子，形狀像一顆心，
飾有金色鑲邊。

passages.content: <[...]>Is this a makeup case? I don't see how this will help me.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這是化妝盒嗎？我不知道這對我有什麼幫助。

passages.content:
Patience, [...]; everything will be clear in a few moments
when you awake.
passages.content_zh:
耐心， [...];一會兒一切都會清楚
當你醒來時。

passages.content: Until next time.
passages.content_zh: 直到下次。

passages.content: <[...]>You again!

Oh my, why such hostility?

Did I not help you get out of that trouble with ?
passages.content_zh:
天哪，為什麼這麼有敵意？

我沒有幫你擺脫困境嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>Because of this!
Now now, [...], that is indecent. Please lower your skirt.
passages.content_zh: 現在，現在，[...]，這是不雅的。請把裙子放下來。

passages.content: <[...]>You shrunk my dick!
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你把我的雞雞縮小了！

passages.content: Guess the potion had a small side effect.
passages.content_zh: 猜想這藥水有一點副作用。

passages.content:
It could not be helped; we were dealing with magic I had
never used before and we had no time for testing it.
passages.content_zh:
這是沒辦法的事。我們正在處理我擁有的魔法
以前從未使用過，我們也沒有時間測試它。

passages.content: I cannot. Sorry, but I do not have any idea how.
passages.content_zh: 我不能。抱歉，但我不知道該怎麼做。

passages.content: I am sorry.
passages.content_zh: 對不起。

passages.content:
I still cannot believe how lucky you were to convince the
Director to waive the physical exam.

You really dodged a bullet back then.
passages.content_zh:
我仍然不敢相信你有多幸運能夠說服
主任免除體檢。

當年你真是躲過了一劫。

passages.content: Anyway, [...], we need to talk.
passages.content_zh: 無論如何，[...]，我們需要談談。

passages.content: <[...]>What is it?

I am worried about you. Even though you already managed
to defeat several enemies, your powers are still below what
is to be expected from a Magical Girl at your level.
passages.content_zh:
我很擔心你。即使你已經成功了
擊敗多個敵人，你的力量仍然低於
這是對你這個等級的魔法少女所期待的。

passages.content: <[...]>Maybe it's because I'm not a Magical...\fi Girl\fr?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>也許是因為我不是魔法...\fi Girl\fr？

passages.content:
Possibly, but this may be a problem. If your powers do not
increase, it might attract the wrong attention.
passages.content_zh:
有可能，但這可能是個問題。如果你的權力沒有
增加，可能會引起錯誤的注意。

passages.content: Fortunately, I have a plan. We will just-[...]
passages.content_zh: 幸運的是，我有一個計劃。我們將-[...]

passages.content:
<[...]>Wait a minute!

I'm not going to do anything until I get some answers.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>等一下！

在得到一些答案之前我不會做任何事情。

passages.content:
*Sigh*

Very well, I guess. I saw this coming.
passages.content_zh:
*嘆息*

很好，我想。我看到了這一切的到來。

passages.content:
<[...]>For starters:

who the hell are you? And what do you want from me?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>對於初學者：

你到底是誰？你想從我這裡得到什麼？

passages.content:
To be honest, I really do not know who I am.

I just woke up in this room one day with a bunch of
fragmented memories. I do not even know my name.
passages.content_zh:
說實話，我真的不知道自己是誰。

有一天我才在這個房間醒來，周圍有一堆
碎片化的記憶。我甚至不知道我的名字。

passages.content: <[...]>Where is this place? Are we inside my mind?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這是哪裡？我们在我的心里吗？

passages.content:
Ah, very good, [...]. Yes, we are indeed inside your mind.
Somewhere in your subconscious, I think.
passages.content_zh:
啊，非常好，[...]。是的，我們確實在你的腦海裡。
我想，在你潛意識的某個地方。

passages.content: <[...]>But how did you get in my head?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>但是你是怎麼進入我的腦海的？

passages.content:
As I said, I do not know. But well, it seems we are stuck with
each other.
passages.content_zh:
正如我所說，我不知道。但好吧，看來我們被困住了
彼此。

passages.content: <[...]>Is that why you're doing this?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>這就是你這樣做的原因嗎？

passages.content:
While I would like to imagine that I am the kind of person
who would help someone in need, I must admit that, yes,
that is why I am helping you.
passages.content_zh:
雖然我很想想像我是這樣的人
誰會幫助有需要的人，我必須承認，是的，
這就是我幫助你的原因。

passages.content:
Well,\fi also\fr why I am helping you.

After all, if you go down, I will be dragged along.
passages.content_zh:
好吧，\fi 還有\fr 為什麼我要幫助你。

畢竟，你下去了，我也會被拖著走。

passages.content: <[...]>Why can't I talk about you to other people?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>為什麼我不能跟其他人談論你？

passages.content:
That I also do not know. It seems that it is a mental compulsion
that was implanted in your mind.
passages.content_zh:
這我也不知道。看來這是一種精神上的強迫
那已植入你的腦海中。

passages.content: <[...]>Can't you tell me anything else?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>你不能告訴我別的嗎？

passages.content:
I am afraid not, I just do not have many memories. I am
sorry.
passages.content_zh: 恐怕不是，我只是沒有太多回憶。對不起。

passages.content:
<[...]>*Sigh*

Figures... So what's your plan?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>*嘆氣*

數字...那你的計劃是什麼？

passages.content:
It is not often done, but Magical Girls can increase their
powers by siphoning magic from Arcano Cores.
passages.content_zh:
雖然這種情況並不常見，但魔法少女可以提高她們的能力
透過從奧卡諾核心吸取魔法來獲得力量。

passages.content:
Unfortunately, this process requires specialised equipment
which the camp does not have.
passages.content_zh:
不幸的是，這個過程需要專門的設備
營地沒有。

passages.content: <[...]>So how can I do it?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那我該怎麼做呢？

passages.content:
Near the camp is a tower where a Magical Girl named Phyre
used to live.
passages.content_zh:
營地附近有一座塔樓，裡面住著一位名叫菲蕾的魔法少女
曾經住過。

passages.content: She liked to... experiment with spells.
passages.content_zh: 她喜歡……嘗試咒語。

passages.content: I am sure her laboratory has everything we need.
passages.content_zh: 我確信她的實驗室有我們需要的一切。

passages.content: The lab room is sealed, but I have the key.
passages.content_zh: 實驗室是密封的，但我有鑰匙。

passages.content: She gives you a small emerald rod.
passages.content_zh: 她給了你一根小翡翠棒。

passages.content: <[...]>What's the catch?
Please, do not be so paranoid, [...].
passages.content_zh: 請不要這麼偏執，[...]。

passages.content:
Oh, it seems our time is nearly up. But before you wake up,
could you do me a favour, [...]?
passages.content_zh:
哦，看來我們的時間快到了。但在你醒來之前，
你能幫我一個忙嗎，[...]？

passages.content: Could you give me a name?
passages.content_zh: 你能給我一個名字嗎？

passages.content:
Yes, I do not like to be thought of just as "that strange dream
girl"...
passages.content_zh:
是的，我不喜欢被认为是“那个奇怪的梦”
女孩”...

passages.content: <[...]>How about...
I like it! From now on, please call me .
passages.content_zh: 我喜歡它！從現在開始，請打電話給我。

passages.content:
Oh, you are about to wake up. Do not forget, go to Phyre's
tower...
passages.content_zh:
噢，你快要醒來了。別忘了，去Phyre's
塔...

passages.content: <[...]>Let's go into that room again.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>讓我們再次進入那個房間。

passages.content: <[...]>Should we go into that room again?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我們該再去那個房間嗎？

passages.content:
<[...]>Hello darkness, my old friend,

I've come to talk with you again...
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>你好，黑暗，我的老朋友，

我又來找你聊天了...

passages.content: ...What?
<[...]>Nothing. Let's just go into that room.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>什麼都沒有。我們就到那個房間去吧。

passages.content: Sure, let us go.
passages.content_zh: 當然，讓我們走吧。

passages.content: If you wish to.
passages.content_zh: 如果你願意的話。

passages.content:
Damn it! Even after getting so much magic from the cores,
it still refuses to budge!?
passages.content_zh:
該死的！即使從核心獲得瞭如此多的魔力，
它仍然不肯讓步！ ？

passages.content: <[...]>What are you doing, ?

Huh, [...]?

Why are you here? I did not call you.
passages.content_zh:
呃，[...]？

你為什麼在這裡？我沒有打電話給你。

passages.content: <[...]>I kind of woke up in here.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我是在這裡醒來的。

passages.content: That should not happen! Unless...
passages.content_zh: 那不應該發生！除非...

passages.content: Yes, it finally happened!
passages.content_zh: 是的，它終於發生了！

passages.content:
The magic from the cores has awoken your powers.

I knew it was only a matter of time.
passages.content_zh:
來自核心的魔力喚醒了你的力量。

我知道這只是時間問題。

passages.content: <[...]>My... powers?
Yes, can you not feel it?
passages.content_zh: 是啊，你感覺不到嗎？

passages.content:
As you listen to , you understand that she is right. You
can feel a new power inside of you.
passages.content_zh:
當你聽的時候，你就會明白她是對的。你
可以感受到你內心的新力量。

passages.content: [...] learned the skill Aurora Glow.
passages.content_zh: [...]學會了極光之光技能。

passages.content:
It is the first spell you have learned on your own. I am so
proud.
passages.content_zh:
這是你自學的第一個咒語。我就是這樣
自豪。

passages.content: <[...]>Wow, but what does that have to do with me being here?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>哇，但這和我在這裡有什麼關係？

passages.content:
I think you have unconsciously used your new magical powers
to enter my room.
passages.content_zh:
我想你已經不知不覺地使用了你的新魔力
進入我的房間。

passages.content: Did you want to see me? How sweet.
passages.content_zh: 你想見我嗎？多麼甜蜜啊。

passages.content:
Oh, but it seems you are already awakening.

Well, it cannot be helped, dreams only last so long.
passages.content_zh:
哦，不過看來你已經覺醒了。

好吧，這是沒辦法的事，夢想只能持續這麼久。

passages.content: But before leaving, could you do me a favour?
passages.content_zh: 但在離開之前，你能幫我一個忙嗎？

passages.content: <[...]>What favour, ?

Could you please open that door over there? It should be
easy for you.
passages.content_zh:
你能打開那邊的門嗎？應該是
對你來說很容易。

passages.content: <[...]>What's behind that door?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那扇門後面是什麼？

passages.content: I am not sure, but I think it leads to another part of your mind.
passages.content_zh: 我不確定，但我認為這會導致你思想的另一部分。

passages.content:
<[...]>I don't know if I want you crawling around my head more
than you already do.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我不知道我是否希望你更多地在我的頭上爬行
比你已經做的。

passages.content:
Please do not be like that, [...]. Have I not helped you ever
since we first met?
passages.content_zh:
請不要那樣，[...]。難道我從來沒有幫助過你嗎
自從我們第一次見面以來？

passages.content:
<[...]>How do I know you won't just try to hijack my body or
something like that?
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我怎麼知道你不會只是試圖劫持我的身體或
類似的東西？

passages.content: Even if I could, I would never do that. I only want to help you.
passages.content_zh: 即使可以，我也絕對不會這麼做。我只是想幫助你。

passages.content:
In fact, the reason I want to access more of your mind is
because I think I will be capable of sharing some of my
power with you if I do that.
passages.content_zh:
事實上，我想更多地了解你的想法的原因是
因為我認為我有能力分享我的一些
如果我這樣做的話，你就會擁有權力。

passages.content: Why, would that not be useful for fighting the Magicos?
passages.content_zh: 為什麼，這對於對抗魔法師沒有用？

passages.content: <[...]>I hope this isn't just a big mistake.
passages.content_zh: <[...]>我希望這不只是一個大錯誤。

passages.content: Oh do not worry, [...], you can trust me!
passages.content_zh: 哦，別擔心，[...]，你可以相信我！

passages.content:
From now on, I will be able to lend you a hand during your
fights.
passages.content_zh:
從現在開始，我將能夠在你的生活中為你提供幫助。
打架。

passages.content: [...] learned the skill Mana Burst.
passages.content_zh: [...]學習了技能法力爆發。

passages.content: I am saddened you still do not trust me, [...].
passages.content_zh: 我很遺憾你還是不信任我，[...]。

passages.content:
*Sigh*

I guess I will have to find another way.
passages.content_zh:
*嘆息*

我想我必須找到另一種方法。

passages.content: How come you are here, I did not call you?
passages.content_zh: 你怎麼來了，我沒有打電話給你？

passages.content:
<[...]>I don't know, I thought I was fast asleep. I guess I'm having
another strange dream again? Though it feels much clearer
than usual.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我不知道，我以為我睡得很熟。我想我有
又做了一個奇怪的夢嗎？雖然感覺清晰多了
比平時。

passages.content:
A lucid dream apparently. Maybe it is related to us unlocking
that door the other day?
passages.content_zh:
顯然是一個清醒夢。可能和我們解鎖有關
那天那個門？

passages.content: <[...]>Where does that door lead to, anyway?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>那扇門到底通往哪裡？

passages.content:
Well, as I said before, it leads to deeper parts of your mind,
but even I do not know what exactly might be hiding there.
I have not entered that place yet.
passages.content_zh:
嗯，正如我之前所說，它會引導你進入更深層的思想，
但即使是我也不知道那裡到底藏著什麼。
我還沒有進入那個地方。

passages.content:
<[...]>I see. Well, since the door's open now, how about it? Let's
check it out.
passages.content_zh:
<[...]>我明白了。好吧，既然門已經打開了，怎麼樣？讓我們
檢查一下。

passages.content: Sure, if you want.
passages.content_zh: 當然，如果你願意的話。

passages.content: Now you two belong to me.
passages.content_zh: 現在你們兩個都屬於我了。

passages.content: We are your dolls.
passages.content_zh: 我們就是你的玩偶。

passages.content: Two cute new dolls,  is so happy!
passages.content_zh: 兩個可愛的新娃娃，太開心了！

passages.content:
Of course, I'm still going to have to punish you two for ruining
my spell. Nothing personal, that's just how things work.
passages.content_zh:
當然，我還是要懲罰你們兩個的破壞行為
我的咒語。沒有什麼私人的，事情就是這樣運作的。

passages.content: We're happy to be punished by you.
passages.content_zh: 我們很高興受到你的懲罰。

passages.content:
I think I'm going to keep you locked in a dark room for a
few weeks, then you can help me cast that spell again.
passages.content_zh:
我想我要把你鎖在黑暗的房間裡一段時間
幾週後，你就可以幫我再次施展那個咒語了。

passages.content: When it's over, everybody in this camp will also be my dolls.
passages.content_zh: 等一切結束後，這個營地的所有人都將成為我的玩偶。

passages.content: <[...]>That is wonderful, .
I can hardly wait for it.
passages.content_zh: 我已經等不及了。

passages.content:
Welcome, everybody. These are my team members:

, , and...
passages.content_zh:
歡迎大家。這些是我的團隊成員：

、 、 和...

passages.content:
You already know  and . These two are  and
, the other two members of their team.
passages.content_zh:
你已經知道了並且。這兩個是和
，他們團隊的另外兩名成員。

passages.content:
We have met before already.

They attempted my rescue from the darkest depths of...
passages.content_zh:
我們以前已經見過面了。

他們試圖把我從最黑暗的深處救出來…

passages.content: groans while  continues rambling.

passages.content:
Oh, it's the creepy doll girl and the alien snoop who's always

哦，總是那個令人毛骨悚然的娃娃女孩和外星人窺探者

What!? I-I-It's just a... coincidence.

Don't make it sound like I'm a pervert!

什麼！ ？我、我、這只是……巧合。

別說得好像我是變態一樣！

Relax, it's fine! I was just afraid you were planning to probe

passages.content: *Mischievous giggle*

passages.content: I'll show you later.
passages.content_zh: 我稍後會告訴你。

passages.content: You have a most delightful, gloomy aura about you, .

passages.content:
We should get together and share the dark spells we use to

我們應該聚在一起分享我們曾經使用過的黑暗咒語
引出-[...]的黑暗力量

Fool!

Dare not mock my dark minions of darkness and doom!

不敢嘲笑我黑暗與厄運的黑暗爪牙！

Really, you sound like a moron.

Have you ever noticed how many times you say the word

你有沒有註意到你說了這個詞多少次

passages.content: Oh, I would love to, .

passages.content:
...For some reason, the way she said that sent shivers

……不知道為什麼，她說話的語氣讓人不寒而慄

passages.content:
Despite the awkward start, the two teams seem to get along.

After some time, the conversation eventually turns to .

儘管開局尷尬，但兩隊似乎相處融洽。

過了一段時間，談話最終轉向。

passages.content: So, , how did you end up here?
passages.content_zh: 那麼，你是怎麼來到這裡的呢？

passages.content:
Miss Nele found me living in a cardboard box after my sisters

passages.content_zh:
內勒小姐發現我在姐姐們之後住在一個紙箱裡
把我踢了出去。

passages.content: What kind of fiends would treat their own kin like that!?
passages.content_zh: 什麼樣的惡魔才會這樣對待自己的親人！ ？

passages.content: All kinds. Fiends don't tend to form strong family bonds.
passages.content_zh: 各種。惡魔往往不會形成牢固的家庭紐帶。

passages.content: ...Huh?
How did that happen?
passages.content_zh: 這是怎麼發生的？

passages.content: It all started when I got involved with a cult.
passages.content_zh: 這一切都是從我加入邪教開始的。

passages.content: <[...]>Wha-? You were in a cult!? What kind of cult?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>什麼-？你加入了邪教！ ？什麼樣的邪教？

passages.content: A satanic cult. I can still remember when I met them...
passages.content_zh: 一個撒旦邪教。我還記得我遇見他們的時候...

passages.content:
Miss Nele found me in that alley, and that's how I wound up

內勒小姐在那條巷子裡找到了我，這就是我的結局

passages.content: <[...]>Kind of hard to believe she's actually a demon, eh?
passages.content_zh: <[...]>有點難以相信她其實是個惡魔，是嗎？

passages.content:
Well, yeah.

But you'd have less trouble believing it had you seen...
's little show.

嗯，是的。

但如果你親眼所見，你就不會那麼相信它了…
的小表演。

passages.content:
It's not as if she's hiding it, having spells like "Brimstone

這並不是說她在隱藏它，擁有「硫磺」之類的咒語

passages.content: I could transform and show you.

This is how I really look. I normally hide my wings when

這就是我真實的樣子。我通常會隱藏我的翅膀

passages.content_zh: 不是角和尾巴嗎？

What kind of magic do you use to keep your beret from

你用什麼魔法來保護你的貝雷帽

passages.content: Duct tape!

Not really. The demons that used to be angels sometimes

Not exactly, I'm a Lilim. It's similar, but not quite the same

Lilims are Lilith's daughters, while the succubi are the children

Lilims是莉莉絲的女兒，而sucubi是孩子們

passages.content: Succubi and incubi are the same thing, just in a different state.
passages.content_zh: 魅魔和夢魘是同一個東西，只是狀態不同。

passages.content: A "different state"?

passages.content:
Succubi can change to a male form at will; that's when you

魅魔可以隨意改變為男性形態；那時你

passages.content:
I have always believed they are simply the males and

我一直相信他們只是男性

Right. So when you say "intermediate"... do you mean

Yeah. In fact, I have a much older sibling named Aubrey

我自己學的。這有點像發現

還記得我們前幾天談過什麼嗎？那是

You spend the rest of the dinner gawking at 's true form.

I can't really control it.

, , these are  and .

不！ \fi你\fr是正在修行的魔法少女，上次我

! ...Are you drunk?

is showing you photos of her family and home.

hugs .

passages.content:
I've always wanted to have a sister who isn't mean. I'm so

passages.content:
, please don't take this the wrong way, but that's just

，請不要誤解，但這只是

It takes a while, but  eventually manages to convince

You all have a great time. You leave 's room late in

雖然需要一段時間，但最終還是說服了
 他們的母親只有同一個名字。

你們都玩得很開心。你很晚才離開房間

passages.content:
That was wonderful.

Thank you, [...].

謝謝你， [...]。

If it wasn't for you, I wouldn't have talked with  or

如果不是你，我就不會跟你說話

I'm sorry if I don't stand, but I think my leg is a little broken

如果我不站起來，我很抱歉，但我想我的腿有點斷了

passages.content: Good choice, those are my favorites.
